119a6(mdo sde): pa de che'o// ngag dang yid kyis kyang ni sdig byas shing // gang zhig 'phags la smod pa dmyal 'gro ste// stong phrag brgya ni chu bur rdol rnams su// chu bur can du sum bcu
119a7(mdo sde): rtsa drug go/ sdig pa'i sems kyi bden par mi smra ba// bdag nyid rlag cig dmyal ba 'phel bar byed// de yid dri mas snyogs par byed cing // kha na ma tho med par bzod de/
119a8(mdo sde): dge slong dag sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha ba'i tshe'i tshad ni skal pa cig ste/ bar ma dor mchi ba ni yod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
119b1(mdo sde): pa 'di bka' stsal pa// 'bras bu yid 'ongs tho ris su// skye 'gyur dge ba spangs nas ni// 'dir ni mi sdug las byas pas// rab tu tsha bar skye bar 'gyur// dge slong bram/
119b2(mdo sde): ze dge ba dang / pa dang ma yang de bzhin te// gang yang bla ma gzhan gsod pa// rab tu tsha bar de mched do/ dge slong dag sems can dmyal ba chen po rnar med pa'i tshe tshad ni
119b3(mdo sde): skal pa gcig ste// bar ma dor mchi ba yod do// mi tig mu can lhas byin gyi dge 'dun 'thun pa phye ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyi phrag phyung ba dang /
119b4(mdo sde): dge slong ma dgra bcom pa gsad pas rang gi lus de nyid dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa der skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de'i tshe tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/
119b5(mdo sde): 'phags pa rnams kyi snyan pa yis// chos kyi 'os par mtsho rnams la// sdig pa'i lta ba la sten nas// blo ngan gang zhig smong byed pa// tsher ldan 'od ma'i 'bras bu lta//
119b6(mdo sde): de ni 'bras bu brlag par byed// dge bar gyur par brjod bya ste// sdig pa can dag mi brjod do// dge ba smras na legs par 'gyur// sdig pa smras na sreg 'gyur bas// gal
119b7(mdo sde): te spras na dge ba smras pa rlag par 'gyur// byis pa rnams ni sdig smra ste// 'phags pa ni ma yin no// 'dir ni ngan 'gror 'gro ba yi// las ni shas cher byas pa na/
119b8(mdo sde): las de dag gi mnar med pa'i// dmyal ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur// dge slong dag tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi tshe tshad ni// skal pa phyed te bar ma dor mchi ba ni yod do// dge
120a1(mdo sde): slong dag tshangs pa 'dun na 'dun gyi lha rnams kyi tshe tshad ni skal pa'i bzhi cha gsum thub ste/ bar ma dor mchi ba ni yod do// dge slong dag tshangs
120a2(mdo sde): chen gyi lha rnams kyi tshe tshad ni bskal pa cig thub ste/ bar ma dor mchi ba ni yod do// dge slong dag 'od chung gi lha rnas kyi tshe tshad ni skal pa gnyis thub ste/ bar ma dor mchi ba ni yod
120a3(mdo sde): do// dge slong dag tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams kyi tshe tshad ni skal pa bzhi thub ste/ bar ma dor mchi ba ni yod do// dge slong dag 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyi tshe tshad ni skal pa brgyad
120a4(mdo sde): thub ste/ bar ma dor mchi ba ni yod do// dge slong dag dge chung gi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni/ skal pa bcu drug thub ste/ bar ma dor mchi ba ni yod do// dge slong dag tshad
120a5(mdo sde): med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe tshad ni skal pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis thub ste/ bar ma dor mchi ba ni yod do// dge slong dag dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi tshe tshad ni/ skal pa drug bcu rtsa bzhi
120a6(mdo sde): thub ste/ bar ma dor mchi ba ni yod do// dge slong dag sprin med kyi lha rnams kyi tshe tshad ni/ bskal pa brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga thub ste/ bar ma dor mchi ba ni yod do// dge slong dag
120a7(mdo sde): bsod nams skyes kyi lha rnams kyi tshe tshad ni/ bskal pa nyis brgya lnga bcu thub ste/ bar ma dor mchi ba ni yod do// dge slong dag 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni/
120a8(mdo sde): bskal pa lnga brgya thub ste/ bar ma dor mchi ba yod do// dge slong dag 'du shes med pa'i sems can mi che ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni// bskal pa stong thub ste// bar ma dor
120b1(mdo sde): mchi ba ni yod do// dge slong dag mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni/ bskal pa nyis stong thub ste/ bar ma dor mchi ba ni yod do// dge slong dag shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams
120b2(mdo sde): kyi tshe'i tshad ni skal pa brgyad stong thub ste/ bar ma dor mchi ba yod do// dge slong dag gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni// bskal pa brgyad stong thub ste/ bar ma dor
120b3(mdo sde): mchi ba ni yod do// dge slong dag 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi tshe tshad ni bskal pa drug stong thub ste/ bar ma dor mchi ba yod do// dge slong dag na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
120b4(mdo sde): du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa nyi khri ste/ bar ma dor mchi ba ni yod do// dge slong dag rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du 'gro ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe tshad ni
120b5(mdo sde): bskal pa bzhi khri ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// dge slong dag ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe tshad ni bskal pa drug khri ste// bar ma dor
120b6(mdo sde): mchi ba ni yod do// dge slong dag 'du shes med 'du shes min gyi skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni/ bskal pa brgyad khri ste/ bar ma dor mchi ba ni yod do//
120b7(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar dmyal ba chen po rnar med pa nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi bar de dag ni dge dag srid pa'i rtse mo dang / de dag ni srid pa 'byung ba yin no//
120b8(mdo sde): de dag ni 'gro ba lnga'i sems can 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'chi ba dang / skye bar snang ngo // srid pa mngon par sgrub pa ni sdug bsngal yin pa'i phyir/
121a1(mdo sde): dper na/ mi rtsang ba nyung ngu yang mi zhim pa lta ci smos/ de ltar de bzhin du/ nga ni srid pa mngon par sgrub pa chung ngu la yang tha na de'i skad cig
121a2(mdo sde): tsam yang sngags pa mi brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag srid pa mngon par sgrub pa ni/ sdug bsngal yin pa'i phyir ro// so so'i skye bo byis pa thos pa dang /
121a3(mdo sde): mi ldan pa de dag ni 'gro ba lnga po'i 'khor ba gang du yang dang yang dmyal ba rnams dang / yang dang yang dud 'gro rnams dang / yang dang yang du ngan song ngan 'gro logs par ltar
121a4(mdo sde): ba rnams su kun tu rgyug/ kun tu rab tu rgyug go/ dge slong dag de ltar bas na/ de'i phyir 'di ltar slab par bya ste/ srid pa rgyun chad par bya ba gang yin pa la brtson par
121a5(mdo sde): bya zhing // srid pa mngon par sgrub par mi bya'o// dge slong dag khyed kyi de ltar slab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag yid
121a6(mdo sde): rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// tshe'i mtha'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi da ya ka ra sing ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo chu ba ban
121a7(mdo sde): d+he dpal rtsegs kyis sbyar te/ zhes nas brtan la phab pa'o// // sarba mang+ga laM//
121a8(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dru ma kin nA ra/ rA dzA pa ri phred can ma ma hA ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas
121b1(mdo sde): zhus pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom/
121b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong drug khri nyis stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phal cher phyogs
121b3(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'das pa bdun khri stong thams cad kyang / mngon par shes pa/ gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa chags pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa//
121b4(mdo sde): dran pa dang blo gros dang rtogs pa dang / mos pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa/ bsam pa rdo rje ltar brten zhing mi phyed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
121b5(mdo sde): thams cad la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa khyad par 'phags pa la zhugs pa/ bdag nyid byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor ba/ sems can gzhan byang chub
121b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ sbyin pa dang dal ba dang / yang dag par sdoms pa dang / bzod pa dang / nges pa dang / 'phags pa'i dngos po thams
121b7(mdo sde): cad yongasu btong ba/ yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga shes pa lus dang ngag dang / sems tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad la
121b8(mdo sde): sems snyoms pa dang / bzod pa dang nges pa'i stobs kyi cho ga shin tu dgos pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa/ bye ba phrag khrig brgya stong du brtson 'grus shin tu brtsob pa//
122a1(mdo sde): bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par
122a2(mdo sde): brtson pa/ tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba la spobs pa chags pa med pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes la mkhas pa/ lhun po'i ri ltar sems g.yo ba med pa/ sa dang
122a3(mdo sde): chu dang me dang rlung / ri ltar rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba/ byams pa chen po la gnas te/ 'od zer thogs pa med pa/ snying rjes chen po la gnas te
122a4(mdo sde): rtag tu sems la lta bar brtson pa dga' ba chen po la gnas te/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' bar ldan pa/ btang snyoms chen po la gnas te/ gnyis su med par shes
122a5(mdo sde): pa thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po brnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang ma grags pa dang / bstod pa dang / smad pa dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal las
122a6(mdo sde): 'das pa/ phas kyi rgol ba ngan pa'i tshogs can gi tshogs thams cad kun tu rab tu 'joms pa/ bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ u dum pa ra'i me tog
122a7(mdo sde): mthong ba ltar shin tu 'byung ba dka' ba/ gsol ba btab pa sems can thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du gtan du
122a8(mdo sde): mdzad pa/ seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo dang / mi 'jigs pa bsgrogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag brgyas btab pa/ mi 'khrugs/
122b1(mdo sde): par byed par lung bston pa/ ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed pa/ de kho na'i chos kyi tshul gi chos ston pa/ 'od kyi nyi ma dang zla ba mog mog por byed pa/ phyogs bcur sgra sgrags
122b2(mdo sde): pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa chos dkon mchog gi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi gnod
122b3(mdo sde): par yid la byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ shin du rnam par 'phye ba/ rnam par 'byed pa la gnas pa'i blo dang ldan pa mthong ba dang //
122b4(mdo sde): thos pa 'on yod pas rnam par gnon pa// rtag par rgyun tu sems yongs su smin par byed pa la brtson par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu
122b5(mdo sde): son pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa/ shes par ci rigs par chos ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi
122b6(mdo sde): ba la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi 'jug pa dang / btags pa bde klag du mkhas pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs pa med pa/ rga ba dang na
122b7(mdo sde): ba dang 'chi ba dang / nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po//
122b8(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs ba sogs pa/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos thams cad la mos pa//
123a1(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba smon lam shin tu btab pa/ sems can thams cad chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang rmi lam dang / chu zla dang /
123a2(mdo sde): mig yor dang / brag cha dang / na mkha' dang mtshungs par mos pa/ sgra skad thams cad nges pa'i tshig gi ston pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos dang don dang nges pa'i
123a3(mdo sde): tshig dang / spobs pa so sor yang dag par rigs pa thob pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po la rtog par khong du chud pa/ shugs chen po 'dzin pa'i
123a4(mdo sde): stobs bcu la nye bar gyur pa/ sha'i mig dang / lha'i mig dang / shes rab kyi mig dang / chos mig dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi snang ba thob pa/ lam gyi yan lag
123a5(mdo sde): gi tshogs shin du bsags pa'i lam thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod snang ba la 'jug pa'i cho ga shes pa/ phyir mi ldog
123a6(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba/ mtshan nyid kyi phyag brgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad
123a7(mdo sde): la dbang byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon gsum du gyur pa/ chos dkon mchog gi sgron ma 'dzin pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la lta ba/ rnam par lta ba ma'
123a8(mdo sde): pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la nye bar gyur pa/ sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi bya bas so sor nye bar gnas na rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i/
123b1(mdo sde): yon tan rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ bskal pa thams cad du bsngags pa yongs su brjod kyang mthar mi phyin pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
123b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po dga' byed dang / dga' 'byung dang / lag na rin po che dang / rin chen me tog dang / rin po che'i tog dang / mthong dga' dang / dga' ba'i blo/
123b3(mdo sde): gros dang / mig gis mthong dga' dang / sa 'dzin dang / dga' zhing mchog tu dga' byed dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / dpal
123b4(mdo sde): chen dang / bdud 'dul dang / me tog man da ra'i dri dang / rlung lha dang / bden dga' dang / mnyam lta dang / mnyam mi mnyam lta dang / kha lo sgyur dang / gsol
123b5(mdo sde): ba ma btab par sems can kun gyi bshes gnyen dang / byams pa dang / 'brug sgra dang / lhun po rtse mo 'dzin dang / lhun po brtsegs dang / lhun po'i mchog dang /
123b6(mdo sde): 'od kyi tog dang / 'od dpal dang / sgron ma'i rgyal po dang / mngon gsum blo gros dang / 'od kyi yang dag brgyan dang / sna tshogs gcod pan dang / lha'i gcod
123b7(mdo sde): pan dang / lha yul ba'i gcod pan dang / mdzes pa'i mig gis lta ba dang / lag bzangs dpe/ legs par bsams pa sems dang / 'khor lo rab gnas/
123b8(mdo sde): rkang pa dang / mi g.yo rkang pas rnam par gnon dang / rdo rje rkang pas rnam par gnon dang / rkang pas 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon dang / dga' spobs dang /
124a1(mdo sde): spobs byur dang / spobs pa mi 'chad dang / spobs pa byin gyis brlabs dang / 'jam sgra dang / sems can thams cad tshim par
124a2(mdo sde): byed pa dang / dra ba can gyi 'od dang / rgyal po'i blo gros dang / skye bar tshig byed dang / 'gro 'dzin dang / lha'i rgyal pos mchod dang / mchog gi blo gros dang /
124a3(mdo sde): thogs med sems dang / skya ring blo gros dang / mi skyod pa dang / dpag med rin chen mdzod dang / byang chub blo gros dang / sna tshogs me tog dang / lha'i rgyal
124a4(mdo sde): po dang / tshangs dbyangs dang / bzang skyongs dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / ded dpon bzang po dang / mis byin dang / chu lha dang / 'jam dbyangs
124a5(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs
124a6(mdo sde): so// gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / de las gzhan pa lha dang / klu dang /
124a7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la lta ba
124a8(mdo sde): dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir 'khod te/ de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
124b1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po'i lha'i gcod pan zhes bya bas 'khor de nyid du 'dus par nges/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po de 'dus par rig nas/ stan las langs/
124b2(mdo sde): te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsuM bskor ba byas nas/ pus mo
124b3(mdo sde): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis
124b4(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do// 'jig rten 'das pa'i 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad// khyod ni 'jig rten don mdzad blo gros ldan// bsnang ba brnyes shing nyon mongs dri bsal ba//
124b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten snang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sbyin la dgyes shing stobs bcu'i mchog mnga' ba/ dul ba 'dal ba'i gdul ba'i pha rol phyin// bcom ldan lha dang
124b6(mdo sde): mi dang klus mchod pa/ dul ba'i mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan mchog 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad pa/ 'dom gang 'od ni zer gyi kha dog 'dra// dge ba'i
124b7(mdo sde): mtshan gyi dam pa gzugs mnga' ba// srid gsum mtshungs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// pha rol gshegs pa gzhan gyi tshogs 'joms pa'i/ phas kyis rgol
124b8(mdo sde): ba'i rgal 'joms mi g.yo ba/ sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi spyod la mkhas/ thugs rje mchog ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dgra bcom rgyal ba nyon mongs
125a1(mdo sde): rdul bsal ba/ 'tsho ba dag cing rtul shugs tshul khrims chen po gnas// lha'i lha mchog dri med dri ma bral/ pha rol tshogs 'joms
125a2(mdo sde): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bde gshegs rin chen mchog tu dga' mdzad pa/ dgon par rtag tu dgon par dgyes// rdul skyon gti mug rnyog pa mi mnga' ba// na mkha'
125a3(mdo sde): mnyam thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chu bo bzhi rgal bden bzhi dka' mching gsungs// mig sprin bdud rtsi chos kyi dka' mching can// 'gro ba'i don mdzad 'jig
125a4(mdo sde): rten gsum rgyu ba// 'khor lo'i zhabs can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lha dang mis mchod pa yis mthu bo che// mgon po lha'i dbang po bdud 'joms pa// mi dang lha
125a5(mdo sde): klu tshogs kyi mchod pa yi// mi mchog dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// brtag tu bden sdung dam pa'i chos la dgyes/ mnyam thugs 'gro ba kun la byams pa'i thugs
125a6(mdo sde): chos la mnyam gnas mi rnams kha lo sgyur/ yon tan mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs rnam par dag dang ldan// tshangs pa'i dgra dbyangs
125a7(mdo sde): lta bur 'jam pa'i gsungs// dbyangs kyi yan lag rab tshul kun rdzogs pa/ bden pa snyan gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// stong pa mtshan ma med cing smon dang bral
125a8(mdo sde): zab mo lta dka' shin tu rtogs par dka'// mthar lam 'jug par mkhas pa blo gros ldan// thar pa'i lam nges khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu la ston pa'i mkhas
125b1(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das// mtha' gnyis lta ba rtag tu mi mnga' ba// las kyi rnam smin 'bras bu kho na gsungs// lta ba mun bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gang nas
125b2(mdo sde): ma byon gang du'ang gshegs ma lags// rtag tu dbyen pa'i chos rnams rab gsung pa// smig rgyu bzhin du nga'i mi mnga' ba// dge ba'i chos tshul khyod la phyag 'tshalo//
125b3(mdo sde): skye ba mi skye gang du'ang skye ma lags// skye dang 'jig dang gang du'ang mi bas pa// chos kyi gnas nyid ji lta'i gnas la gnas// gnas la mi gnas rgyal la phyag
125b4(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// de bzhin kho na de bzhin yang dag gsung // rtag tu mi g.yo de bzhin dang la bzhugs// lhun po rgyan rdo rje 'dra ba'i sku// mi g.yo ri rab mtshungs la phyag
125b5(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// skra ni dben zhing mnyam thugs blo ldan pa// grags pa mtha' yas 'jig rten gsum du grags// skyes bu mchog la zhu ba zhus pa rnams// 'jig rten
125b6(mdo sde): zla bas myur du skyabs dbyer gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i gcod pan gyis// tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis
125b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung snyan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/
125b8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
126a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i gcod pan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
126a2(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shigs dang // ngas dri ba dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas// khyod sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces
126a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i gcod pan gyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar
126a4(mdo sde): nyan cing / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa sna tshogs kyi brgyan dang ldan pa rnams lags/
126a5(mdo sde): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos zab mo rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa/ shes pa mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sems can thams cad kyi
126a6(mdo sde): dbang po mchog dang mchog ma lags pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so so ci rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams lags
126a7(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa shes pa la 'jug par shes pa rnams lags/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rgyu dang 'bras bu dang /
126a8(mdo sde): las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa la brjed pa ma mchis par spyod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/
126b1(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gyi brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/
126b2(mdo sde): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rnams lags/ ji ltar
126b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams legs/ ji ltar na byang chub
126b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston la/ ma brtags pa'i kun tu spyod pa dang yang ldan pa rnams lags/ ji
126b5(mdo sde): ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba la yang lta la mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mi gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' khams sna tshogs la yang
126b6(mdo sde): rnam par lta la/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' don yang mi mdor la gnod par yang kun tu bda' ba rnams lags/
126b7(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis nor dang ldan la thabs kyi nor med pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma zhes bgyi ba'i sgos rnam pa ma
126b8(mdo sde): mchis pa'i sgor 'jug pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub
127a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos gtan la dbab pa rnam par phye ba shin tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi
127a2(mdo sde): bya ba dang 'thun par zhugs pa'ang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis ltar mi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang
127a3(mdo sde): phyag rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad
127a4(mdo sde): kyi ston par gyur pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems
127a5(mdo sde): dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang skur pa thob pa rnams lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
127a6(mdo sde): chen po lha'i gcod pan la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten
127a7(mdo sde): la snying rtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang / lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhags pa dang / rigs kyi bu khyod da ltar gis dang / ma 'ongs pa'i
127a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams rjes su bzung ba dang / theg pa chen po 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su
127b1(mdo sde): 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rab tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das la leg so legaso
127b2(mdo sde): zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i gcod pan bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi de la 'di skad ces bka'
127b3(mdo sde): stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na spobs pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhes na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can
127b4(mdo sde): thams cad la 'od zer thogs pa med pa rnams yin/ rin po che dang 'phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong zhing yod la 'gyod pa med pa rnams yin/ chos
127b5(mdo sde): smra ba gzhan dag gis bshad pa mi zlog cing rjes su yid rangs te/ dga' ba dang mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob pas legs so zhes bya ba byin pa dang / chos mnyan
127b6(mdo sde): pa 'am/ chos 'gro ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi phyir ram/ mtshan po 'dug par bskul na/ mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / byang chub kyi
127b7(mdo sde): sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / zang zing med pa'i sems kyi sbyin pa byin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ spobs pa snga
127b8(mdo sde): tshogs kyis brgyan dang ldan pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldanan/ chos zab mo rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa
128a1(mdo sde): rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang rjes su 'thun pa dang / bdag gi rang bzhin ltar sems can thams cad
128a2(mdo sde): kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa dang / 'du byed thams cad gar yang mi 'gro/ gang nas kyang 'ongs par rab tu shes pa dang / chos thams cad na mkha'i phyag brgyas btab par mos
128a3(mdo sde): pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ chos zab mo rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu
128a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos kyi dbyangs
128a5(mdo sde): kyi sgo shin tu sbyangs pa dang / sgribs pa med pa'i sgo mngon gsum du gyur pa dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse bar shes pa dang / sems las su rung zhing ting nge 'dzin
128a6(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa
128a7(mdo sde): la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ so so ci rig par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ so so
128a8(mdo sde): yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang / sems gzung ba shes pa dang / chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i shes pa dang / bdag gis spangs pas sems can thams cad kyi sems rab
128b1(mdo sde): tu sbyangs pas rab tu shes pa ste/ rigs kyi du byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ so so ci rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no//
128b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa shes pa la 'jug par mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ shes rab
128b3(mdo sde): kyis 'dzud pa dang / ye shes chags pa med pa dang / thabs la mkhas la zhugs pas sgribs pa thams cad rgyun chad pa dang / blo shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang
128b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa shes pa la 'jug par mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
128b5(mdo sde): chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ rgyu dang bya ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa la shes brjed med par spyod pa rnams te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chad par smra
128b6(mdo sde): ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par smra ba ma yin pa dang / rgyu dang bya ba dang las kyi 'bras bu la yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa dang / chos la chos nyid du byed cing chos
128b7(mdo sde): la chos su smra ba'i/ 'di la bdag dang bdag gir mi smra ba ste/ de ltar bya ba la 'jug pas/ rgyu dang bya ba dang las kyi 'bras bu chud mi gson pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang
128b8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ rgyu dang 'bras bu dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa la brjed pa med par spyod pa rnams yin no// ris
129a1(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sbyin pa'i brgyan gyi brgyan pa rnams yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ mtshan gyis legs par
129a2(mdo sde): brgyan pa rnams yin/ dpe byed bzang pos rnam par spras pa rnams yin/ gzugs lta bas mi ngoms pa rnams yin/ lag na rin po che thogs pas longs spyod mi
129a3(mdo sde): zad pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sbyin pa'i brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
129a4(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ tshul khrims kyi brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur zhing / byang chub sems dpa'
129a5(mdo sde): kyis brgyan pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin du 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang / mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs par 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi sems
129a6(mdo sde): kyis brgyan pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad yang dag par bcad nas/ lha dang mir skye ba yongs su bzung bar gyur cing / byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa yin te/ rigs
129a7(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ tshul khrims kyis brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rigs par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos
129a8(mdo sde): bzhi dang ldan na/ bzod pa'i brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshangs pa'i skad dang sgra dbyangs lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yin/ ka la ping ka'i sgra dang
129b1(mdo sde): rnga sgra lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yin/ skye bo mang pos mthong na dga' ba dang / sdug cing yid du 'ongs pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos rnam la yi dam la brtan pa yin te/ rigs
129b2(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bzod pa'i brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang
129b3(mdo sde): ldan na/ brtson 'grus kyi brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par bya ba'i chos shes pas yi dam la brtan pa rnam yin/
129b4(mdo sde): pha rol gyi gnas med pas/ rdo rje'i lus rjes su thob pa rnams yin/ bya ba ci yod ces bya ba la mos pas gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes
129b5(mdo sde): gnyen byed pa rnams yin/ thos pa'i tshogs bsags pas mi ngoms pa'i phyir yongasu mi skyo ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang
129b6(mdo sde): ldan na/ brtson 'grus kyi brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bsam gtan gyi brgyan gyis brgyan
129b7(mdo sde): pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mi rgod pa rnams yin/ ma khengs pa rnams yin/ mu cor smra ba med pa rnams yin/ cang shes kyi sems mi 'dor ba rnams yin te/
129b8(mdo sde): rigs kyis bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ bsam gtan gyi brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
130a1(mdo sde): chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shes rab kyi brgyan gyi brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag dang sems can dang srog dang
130a2(mdo sde): gso ba dang skyes bu dang gang zag tu smra ba rnams yin/ spobs pa chags pa rnams yin/ tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba bstan pa/ shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin
130a3(mdo sde): chos thams cad la chos nyid med cing / the tshom dang bral ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ shes rab kyi brgya
130a4(mdo sde): gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
130a5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi dpung gnyen bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par bsgrub pa'i byams pa dang / sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par
130a6(mdo sde): sgrub pa'i snying rje chen po dang / chos thams cad la mngon par bsgrub pa'i dga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyir mngon par bsgrub pa'i btang
130a7(mdo sde): snyoms te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
130a8(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhi bsdud pa'i shes pa dang
130b1(mdo sde): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgrub pa'i thabs shes pa dang / rang gis sems la dbang bsgyur ba'i chos shes pa dang / sangs rgyas lnga lta ba
130b2(mdo sde): phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ mngon par shes pa rnams las mi nyams
130b3(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams yin te/ gzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang nye bar zhi
130b4(mdo sde): ba dang / phyi rol tu mi rgyu ba dang / chos thams cad la sgyu ma lta bur rab tu rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / ye shes kyi stobs can yin gyi// nyon mongs pa'i stobs can
130b5(mdo sde): ma yin ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ g.yul las rnam par brgyal ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
130b6(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ rgal na pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams yin te/ 'dod pa'i chu bo yang rab tu shes la 'dod chags dang bral ba yang mngon sum du mi byed pa dang / srid pa'i
130b7(mdo sde): chu bo yang rab tu shes la bsams bzhin du yang bskye ba dang / lta ba'i chu bo yang rab tu shes la/ lta ba'i bcing bas bcing ba yang mi 'dor ba dang / ma rig pa'i
130b8(mdo sde): chu bo rab tu shes la/ brten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rjes su 'thun par yang byed ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/
131a1(mdo sde): rgal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
131a2(mdo sde): thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston la/ ma brtags pa'i kun tu spyod pa dang yang ldan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
131a3(mdo sde): sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin shin du yongasu bsgrub pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par bsgrubs pas so so nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid shin tu brtags pa dang / mngon
131a4(mdo sde): par shes pa lngas rnam par rtse ba dang ldan pa dang / yid kyi lus mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang /
131a5(mdo sde): ldan na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston la/ ma rtags pa'i kun tu spyod pa dang ldan pa rnams yin no// /
131a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'khor ba la yang lta la/ mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mi gnas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/
131a7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / snying rje chen po'i sems dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / sngon gyi yi dam mi mdor ba de/ rigs kyi bu byang
131a8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ 'khor ba la yang lta la/ mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mi gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs bu byang chub sems
131b1(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ khams sna tshogs la yang rnams par lta la/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang g.yo ste/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can rang bzhin med
131b2(mdo sde): ba ste/ chos rang bzhin med par rtogs pa dang / chos rang bzhin med pas sems can rang bzhin med par rtogs pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pas/ sangs
131b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos rang bzhin med par mos pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa la/ som nyi med cing the tshom dang bral ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
131b4(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ khams sna tshogs la yang rnam par lta la/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
131b5(mdo sde): chos bzhi dang ldan na/ don yang mi 'dor ba la gnod par yang kun tu snang ste/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bsam pa mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa rnams
131b6(mdo sde): yin/ sbyor ba 'khor ba las 'das pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bskang bar bsam pa gnas pa rnams yin/ nyan thos dang rang
131b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas yul la yang kun tu snang ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ don yang mi 'dor la gnod par ya
131b8(mdo sde): kun tu snang ngo // rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bsod nams kyi nor dang ldan na/ thabs kyi nor med pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang
132a1(mdo sde): zhe na 'di lta ste/ rgya chen po la mos pa'i sems can 'dul ba'i phyir bsod nams kyis 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / brgya byin dang /
132a2(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyang nye bar ston pa dang / 'gro ba phal pa 'dul ba'i phyir dbul zhing dman par yang nye bar ston slong ba mthong ba na bdog pa thams cad
132a3(mdo sde): yongs su btong zhing nor med par yang 'gyur ba dang / rin po che dang ldan pa mthong na/ bsod nams kyi longs spyod zad mi shes par yang nye bar snyan pa ste/ rigs
132a4(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ bsod nams kyi nor dang ldan pa yin la/ thabs kyi nor med pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu
132a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ a zhes pa'i sgos rnam par med pa'i sgo la 'jug pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad mi
132a6(mdo sde): brtag par shes pa la sbyongs pa dang / 'du byed thams cad bzod ma nas sdug bsngal lo zhes byang chub rab tu brnyed pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med do zhes lta bar
132a7(mdo sde): 'gyur yongs su sbyong ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni bzod ma nas zhi ba zhes ye shes la 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ a zhes
132a8(mdo sde): bya ba'i sgos rnam pa med pa'i sgo la 'jug pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas chos thams cad mngon gsum du
132b1(mdo sde): gyur pa rnams yin no// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi mig shin tu rnam par dag pa rnams yin/ chos kyi mig gis snang ba thob pa rnams yin no// sangs rgyas
132b2(mdo sde): kyi spyan mngon gsum du gyur pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di
132b3(mdo sde): dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon gsum du 'gyur ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos brtan pa rnams la rnam par phye
132b4(mdo sde): ba bzhin du rnam par 'byed pa rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa sgrib pa med pa dang / bden pa bzhi rnam par
132b5(mdo sde): dgod pa shes pa dang / rton pa la gnas su shes pa dang / gzungs la mi g.yeng bar shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/
132b6(mdo sde): chos gtan la dbab pa rnams la rnam par phye ba shin tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba
132b7(mdo sde): dang 'thun par zhugs kyang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi chos mngon gsum du gyur pa dang /
132b8(mdo sde): 'jig rten sems can yang dag par bskol ba dang / rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spongs pa dang / bzod ma nas rnam par dag cing 'od gsal bzhin gyis kun/
133a1(mdo sde): nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang 'thun par zhugs
133a2(mdo sde): kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi mi gos pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ gzhan dag gis ltar mi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang
133a3(mdo sde): phyug rnams yin no// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems kyi dbang phyug dang / shes rab kyi dbang phyug dang / thabs kyi dbang phyug ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
133a4(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams sangs rgyas la lta ba yang dag par
133a5(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams chos nyan pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /
133a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang mi 'bral ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral
133a7(mdo sde): ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub seMs dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
133a8(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shin du dul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams yin no// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyis
133b1(mdo sde): rnam par grol la/ ye shes mthong ba mngon gsum du gyur pa dang / bden pa la nye bar rtags pas chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin dang / bag chags kyi 'tshams sbyor ba tham
133b2(mdo sde): cad yang dag par 'joms pa la mkhas par gyur pa dang / nyon mongs pas mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/
133b3(mdo sde): shin du dul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos rnams blangs pa med par slob dpon rnams yin
133b4(mdo sde): te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i dngos po phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la bstan zhing bsam pa
133b5(mdo sde): rgyu med pa rnams yin/ bdag gis bde ba la mi chags pa rnams yin/ gang ye shes yongasu tshol ba de yang sems can thams cad kyi mched du yin gyi/ bdag 'ba' zhig
133b6(mdo sde): gi phyir ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ chos blangs pa med par slob dpon rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
133b7(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdag gis don btang zhing gzhan gyi don byed pa nam
133b8(mdo sde): yin no// bdag gi bde ba thams cad gtong zhing sems can rnams la chos kyi bde ba sbyin pa rnams yin/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos ston pa la dal ba med pa rnams yin/ chos
134a1(mdo sde): kyi mcho bas 'tsho ba rnams yin/ zang zing gis mcho ba ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/
134a2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su
134a3(mdo sde): bskor ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ gzugs gang thob pa dang / spobs pa rgyun mi chad pa dang / sems can bsam pa shes pa 'jug pa dang / mya ngan/
134a4(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i lam du khrid cing mi phyed pa'i chos ston pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo
134a5(mdo sde): rjes su bskor ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na
134a6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ spyod pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa rnams yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las mi ldog cig/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams yin/
134a7(mdo sde): bsams bzhin du tshe dang 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yang rab tu ston la phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas kyang btab pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag
134a8(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ chos thams cad la bskur ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya las yang dag par
134b1(mdo sde): gzhol zhing sa bcur nges par byung nas/ sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas
134b2(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyi chos bzhi po bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
134b3(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug du g.yos nas/ snang ba chen pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khams khyab par gyur to// steng gi bar snang las lha bye ba phrag khrig brgya
134b4(mdo sde): stong gis lha'i klu dbyangs blangs te/ lha'i me tog man da ra ba'i char rab tu phab nas/ 'di skad ces kyi ma bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
134b5(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba phrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par bsgrub pa gang lags pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di brnyed cing bshad de rab
134b6(mdo sde): tu bstan to// bcom ldan 'das gang bzhi pa bsgrub pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / thos nas kyang mos pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog
134b7(mdo sde): pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang ston pa dang / byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba'i sems can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma
134b8(mdo sde): lags te/ de dag ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa bzhin du lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi 'ji
135a1(mdo sde): rten gyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bzhi bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha/
135a2(mdo sde): dang mi'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la
135a3(mdo sde): nabazod pa thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i gcod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
135a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa dang / gzhan dag la yang brgya cher rab tu ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag chos
135a5(mdo sde): du dang ldan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin
135a6(mdo sde): pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni chos brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ de dag yang dag
135a7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsams pa nges te/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad zhe 'gras pa'i sems med de/ shin tu byams
135a8(mdo sde): pa bsgom par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la gnas te/ snying rje chen po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / chos 'dod pa de don du gnyer
135b1(mdo sde): bar 'dod par 'gyur ba dang / thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms te mtsho chen po rgya mtsho lta bur gyur pa dang / lus dang srog 'dor zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par gyur pa dang //
135b2(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi tshogs te dge ba'i rtsa bas brten par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir byin gyis brlabs kyis smon lam gyis yang dag par 'byung
135b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba dang / 'khor gyi nang na 'jigs pa med pas/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom par 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das
135b4(mdo sde): pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni/ chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe sangs
135b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ gang dag sa phyogs mthon dman can dang / ri nag po can dang / chu dmigs dang / mtsho dang /
135b6(mdo sde): mtshe'u dang / steng ka dang / rgya mtsho chen po de dag thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sa chen po 'di thams cad kyang lag 'thil ltar mnyam par gnas par 'gyur ro//
135b7(mdo sde): chun gnas pa'i sems can rnams la yang gnod pa med par 'gyur ro// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ shing skam gang dag lo brgya lon pa/
135b8(mdo sde): de dag thams cad las kyang me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs skye bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su btud nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur te// de ma yin pa
136a1(mdo sde): shing gzhan thams cad las kyang me tog dang 'bras bu skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su btud mngon par btud phyag 'tsha
136a2(mdo sde): bar gyur to// sa chen po las kyang pad ma'i tshad shing rta'i phang lo tsam sna tshogs lta na sdug pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa dri dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ongs pa dag mngon par mthon/
136a3(mdo sde): to// snang ba chen pos kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten khams 'di khyab par gyur to// mi snang zhing ma dkrol bar gyur yang steng gi bar snang las lha'i sil snyan
136a4(mdo sde): dadang / klu dbyangs gi sgra byung ste/ grags par gyur to// ri'i rgyal po gangs ri dang / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldan las kyang lha'i me tog sna tshogs dri mi mnam pa rnams/
136a5(mdo sde): kyang dri dad byung ste/ dri des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir dri zhim po gnam par gyur to// ri'i rgyal po gangs dang / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad
136a6(mdo sde): las me tog gi char chen po babs te/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang na ba der mngon par bab nas/ sa chen po 'di me tog gi char chen po 'di
136a7(mdo sde): dag gis pus nub tsam du gyur to// me tog gi shing las me tog sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab cing / sil snyan dang klung dbyangs sna tshogs kyi sgra dag kyang 'byung ngo //
136a8(mdo sde): steng gi bar snang la rin po che sna tshogs kyi gdugs dpag tshad brgya stong phrag bcu'i tshad tsam kun tu gnas par gyur to// rin po che'i gdugs de las mu tig gi brgyan
136b1(mdo sde): phreng dang / rin po che'i dril bu er kha'i dril bu sna tshogs kyis dra ba 'phyang bar gyur to// dril bu er ka'i dra ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba/ yid dga' bar byed pa/ chags pa
136b2(mdo sde): byed pa/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di go bar byar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
136b3(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dga' bar bgyid pa/ mgu bar bgyid pa'i mtshan ma rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/
136b4(mdo sde): brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par 'gyur bar gda' ba 'di su'i lnga ltas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu 'di ni mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon
136b5(mdo sde): ba ri spos kyi ngad ldang nas/ 'khor mi 'am ci stong phrag du ma dang / 'khor dri za stong phrag du ma dang / 'khor lha stong phrag du ma dang 'ong ba de'i lnga ltas so// de skad gsungs
136b6(mdo sde): ma thag tu/ de nas skad cig de la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa sil snyan dang / klu dbyangs len pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / 'khor brgyad stong du mas bskor nas/
136b7(mdo sde): steng gi bar snang la me tog chu bo'i char 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ong te phyin nas/ 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
136b8(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
137a1(mdo sde): pi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa bdag nyid kyis pi wang gi khog pa bai dUr+ya las byas pa/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyis le sbram dang / nor bu dang
137a2(mdo sde): rin po che du mas spras pa sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su sbyangs pa blangs pa'i sil snyen brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang lhan cig tu drag par byed do// mi 'am
137a3(mdo sde): ci'i rgyal po ljon pas pi wad de blangs ma thag tu/ de nas pi wang gi sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur to// pi wang gi
137a4(mdo sde): sgra des 'dod pa na spyod pa'i rgyud kyi sgra dang / klu'i sgra dang / lha'i glu dbyangs kyi sgra rnams zil gyis mnan te mi gsal bar gyur to// de nas pi wang gi sgra des bskul bas
137a5(mdo sde): 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis lha'i rol mo bor te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas pi wang de blangs pa'i ma thog tu/
137a6(mdo sde): de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shing dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / gangs dang / spos kyi ngad ldang dang / btang bzung chen po// de ma
137a7(mdo sde): yin pa gzhan ri nag po rnams dang / rtsa dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang nags tshal ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ldeg rab tu ldeg go/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go// g.yos
137a8(mdo sde): rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab 'gul lo// 'di lta ste dper na/ chang gis ra ro ba'i mi 'khyam rab tu 'khyam/
137b1(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu 'khyab pa de bzhin du/ shing de dag thams cad dang / ri thams cad kyang 'dud rab tu 'dud do// kun tu rab tu 'dud do// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po
137b2(mdo sde): ljon pas pi wang gi khog pa bai dUr+ya las byas/ pa de blangs ma thag du/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'das pa'i nang nas/ phyir mi ldog
137b3(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dge slong dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za
137b4(mdo sde): dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang mi ma yin gyi dang /
137b5(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa'i dgra bcom pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis pi wang gi sgra thos pa dang / pi wang gi sgra des mi bzod nas/
137b6(mdo sde): rang rang gi stan las langs te/ 'dar rab tu 'dar/ kun tu rab tu 'dar ro// 'dud rab tu 'dud/ kun tu rab tu 'dud do/ gar byed do// gar rab tu gar byed do//
137b7(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu gar byed do// nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi stan la mi dga' ste/ 'gul rab tu 'gul zhing / spyod lam yang rab tu 'khrugs nas/
137b8(mdo sde): byis pa chung ngu bzhin du gar byed pa lta bur ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gcod pan gyis/ gnas brtan 'od bsrungs chen po de la 'di skad ces smra so//
138a1(mdo sde): btsun pa 'od srungs chos chen po rgas btugs 'khogs pa 'dod pa nyung ba/ cho ga shes pa/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan 'dzin pa/ lha dang
138a2(mdo sde): mi dang mi ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du gyur pa yin na/ ci'i phyir rang gi lus 'dzin par mi nus shing bsam gtan du gyur kyang / byis pa chung ngu bzhin du
138a3(mdo sde): gar byed par ston/ gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dper na/ rlung rnam par 'thor byed langs pa na/ shing dang nags ri thams cad 'di ltar rnam
138a4(mdo sde): bar bzhag pa'i stobs med/ mthu med de de dag thams cad mi 'dod bzhin g.yo rab tu g.yo// 'gul rab tu 'gul lo// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang 'di mi 'am ci'i
138a5(mdo sde): rgyal po ljon pas/ pi wang blangs pa de'i sgra thos pas bdag cag rlung rnam par 'thor byed kyis ri chen po 'das pa bzhin du/ bdag 'dzin pa mi nus par gyur to// de ci'i phyir
138a6(mdo sde): zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa 'di'i smon lam dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi khyad par ni 'di 'dra ste/ des nyan thos kyis bsod nams dang ye shes dang / gzi brjid thams
138a7(mdo sde): cad zil gyis gnon to// byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gcod pan gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dpal dang gzi/
138a8(mdo sde): brjid dang / stobs la gang gi phyir pi wang gi sgra des bskal ba 'am bskyod par mi nus pas/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
138b1(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems mi bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang nye ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams kyi stobs dang / gzi brjid de ni pi wang gi sgra des zil gyis gdon to// gang /
138b2(mdo sde): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi stobs dang / gzi brjid de la ni zil gyis gnon par mi nus pa ltos/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ pi wang gi
138b3(mdo sde): sgra de sgrogs pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyis brlabs kyi pi wang de dang sil snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong gis de las
138b4(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 'byung ngo // tha ma 'bring dang de bzhin mchog rnams kyi// chos rnams thams cad mnyam zhing chos rnams dben// zhi ba stong pa mi 'gyur 'khrug pa
138b5(mdo sde): med/ bzod nas dag ste dri med na mkha' bzhin// gang dag da ltar gyi ngang 'das pa yi// sems can kun mnyam 'di la sems can med// sems can skad du sgra
138b6(mdo sde): rnams 'byung ba dang // chos kyi sgra rnams mtshungs te de yang med// zhing rnams thams cad shing mnyam zhing min te// bar snang dang ni mtshungs zhing mnyam par snang /
138b7(mdo sde): 'phel ba ma yin mi zad ma skyes te// gsog gsob na mkha'i lta bur rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas kun mnyam sangs rgyas min// chos dbyings nges par 'dres pa med
138b8(mdo sde): pa ste// tshul khrims shes rnam grol mnyam// mnyam nyid gcig ste mtshan mnyam mnyam nyid med// nyon mongs thams cad nyon mongs ma yin grol// rtog dang /
139a1(mdo sde): rtog pa kun rtog rnam par rtog/ nang na rgyu ba ma yin phyi rol min// 'du shes 'dud pa phyin ci log las gyur// rnam par rtog pas chos dbyings
139a2(mdo sde): ming btags pa// ming de nyid kyang gzhan min de bzhin min// ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin rje rtogs pa/ de dag rtag tu mi rtog 'jig rten spyod// gang rnams 'das pa'i
139a3(mdo sde): bde gshegs grangs med pa/ de dag gis ni gsungs chos mang po// bzod nas zad cing dengs dang 'jigs las dbyen// de dag yul dang phyogs su 'gro ba min// chos 'di dag
139a4(mdo sde): ni yi ge las byung ste// yi ge dag ni zad cing zad pa'i chos// yi ge zad pa'i chos nyid shes pas na// chos rnams kun la rnam par rtog mi byed// sems kyi rgyud ni rgyud mnyam
139a5(mdo sde): rgyud ma yin/ rang bzhin gzhan dang gzhan de chags pa med// sems dang sems byung chos mtha' med shes pas// 'phags rnams ni mnyam pa'i chos la 'jug/ mtha'
139a6(mdo sde): dang mtha' med kun chad rnam par chad// thog ma tha ma bar ma mnyam par gyur// dus gsum dag gis dbyen par shes pa mnyam// shes pa de yang mtha' yod ma yin no//
139a7(mdo sde): skye bo rtag tu ming dang gzugs la chags// mtha' dang mtha' med lta bar gos pa rnams// rgyu dang rkyen las byung bar shes pas na// bdag dang sems can rnam par rtog ma yin//
139a8(mdo sde): bdag las ldang ba rtag tu ldang ma yin// chos de kun ni blang ba med pa ste// gang dag ldang dang ldan pa med rtogs pa// de dag bzod pa mnyam nyid rjes su mthong // chos kun
139b1(mdo sde): rtag tu bdag med rang bzhin te// sprin dang klog dang na mkha' lta bur bsgom// bdag dang sems can rtag tu rang bzhin stong // 'di ni gzugs kyi phyag rgyar 'jug pa yin/ mtshan
139b2(mdo sde): nyid cig te mtshan mnyam med par/ gang gis thar pa'i sgo gsum rnams rtogs nas// thub pa med pa'i chos rnams ston byed kyang // chos la yongs su rtog pa mi byed do//
139b3(mdo sde): tha ma 'bring dang de bzhin mchog rnams kyi// chos 'di dag ni yi ge rnams kyis brjod// yi ge rnams las rnam par rtog mi byed// de lta bur ni don rnams bshad pa yi// don
139b4(mdo sde): dang tshig 'bru gnyis la mi 'jug ste// gnyis med don gyi rtag tu dgra dang bral// gang gis mtha' 'di dben par shes gyur pa// de'i sngon gyi mtha' ni nye bar 'chang // 'gro
139b5(mdo sde): ba'i don du 'dus byas rnams la spyod// yang dag mtha' ni rtag tu mtha' med shes// de'i byams dang snying rje shin tu dag/ gang gis byams dang snying rje rnam dag pa// sdug
139b6(mdo sde): bsngal dang ni bde ba mtshungs mnyam sbyor// rgod dang khyengs pa ma yin rtag pa yi// skyes bu mchog de don gyi cho ga shes// chos kyi tshul 'di zhi gang dbyen pa ste// 'chang pa
139b7(mdo sde): na ni dga' ba thob par 'gyur// nam yang 'phel ba med cing 'bri ba med// chos 'di nyid ni ngar 'dzin cing zhi// bar snang lam gyi sgra ni bzung med de// gang gis bshad pa/
139b8(mdo sde): med kyang grags par 'gyur// gang gis bshad dang gang la bshad pa rnams// de dag thams cad brdzun pa yang ma brla// tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di bshad
140a1(mdo sde): pa na// byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i
140a2(mdo sde): gcod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshigs su bcad bkum pa 'di lta bu 'di dag ga las byung // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
140a3(mdo sde): bu khyod kyis mI ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la dris shig dang / des de'i lan glon par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gcod pan gyis mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa li 'di
140a4(mdo sde): skad ces smras so// mi 'am ci'i bdag po tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di dag ga las byung / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad kyi skad gang las 'byung ba
140a5(mdo sde): las byung ngo // smras pa mi 'am ci'i bdag po sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad la ga las 'byung / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad sgra skad thams cad ni nam mkha'
140a6(mdo sde): las 'byung / smras pa/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sems can rnams kyi sgra skad khong pa'i nang nas mi 'byung ngam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di snyam du sems/ sems can thams
140a7(mdo sde): cad kyi sgra skad ni sa'i nang gi khong pa nas 'byung ngam/ 'on te sems las 'byung / smras pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po lus las kyang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus ni ben
140a8(mdo sde): po g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rtsa dang bong ba dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang mig yor lta bu'o// sems ni gzugs med pa/ stan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/
140b1(mdo sde): rnam par rig pa med pa ste/ sgyu ma lta bu'o// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu lus dang sems ma gtogs par gzhan gang nas sgra 'byung bar 'gyur// smras pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag/
140b2(mdo sde): po sems can rnams kyi sgra ni yid la byed pa las 'byung ba las btags so// smras pa gal te na mkha' med na sgrag las 'byung / smras pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po nam
140b3(mdo sde): mkha' ma gtogs par gzhan gang nas sgra 'byung bar 'gyur smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rnam grangs 'dis sgra'i tha snyad gang ji snyed 'byung ba de dag thams cad ni nam
140b4(mdo sde): mkha' las 'byung bar rig par bya'o// na mkha'i ngo bo nyid ni sgra ste/ sgra ni rnam par rig ma thag tu 'gag go/ 'gag nas mkha'i ngo bo nyid yang dag par gnas so// de'i
140b5(mdo sde): phyir chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ste/ rnam par rig pa med de/ rnam par shes par bya ba med kyis/ sgra dang sgra'i brdas brjod do// brjod pa de yang mi
140b6(mdo sde): rnyed do// gang sgras brjod pa'i 'di 'dra bar rab tu shes pa 'di ni chos gang la yang mngon par ma chags so// gang mngon par mi chags pa de rnam par mi 'phro'o// gang rnam par/
140b7(mdo sde): mi 'phro ba de ni mi 'khor ro// gang mi 'khor ba de ni mi phyed pa'o// gang mi phyed pa de ni mi skye'o// gang mi skye ba de ni 'jig par 'dod do// gang mi 'jigs pa de dang pa'o//
140b8(mdo sde): grang dri ma med pa de 'od gsal ba de sems kyi rang bzhin no// sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de 'jug pa'o// gang 'jug pa de mtshan ma thams cad gnon pa'o// gang
141a1(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid med pa'o/
141a2(mdo sde): mtshan ma thams cad gnon pa de skyon med pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o// gang bzod pa thob des thams cad bzod de/ de stong par yang
141a3(mdo sde): bzod do// de gang zag du yang bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zag las stong pa gzhan ma yin te/ gang zag nyid stong pa'o// de mtshan mar yang mi bzod do// de smon
141a4(mdo sde): par yang bzod do// smon pa med par yang bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ smon lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan smon pa med pa'o// de sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongasu
141a5(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das par yang bzod// de sems can rnams 'chi 'pho dang skye bor bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'chi 'pho dang skye ba ni sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid do// rigs kyi bu de
141a6(mdo sde): ltar mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'gag pa med pa ste/ chos thams cad 'gal ba med pa yin no// dag bzod pa'i rjes su 'gro ba yang sems
141a7(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro bas kyang 'gro/ bdag bzod pa'i rjes su 'gro yang sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro bas kyang 'gro ste/ 'ong ba yang med 'gro ba yang
141a8(mdo sde): med do// chos thams cad chos dbyings la gnas par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ji ltar chos kyi dbyings gnas pa de ltar sems can thams cad
141a9(mdo sde): gnas te/ gang gis gnas de thob gnas/ med pa'i tshul gyis rjes su thob pa de sgra'i brdas tha snyad kyi sgra nye bar bzung nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa
141b1(mdo sde): zhes bya'o// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni gang gis kyang brjod pa 'am/ bstan par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don de ni brjod du med pa/ sgra med pa bshad du
141b2(mdo sde): med pa/ yin yang brjod du med pa'i don brjod pas bstan pas na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
141b3(mdo sde): dpa' lha'i gcod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kye ma mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'di ji tsam du chos zab mo la bzod pa snyan par spobs pa dang /
141b4(mdo sde): 'di lta bur rgya che ba'i yul la nye bar spyod cing / longs spyod pas 'byor pa dang / chos ston pas zab mo'i bzod pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom
141b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun na des 'di
141b6(mdo sde): spobs pa 'di lta bur grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khams kyis
141b7(mdo sde): skar ma'i gzugs ji snyed pa dag ni/ bgrang ba'i tshul gyis zad par nus kyi// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon po 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig
141b8(mdo sde): la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub btsal ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi gnan tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa'i
142a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag ni bzung bar mi nus te/ des na 'di'i spobs pa 'di 'dra'o//
142a2(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gcod pan gyis/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la 'di skad ces smras so// mi 'am ci'i bdag po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
142a3(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po de lta bu sdoms pas/ ci bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
142a4(mdo sde): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 'am/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag pa bsgrub pa na/
142a5(mdo sde): gang dag gis nam du yang ngoms par mi 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mi ngoms pa bcu gnyis kyi 'di dag ste/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ de bzhin
142a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim 'gro bya bas mi ngoms pa dang / chos bya bas mi ngoms pa dang / dam chos yongasasu bzungs pas mi ngoms pa dang / pha rol tu phyin
142a7(mdo sde): bas thams cad yongasu bskang bas mi ngoms pa dang / ye shes mngon par rab tu dang zhing yongs su smin par bya bas mi ngoms pa dang / chos nges par sems shing
142a8(mdo sde): tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor bas mi ngos pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su btsal bas mi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad la
142b1(mdo sde): yang dag par sgrub pas mi ngoms pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrub pa na/ gang dag gis rnam du yang ngoms
142b2(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mi ngoms pa bcu gnyis te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa la
142b3(mdo sde): yongs su mi ngoms pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
142b4(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rin po che 'byung gnas zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de la rten na/ rin po che'i khyad par gyi chos thams
142b5(mdo sde): cad thob par 'gyur ro// zhes bgyi bzhagi bdag gis thos na/ bcom ldan 'das gang thos pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yon tan rin po che'i khyad par
142b6(mdo sde): gyi chos thob par 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin rin po che'i 'byung gnas de/ de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bshad du gsol/
142b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po
142b8(mdo sde): che'i 'byung gnas ngas khyod la bshad do// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa
143a1(mdo sde): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ci 'am ci'i bdag po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas
143a2(mdo sde): dkon mchog rgyun mi chad pa dang / chos dkon mchog rgyun mi chad pa dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rgyun mi chad pa'i phyir// sems bskyes pa rin po che brgyad bcu po 'di
143a3(mdo sde): dag la 'jug go// brgyad bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che mi 'byed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sems rin po che mi gtong ba
143a4(mdo sde): dang / dge ba thams cad kyi sems rin po che yongasu mi 'dor ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la sbyor ba'i sems rin po che yongs su mi 'dor ba dang / yi dam la brtan
143a5(mdo sde): pa'i sems rin po che mi 'dor ba dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su btong ba'i seMs rin po che byang chub tu bsngo bas rnam par smin pa la mi reg pa'i sems rin po che la
143a6(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa gsum rnam par spongs pas/ lus kyi brgyan gyi sems rin po che dang / ngag gi skyon rnam pa bzhi rnam par spongs pas/ ngag gi
143a7(mdo sde): sems kyi rgyan rin po che dang / brnab sems gnod sems dang / log par lta ba rnam par lta bas sems kyi brgyan gyi sems rin po che dang / tshul khrims ma nyams
143a8(mdo sde): shing skyon med de/ 'dren pa ma yin zhing 'thun tshags ma yin pas/ tshul khrims kyi sems rin po che dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms shing khrong
143b1(mdo sde): ba med pa'i sems rin po che dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyes par byas pa la ci mi snyam pas/ bzod pa dang nges pa'i sems rin po che dang / byang chub kyi yan
143b2(mdo sde): lag lta bas lus dang srog la mi lta ba'i sems rin po che dang / mtho dpon med pas rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba'i sems rin po che dang /
143b3(mdo sde): zhum pa med pas brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha'i sems rin po che dang / lhod pa med pas rtsom pa thams cad nyams 'go tu chud par byed pa'i sems rin po che dang /
143b4(mdo sde): byang chub kyi lam gyi tshogs sogs pas dran pa dang blo gros dang rtogs pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / mos pa brjed pa med pa'i sems rin po che dang / sems dbang
143b5(mdo sde): byed pas bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug bskyed pa'i sems rin po che dang / dam pa'i chos la stsogs pas chos
143b6(mdo sde): yongs su tshol ba'i sems rin po che dang / 'jigs pa med cing spobs pas thos pa'i 'dzin pa'i sems rin po che dang / sdig pa 'dod pa med pas zang zing med par chos
143b7(mdo sde): ston pa'i sems rin po che dang / chags pa'i sems med pas/ slob dpon chos la dpe khyed byed pa med pa'i sems rin po che dang / nan tan snying por byed pas tshul
143b8(mdo sde): bzhin yid la byed pa'i sems rin po che dang / de ltar byed pas ji ltar thob pa chos rnams la nan tan byed pa'i sems rin po che dang / gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pas/
144a1(mdo sde): shes rab kyis so sor rtogs pa'i sems rin po che dang / sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab pas/ byams pa chen po'i sems
144a2(mdo sde): rin po che dang / sems can thams cad la lta bas snying rje chen po'i sems rin po che dang / chos kun dga' la mos pas dga' ba chen po'i sems rin po che dang / chos
144a3(mdo sde): thams cad nges par sems pas btang bsnyoms chen po'i sems rin po che dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba la sogs pas/ 'khor ba na mi skyo ba'i sems rin po che dang / bdag
144a4(mdo sde): bde ba mi chags pas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i sems rin po che dang / chos 'dzin pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po'i sems rin po che dang / thams cad du rnam
144a5(mdo sde): par 'phral pas/ mngon par shes pa'i sems rin po che dang / ma thos pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa'i sems rin po che dang /
144a6(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs pas sdig pa'i grogs po spongs pa'i sems rin po che dang / tha dad pa med pas sems can thams cad la spor ba mnyam pa'i sems
144a7(mdo sde): rin po che dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa 'jug pas/ sems can thams cad kyi nad yongs su zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad yang dag par sbyong ba'i
144a8(mdo sde): sems rin po che dang / ye shes kyi che ba nyid du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ ma spangs pa rnams la mi brnyes pa'i sems rin po che dang / sems can thams cad bsdud
144a9(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad yongs su shes pa'i sems rin po che dang /
144b1(mdo sde): pas/ nga rgyal med pa'i sems rin po che dang / 'chos pa med pas g.yo dang sgra med pa'i sems rin po che dang / dam pa'i chos yun rings du gnas par byed pas/ chos la/
144b2(mdo sde): dga' ba'i sems rin po che dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la byas pa gzo bas// dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems rin po che dang / 'dza' ba brtan pa'i phyir
144b3(mdo sde): byas pa shes shing / byas pa gzo ba'i sems rin po che dang / ltos pa med pas lan du phan 'dogs pa mi re ba'i sems rin po che dang / dkar po phyogs srung bas dgen
144b4(mdo sde): pa la dga' ba'i sems rin po che dang / las byas pa chung mi gson pas rtag tu rab tu 'byung ba'i sems rin po che dang / sdoms pa'i spyod pa stsogs pa/ 'phags pa'i
144b5(mdo sde): rigs la dga' ba'i sems rin po che dang / sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pas sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang / byad spangs pa'i sems rin po che dang / shes
144b6(mdo sde): rab kyis mi ngoms pas 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa'i sems rin po che dang / lus dang sems dben pa spong zhing dben pa'i sems rin po che dang / mtshan dang dpe
144b7(mdo sde): byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis mi ngoms pa'i sems rin po che dang / sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pa'i phyir/
144b8(mdo sde): ye shes yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa'i sems rin po che dang / sangs rgyas la lta ba dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang /
145a1(mdo sde): chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir chos rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la gzhol ba'i phyir/
145a2(mdo sde): dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang / byang chub kyi sems las mi g.yo ba'i phyir/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang / nyon mongs pa thams
145a3(mdo sde): cad yongs su 'dor bas/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang / skye ba cig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rjes su dran pa'i phyir/ lha rjes su dran pa'i
145a4(mdo sde): sems rin po che dang / mtshungs par byed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang / don thams cad rtogs pas so so yang dag par rig
145a5(mdo sde): pa'i sems rin po che dang / chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med pas chos so so yang dag par rig pa'i sems rin po che dang / sems can gyi tshig thams cad rtogs pas nges pa'i
145a6(mdo sde): tshig so so yang dag par rig pa'i sems rin po che dang / tshig 'bru'i rang bzhin rjes su rtogs spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'i sems rin po che dang / rnam par shes pa
145a7(mdo sde): sgyu ma lta bur yongasu shes pa'i tshul gis ye shes la ston pa'i sems rin po che dang / dran pa'i don gyi mdo sde'i las dang / bya ba dang 'gal bas nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la
145a8(mdo sde): ston pa'i sems rin po che dang / gang zag gi rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pas chos la ston pa'i sems ring po che dang / khams gsum thams cad la mngon par ma zhen pas/
145b1(mdo sde): 'jigs pa'i phyir 'du byed thams cad la mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal bas so sor rtog pa'i sems rin po che dang / sems can thams cad la bdag med pas chos/
145b2(mdo sde): thams cad la bdag med par so sor rtogs pa'i sems rin po che dang / 'dod pa'i khams las shin du 'das pas mi gtsang bar so sor rtog pa'i sems rin po che dang /
145b3(mdo sde): shin du zhi zhing nye bar zhi bas mya ngan las 'das pa la zhi bar so sor rtog pa'i sems rin po che dang / bdud ce'i sgo la yang dag par gzhol bas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
145b4(mdo sde): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / dmon pa med pa la mos pa'i sems rin po che dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas/ chos thams cad la ma skyes pa dang / ma byung
145b5(mdo sde): bar mos pa'i sems rin po che dang / lta ba thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pas/ chos thams cad la sgyu ma dang smig sgyu dang / chu zla dang / mig yor dang / rmi lam lta
145b6(mdo sde): bur yang dag par gzhol ba'i sems rin po che dang / rtag pa dang chad pa dang bral bas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang 'thun pa'i sems rin po che dang / gnyis dang bral
145b7(mdo sde): bar mthar lta ba thams cad sel ba'i sems rin po che dang / theg pa cig tu khong du chud pas gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i sems rin po che dang / skyon med pa la/
145b8(mdo sde): 'jug pas spyod pa thams cad las sems can thams cad las ldog pa'i sems rin po che dang / chos thams cad las mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir yang dag pa bskyon med pa la so
146a1(mdo sde): sor rtog pa'i sems rin po che dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skye ba'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag par/
146a2(mdo sde): sgrub pa'i sems rin po che ste/ 'di dag ni chos rin po che brgyad bcu'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po de ltar gang chos brgyad bcu po 'di dag la 'jug pa dang / thob pa
146a3(mdo sde): dang nan tan byed pa de ni de'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che'i 'byung gnas zhes bya'o// chos 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang gi tshe dkon
146a4(mdo sde): mchog 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par pA de'i tshe/ des gang la dbang thob par gyur pa 'di rin po che 'di 'jig rten 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa de
146a5(mdo sde): gang yang med do// mi 'am ci'i bdag po de la 'jig rten gi rin po che ni gang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rin po che ni gang zhe na/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po des 'jig
146a6(mdo sde): rten gyi rin po che ni 'di lta ste/ lha dang mi rnams kyi che ba nyid dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i che ba nyid dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i che ba nyid dang / tshong dpon dang /
146a7(mdo sde): khyim bdag dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i che ba nyid do// de de ltar lha dang mi rnams kyi che ba nyid thob kyang rgyags pa mi bskyed/ bag
146a8(mdo sde): med pa mi bskyed do// de bag yod par gyur pas/ byang chub bsgrub par byed pa'i chos yang dag par bsgrub te/ 'di ni rin po che zhes bya'o// de la 'jig rten
146b1(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i rin po che gang zhes na 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rin po che'o// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rin po che gang zhe na/ chos gang
146b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten las sgrol ba'o// 'jig rten las sgrol ba'i chos gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab te/ shes rab kyi 'jig
146b3(mdo sde): pa las sgrol ba'o// shes rab rin po ches ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad bsdus te/ shes rab ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams
146b4(mdo sde): cad kyi gtso bo yin no// mi 'am ci'i bdag po 'di lta ste dper na/ klung thams cad kyi gtso bo ni ba rgya mtsho chen po'o// ri thams cad kyi gtso bo ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab
146b5(mdo sde): po// skar ma thams cad kyi gtso bo ni zla ba'o// snang ba thams kyi gtso bo ni nyi ma'o// ri dgas thams cad kyi gtso bo na seng ge'o// skye dgu thams cad kyi
146b6(mdo sde): klagatso bo ni seng ge'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa thams cad kyi gtso bo ni brgya byin no// tshangs pa'i dbang du bya ba rnams kyi gtso bo ni tshangs pa chen po'o// mi 'am
146b7(mdo sde): ci'i bdag po de bzhin du/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad gtso bo ni shes rab ste/ de'i phyir shes rab ni chos thams cad kyi rgyal po zhes bya'o//
146b8(mdo sde): mu stegs las bsgral ba'i phyir bde bar 'gro bas/ lam mo// nyon mongs pa'i mun pa sel ba'i phyir sgron ma'o// g.yul las sgrol ba'i phyir dpa' bo'o//
147a1(mdo sde): sman rab tu sbyar ba'i phyir sman pa'o// bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas pa'i phyir slob dpon no// chos thams cad phigs pa'i phyir mda'o// /
147a2(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa'i phyir ral gri'o// nyon mongs pa'i tshang tshing 'bral ba'i phyir mthong ba shol lo// mnyam pa'i phyir mi 'gal ba'o// 'thab mo med
147a3(mdo sde): pa'i phyir brtsod pa med pa'o// 'byung ba med pa'i phyir mi 'gag pa'o// bden pa'i don rnams yongs su shes pa mthar thug pa'i phyir mi 'khrug pa'o// dran pa nye bar/
147a4(mdo sde): bzhog pa'i phyir dran pa'o// yang dag par spongs pa rnams la mnyam pa nyid do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bskyed pa'o// dbang po rnams sbed pa'o// stobs rnams
147a5(mdo sde): kyi mi rdzi ba'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rjes su rtogs pa'o// lam ston pa'o// zhi gnas zhi bar byed pa'o// lhag mthong rig par byed pa'o// rab rib
