147a6(mdo sde): med pa'i phyir snang ba'o// chos kyi snang ba mun pa sel ba'o// rdul dang bral ba'i phyir rdul med pa'o// bsdus thabs dang bral ba'i phyir mtho bar sems pa med
147a7(mdo sde): pa'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' las rab tu 'das pa'i phyir kun tu mthong bar byed pa'o// byi nang dang bral ba'i phyir yul med pa'o// lta bar byas pa med pa'i phyir stong
147a8(mdo sde): khas bsgrol ba'o// rnam par rtog pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// khams gsum pa las rnam par 'das pa'i phyir mtsha
147b1(mdo sde): smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do// mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir mtshan nyid cig pa'o// mtshungs pa med pa'i phyir na mkha'i mtshan nyid do// bdud kyi las dang bral ba'i phyir gso
147b2(mdo sde): ba dang brloms sems 'jog pa'o// mi rtog pa'i sbyin pa'o// mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims so// rab tu gnas pa'i bzod pa'o// blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i
147b3(mdo sde): brtson 'grus so// sgro btags pa med pa'i bsam gtan no// rnam par rig par byed pa ma yin pa'i sgo'o// thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa'o// thabs dang 'brel pa'o//
147b4(mdo sde): sems can bdag med par yang dag par bzhol ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'o// bya ba med pa'o// bya ba dang bral ba ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po 'di ni shes rab rin
147b5(mdo sde): po che'o// shes rab rin po che ni ting nge 'dzin rin po che 'byung gnas thob pa'i byang chub sems dpas thob pa'o/ 'di thob pa la rin po che thams cad yang dag par 'du ba
147b6(mdo sde): yin no// mi 'am ci'i bdag po 'di lta ste dper na/ chu bo thams cad kyi sgro ni rgya mtsho chen po ste/ rin po che thams cad stsogs pa/ rin po che thams cad yang dag par 'du
147b7(mdo sde): ba ste/ de la rin po che thams cad 'byung ngo // mi 'am ci'i bdag po de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin rin po che 'byung gnas thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang rin po che thams cad
147b8(mdo sde): kyi sgo yin te/ chos rin po che thams cad stsogs pa/ rin po che thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'o// ting nge 'dzin rin po che 'byung gnas las dkon mchog gsum 'byung ste/
148a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog go// de nas ting nge 'dzin rin po che'i 'byung gnas ni rin/
148a2(mdo sde): po che thams cad stsogs pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gcod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i
148a3(mdo sde): rgyal po ljon pa ting nge 'dzin rin po che 'byung gnas 'di thob lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de mi 'am ci'i rgyal po la dris
148a4(mdo sde): shig dang / de khyod la ston par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gcod pan gyis/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la 'di skad ces smras so// mi 'am ci'i bdag
148a5(mdo sde): po khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin dkon mchog 'byung gnas 'di thob bam/ smras pa rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin thob pa 'am/ dmigs par so sor nye bar gnas pa ma yino// /
148a6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin 'di ni sus kyang mi thob po// ting nge 'dzin 'di ni gzugs su bgrang ba 'am/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par
148a7(mdo sde): bgrang ba ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin ni gzugs su bgrang ba ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin 'di ni mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam dang
148a8(mdo sde): shes pa'i gzung ba ma yin/ skye ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin/ 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin/ gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin/ rgyun chad pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin//
148b1(mdo sde): mtshan nyid cig ma yin/ rnam par mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin/ mtshan nyid ma yin/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba ma yin/ mtshan nyid med pa yang ma yin te/ brjod/
148b2(mdo sde): par bya ba ma yin no// ti nge 'dzin 'di ni yongs su rtogs par nus te/ kun tu rtogs par ma yin/ rnam par rtogs par ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te
148b3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin nyid yongs su rtogs pa 'am/ rnam par rtogs par 'gyur na ni/ brtag pa'i gzhi nyid du 'gyur gyi/ ting nge 'dzin ma yin ni/ rigs kyi bu ting nge
148b4(mdo sde): 'dzin ces bya ba ni/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de dang / kho bo mnyam mo// de dang sems can
148b5(mdo sde): thams cad mnyam mo// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin de dang / sems can thams cad mnyam mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad ni stong pa ste//
148b6(mdo sde): stong pa'i mtshan nyid ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'i// sems can thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa ste/ mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ ting nge 'dzin 'di'o// sems ca
148b7(mdo sde): thams cad ni smon pa med pa ste/ smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'o// sems can thams cad ni dben pa ste/ dben pa'i mtshan nyid ni ting nge 'dzin
148b8(mdo sde): 'di'o// sems can thams cad ni bdag med pa ste/ bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'di'o// de ni lus dang ngag dang sems kyis reg par mi nus so// gapal la
149a1(mdo sde): dag chos la reg par byed pa dang / mnyam par byed pa dang / mngon par mnyam par byed pa de dag thams cad ni legs par
149a2(mdo sde): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la nga rgyal can du ston to// de na bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gcod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
149a3(mdo sde): 'das mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i spyod pa bag mchis pa 'di lta bu dang / chos la spobs pa 'di lta bu ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
149a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu bya ba thams cad kyang kun tu ston la/ bya ba thams cad kyis kyang mi gso ba 'di ni thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa'o// /
149a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ldan pa 'dis rgyun gyi sgra dang / klu'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / pheg sngob pa byas tshul 'dis// mi 'am ci'i bye brag bdun bla na med
149a6(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su smin par byas so// rang gi 'khor gyi srogs chags brgyad khri bzhi stong yang byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so//
149a7(mdo sde): shes rab dang thabs kyi ye shes 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gang dang gang gi phyir/ 'khor gyi che ba nyid thob pa/ de dang de'i tshe sems can grangs med
149a8(mdo sde): kha dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ gzhi rgyu med par mi 'bar ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
149b1(mdo sde): chen po dben pa gang na gnas pa yang sems can yongs su smin par yang mi 'bar ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyu yod pa na me 'bar ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin
149b2(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye bo phal po che'i nang na/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba 'bar ro// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rnam grangs 'dis/
149b3(mdo sde): 'di ltar byang chub ji lta ji lta bur yul dang 'khor chen po 'byor par gyur pa/ de ltar de lta bur sems can dpag tu med yongs su smin par byed par rig par bya'o//
149b4(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gcod pan gyi 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mi 'am ci'i/
149b5(mdo sde): rgyal po ljon pas/ rgyud kyi sgra dang / klu'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / pheg spobs pa bgyis pas/ sems can yongs su smin par byed/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
149b6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu mi 'am ci dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / glu dang rol mo dang dbyangs sgra la mos pa rnams la/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/
149b7(mdo sde): gang gi tshe pi wang gyi sgra zos par byed cing sil snyad dang glu dbyangs sbyor ba de na/ mi 'am ci dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag dga' ba dang / rab tu mgu ba
149b8(mdo sde): chen po 'thob bo// de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / rab tu mgu bathob nas/ rgyud kyi sgra dang / sil snyan gyi sna dang / klu dbyangs kyi sgra de dag las sangs rgyas
150a1(mdo sde): kyi sgra 'byung ngo // chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra 'byung ngo // byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang stobs kyi sgra
150a2(mdo sde): dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang /
150a3(mdo sde): zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par/ 'jug pa'i sgra 'byung ngo // mi rtag pa dang / sdug
150a4(mdo sde): bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba'i sgra 'byung ngo // stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med/ smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / skye ba
150a5(mdo sde): med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i sgra 'byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi snam grangs dang / gzung dang rdo rje'i tshig dang /
150a6(mdo sde): 'khor gsum yongs su spong ba'i sgra 'byung ngo // phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i sgra dang / chos thams cad la rnam par nges pa'i rgyal po'i
150a7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / chos thams cad yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin sgra dang / chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / rnam par
150a8(mdo sde): bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / rin po che 'byung gnas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / rin chen brtsegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / nyon mongs pa spongs pa'i
150b1(mdo sde): na po rgyal mtshan ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra da /
150b2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / dga' byed kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / pad ma bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / na ma'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / thams ca
150b3(mdo sde): rjes su 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / pa dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / khyad par can gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / rnam par rgyal bar dbang
150b4(mdo sde): byed ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / rgyun gyi rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang
150b5(mdo sde): rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / sa 'dzin ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / lhun po sgron pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / rin chen mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
150b6(mdo sde): sems la dbang byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / spyod pa thams cad kyi yul las nges
150b7(mdo sde): par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / zab po sbed par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / spobs pa sna tshogs ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / ltar mi mthong ba'i ting
150b8(mdo sde): nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / mngon par shes pa la thams cad
150b9(mdo sde): las nges par 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / bdud kyi 'khor 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / gzugs thams cad kun tu ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
151a1(mdo sde): sgra thams cad 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / lus thams cad rnam par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / spyod pa thams
151a2(mdo sde): cad la dbang byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / shes rab sgron ma ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / lag na sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / byang chub mngon gsum snang byed
151a3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / so so yang dag par rig pa 'jug pa ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra 'byu //
151a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di ltar gyad kyi sgra dang / sil snyan gi sgra/ glu dbyangs gi sgra de dag las/ chos kyi sgra 'di lta bu 'di dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra 'byung ngo // sgra de dag gis
151a5(mdo sde): sems can de dag thams cad yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ ngo mtshar pad du byung ba'i
151a6(mdo sde): chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i yin no// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i yon tan bsngags pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus thams cad dang ldan pa'i
151a7(mdo sde): 'khor gyi/ lag par lha'i me tog man da ra ba'i phur pa byung nas/ de dag gis me tog gi phur ma de dag mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ byin gyis brlabs ji lta bus
151a8(mdo sde): me tog de dag lag pa g.yas par brlangs te/ me tog cig kyang sa la mi ltung ba de lta bus byin gyis brlabs nas/ me tog blangs pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la
151b1(mdo sde): mngon par gtor to// de nas me tog de dag gtor ma thag tu/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ skad cig de la steng gi 'jig rten gyi khams me tog rin po che'i gdugs
151b2(mdo sde): gcig gis khyebs par gyur to// me tog rin po che'i gdugs de las/ bu tig gi rgyan 'brengs bye ba phrag khrig brgya phrag stong rab tu 'byung ngo // mu tig gi rgyan phreng
151b3(mdo sde): gyi mu tig gi 'bru de thams cad las kyang 'od zer bye ba phrag khrig brgya stong du pa byung ngo // 'od zer rnams kyi rtse mo las kyang pad+ma sna tshogs lta na sdug/ kha dog dang ldan
151b4(mdo sde): pa/ dri dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba dag byung bar gyur to// pad+ma thams cad la yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku/ ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs
151b5(mdo sde): pa'i sku/ dkyil mo dkrungs bcas shing bzhugs par kun tu snang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis kyang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po la
151b6(mdo sde): legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis sems can mang po yongs su smin par byas pa'i phyir/ gang yul las rnam par grol ba yang yul thams
151b7(mdo sde): cad kyang stong / 'khor ba las grol yang / bsam bzhin du srid par skye ba kun tu ston/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i skyon med pa thob kyang / khams gsum na nye bar
151b8(mdo sde): spyod pa 'di lta bu ni/ byang chub sems dpa' bya ba yin te/ leg so legs so// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'di skad du sems te/ bdag gi de bzhin
151b9(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par byas
152a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbul ba/ rin po che'i gdugs gzhan dag byin gyis brlab po snyam mo// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa
152a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe/ rin po che'i gdugs bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// mi 'ab ci'i rgyal po ljon pa rin po che'i gdugs bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin
152a3(mdo sde): la snyoms par bzhugs ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbu'i drang zad kyi steng na/ rin po che gdugs rnams gnas par kun tu snang ngo // 'khor de
152a4(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyi lag pa g.yas pa nas kyang rin po che'i gdugs rnams byung bar gyur to// de dag gis rin po che'i gdugs de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
152a5(mdo sde): dag la mngon par bkab po// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
152a6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / bcas par bshos la spyan drangs te/ de ltar bcom ldan
152a7(mdo sde): 'das 'khor dang bcas par ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang du bdag gi gnas su gshegs par gsol lo// de ltar na bdag gi gnas yongs su spyod par 'gyur ro//
152a8(mdo sde): lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs tshad med pa la phan btags par
152b1(mdo sde): yang 'gyur ro// de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / yongs su spyad par bya bar spro bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir de dag gi yun ring po'i don dang /
152b2(mdo sde): phan pa dang / grub pa dang / bde ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa thob par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ bcom ldan 'das
152b3(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs rtse ba dang /
152b4(mdo sde): sems can tshad ma mchis pa dge rtswa bi slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang
152b5(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / thabs gcig tu ri spos kyi ngad ldang gi ngos la/ bdag gi gnas su dgung bdun zhig bzhags par bdag la snang bar mdzad du
152b6(mdo sde): gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur dang / yongs su sbyin par bgyi bar spro bo// bcom
152b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la thugs rtse ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas par zhag bdun ri spos
152b8(mdo sde): kyi ngad ldang gi ngos la bzhugs par gnang / de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas bcom ldan 'das kyis snang bar rig nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/
153a1(mdo sde): shin tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ slas dang gnyen 'dab dang / g.yog 'khor dang bcom ldan 'das
153a2(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ sil snyan dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/
153a3(mdo sde): 'khor de nas ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang la gnas so// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa'i las kyi phyir// rang gi khyim
153a4(mdo sde): brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ 'khor gyi 'khyams brgyar 'khor yug tu dpag tshad lnga brgya pa/ bai dUr+ya sngon po dang / 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi pad mos
153a5(mdo sde): legs par brgyan pa/ rin po che du mas rnam par spras pa byas so// 'khor gyi 'khyams der gdan khri rtsegs pa rin po che las byas pa/ lha'i ras bcos bus
153a6(mdo sde): brgya ni stong phrag mang po bshams so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa/ rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ rin po/
153a7(mdo sde): che'i kha khyer gyis bskor ba'i gdugs dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ snying po mchog gi gdug pas bdugs pa/ bla re bres pa/ dar gyi lda lding mang pos bres pa/ lha'i
153a8(mdo sde): me tog gtor ba bshams so// seng ge'i khri'i phyogs bzhir/ rin po che'i shing ldan pa sna tshogs lta na sdug pa/ bzhi sprul te/ skye bo thams cad bsdus nas/
153b1(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// u dum ba ra'i me tog ji bzhin du/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba brgya 'am brnyed 'gyur ba// mi mchog de ni da ltar gyur gyis/
153b2(mdo sde): spobs la gus dang bcas pas mchod pa gyis// nga rgyal dag dang rgyags dang g.yo spongs la// phra dog ser sna de bzhin sgra rnams dang // dgod pa thams cad
153b3(mdo sde): yongs su spangs byos la// ston pa gus par bcas pas mchongs pagyis// spos dang ldan pa 'di na lha yul pa'i// me tog khyad par 'phags pa ji snyed
153b4(mdo sde): pa// de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas ni// skyes bu khyu mchog la ni mchod pa bgyis// sems can mchog la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// dri zhib
153b5(mdo sde): yid 'ongs khyad par 'phags pa'i dri// // dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dan gyis// glu dbyangs sil snyan rnams pa yid 'ong ba// mi 'am ci'i dag
153b6(mdo sde): rtag rtsen gar byed// ldan pas byos la dga' zhing dad pa yis// rkang gnyis mchog la mchod pa rab tu gyis// chung pa med pa mthong ba brnyed dga' ba//
153b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i gdugs rnams dang // ba dan dag dang rgyal mtshan chos gos dang // bla re dmar po yid 'ongs bzung bar byos// sangs rgyas
153b8(mdo sde): mchod pas bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// brgya byin dang ni 'jig rten skyongs par 'gyur// tshangs pa dag dang dbang byed dbang phyug dang // lha dang mi'i
153b9(mdo sde): spos kyi dad ldang 'di la 'dug pa rgya
154a1(mdo sde): bdag po che bar 'gyur// pi mchog bachod par gzugs bzang kha dog dang // grags dang brjod dang 'khor dang longs spyod
154a2(mdo sde): dang // de bzhin dbang phyug dang ni nyan tshig dang // de bzhin gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig tu 'gyur// gang dag 'dir ni lha dang de bzhin du// mi rnams kyis
154a3(mdo sde): ni 'dus byas bde ba dang // bde ba bde bas tshims par 'dod pa rnams// 'jig rten mgon po de la mchod pa gyis// rang rgyal byang chub de bzhin nyan
154a4(mdo sde): thos dang // de ltar dam pa mchog gi theg pa dang / bdud kyi dpung rnams rab 'joms gang 'dod pa// sems can mchog de la de la ni mchod pa gyis//
154a5(mdo sde): de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas rang gi g.yog 'khor thams cad go bar byas te/ me tog dang dri dang / phreng ba dang byug pa sdoms nas/ ro brgya'i zhal zas
154a6(mdo sde): bshams te/ ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang gi lho phyogs kyi ngos la 'dug nas/ sil snyan dang glu dbyangs blangs te/ glu'i sgra dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i
154a7(mdo sde): dbyangs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gdugs pangs phan pa mdzad cing / zhal ni rab 'dzum zla ba'i ngos ltar dri mi mnga'/ skyes mchog dge sbyong dam pa lha
154a8(mdo sde): dang mis mchod pa/ bde bar gshegs khyod 'dir gshegs pa'i dus 'di lags/ stobs bcu rnams kyi stobs lnga pha rol dpung 'joms pa/ gzhan gyi tshogs
154b1(mdo sde): rnams 'joms zhing 'gro ba phan pa mdzad// ma 'khrugs ma rnyogs dri ma thub pas rab spangs pa// phan pa mdzad pa khyod 'dir gshegs pa'i dus 'di lags//
154b2(mdo sde): sbyangs pa'i yon tan rdul sbyangs the tshoms rnam par gtor/ dran dang blo gros blo yangs mos rtogs blo gros ldan/ 'gro rgyal 'gro rgyal rtag tu 'gro ba 'gro med
154b3(mdo sde): 'gro ba spangs/ phan pa mdzad cing dga' mdzad rab tu dges pa'i thugs// nyi ma zla ba nor bu glog rnams mdzes pa'i 'od// brgya byin tshangs pa'i srid pa lnga
154b4(mdo sde): tshogs 'od 'phrog cing // 'od 'dzad dpal sdug thub khyod 'od ni phan bgyid pas// 'od 'di rtsal nas rgyal ba'i 'od ni 'dra'o// khyod kyis lha skad mi 'am ci'i
154b5(mdo sde): glu sgra yis// yang dag yang du 'bar ba'i nyon mongs zhi bar bgyid// skad mchog yangs pa'i tshangs pa rnams kyi sgra skad kyis// nyon mongs thams cad ni
154b6(mdo sde): bar bgyid pas 'bar ma lags// sman ma gang dag phyogs bcu ru rgyu yang de dag gis// gang dag du yang 'gro ba'i nyon mongs zhi bar bgyid mi nus// sman
154b7(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal bla med gang tshe gsungs brjod pa/ de tshe nyon mongs kun gzhi bde ba thams cad sbyin// shin tu ngo mtshar 'od dang stobs mchog mtshungs med stobs//
154b8(mdo sde): gsung ni skyon bral 'khrul pa mi mnga' dgra 'dul ba// rdul med rab rib bdag gi mun pa shin tu bcom// phan mdzad khyod kyi dus lags 'dir gshegs
155a1(mdo sde): gsol// sbyin dang 'dul dang legs spyod mi mnyams mtshungs dang mnyam// tshul khrims brtul zhugs mi 'khrugs brtul
155a2(mdo sde): zhugs dka' thub brtson// bzod dang dul dang shin du dge la nges pa'i thugs// dga' gsung dga' rnams kyi ni dga' spo gshegs su gsol// dbang
155a3(mdo sde): po stobs dang lam dgyes bsam gtan mkhyen rol cing // dran dang blo gros rtogs dang mos la gnas pa'i thugs// 'od ni rab tu lhag ge shin du dges pa'i
155a4(mdo sde): thugs// yon tan mnga' ba khyod 'dir gshegs pa'i dus de lags// byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms bsgoms pa'i thugs// skyon gyi mun
155a5(mdo sde): pa bcom zhing bag la nyal dang bral// tshangs pa'i lam ni rab rlabs rgyal ba'i lam la gnas// dga' mdzad bde bar gshegs pa dus lags gshegs
155a6(mdo sde): su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ gdugs tshed bab pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsan nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun
155a7(mdo sde): la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas gdugs tshod pab kyis// lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs la zhag bdun gnas pa'i gtsug/
155a8(mdo sde): lag song yang skos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gcod pan gyis 'di snyam du sems/ 'di ltar bdag gis khang pa brtsegs pa// bkod pa 'di lta bur
155b1(mdo sde): sprul la// khang partsegs pa der bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas par bzhugs te/ rin po che bkod pa'i seng ge'i/
155b2(mdo sde): khri la bzhugs pa'i khang pa rtsegs pa/ bkod pa 'di lta bur sprul la/ khang partsegs pa der/ bdag gi lag pa g.yas par blangs te/ na mkha'i ngos las ri'i
155b3(mdo sde): rgyal po spos kyi dad ldang gi bkur bar byin gyis brlabs so// snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gcod pan de'i tshe/ 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
155b4(mdo sde): par zhugs te/ ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar khang pa rtsegs pa dpag tshad bcu pa/ bkra ba/ lta na sdug pa
155b5(mdo sde): gru bzhi ldan pa/ ka pa bzhi zug pa/ cha mnyam pa shin du rnam par phye ba byung ngo // khang pa brtsegs pa der stobs dang ldan pa'i pad ma bkod pa'i khyi rnams
155b6(mdo sde): kyang byung ngo // khang pa rtsegs pa der/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan rin po che'i pad ma bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri 'phang du mi bdun yod pa byung ngo // de nas byang chub
155b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' lha'i gcod pan gyis khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa dang / seng ge'i khri bkod pa 'di lta bu byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/
155b8(mdo sde): bdag la thugs rtse ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos chen po 'di dag dang / thabs gcig tu khang brtsegs pa seng ge'i wi
156a1(mdo sde): bshams pa 'dir bzhugs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi khang pa brtsegs pa 'di sug pa g.yas pas blangs te/
156a2(mdo sde): ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang du 'tshal nas bzhag par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gcod pan thugs rtse ba'i phyir/ byang chub
156a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' dang / nyan thos chen po dang / thabs gcig tu khang pa brtsegs pa der/ ji ltar khri bshams pa de dag la bzhags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
156a4(mdo sde): lha'i gcod pan gyis/ khang pa rtsegs pa de/ lag 'thil g.yas par blangs te/ steng gi na mkha' las rdzu 'phrul gyis song ngo // de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i
156a5(mdo sde): lha'i bu dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gcod pan gyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi chos 'di mthong nas/ tshim zhing
156a6(mdo sde): mgul yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i gcod
156a7(mdo sde): ban la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir// me tog dang gdug pa dang / spos dang phreng ba dang / byug pa thams cad thogs te/ sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa byas nas kyang
156a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das khang pa rtsegs pa na bzhugs shing // na mkha'i ngos las de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te/ ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldan du phyin to//
156b1(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ bcom ldan 'das khang pa rtsegs pa na bzhugs shing / na mkha'i ngos las gshegs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas mi 'am ci'i dang /
156b2(mdo sde): dri za brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bstod te/ me tog dang spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa thams cad thogs nas/ sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu
156b3(mdo sde): dbyangs len pa'i bkod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das rtsu ba'i phyir 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa dpung dang bcas/ 'khor dang
156b4(mdo sde): bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / byug pa de dag dang / sil snyan
156b5(mdo sde): de dag dang / sa pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs len pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdugs chod la bab pa mkhyen
156b6(mdo sde): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyongs pa dang / thabs cig tu mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon
156b7(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa ga la ba der gshegs te/ rang gi seng ge'i khri ji ltar bshams pa la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang /
156b8(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad kyang ma sa ci rigs par 'khod do// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba
157a1(mdo sde): dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig tu/ gdugs chod
157a2(mdo sde): gsol gis khyed thams cad 'das la tshur spyon/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa slas dang bcas// bu dang bcas/ gnyen 'dab dang bcas/ g.yog dang
157a3(mdo sde): bcas te/ rang rang gi lag gis bza' ba dang / bca' ba gya nom pa mang po'i ro dang ldan pa/ ro brgya'i zhal zas sna tshogs bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub
157a4(mdo sde): sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / 'khor la brims nas/ ci bde bar stabs te/ tshims par byas so// tshim par byas nas/
157a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed bzhag pa ste/ phyag bcabs par rig nas/ dpung dang bcas te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ji ltar
157a6(mdo sde): bdag la 'os pa'i stan la 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa dang / skye bo phal po che de dag la chos kyi gtam yang dag par ston to// /
157a7(mdo sde): yang dam du 'jug go/ yang dag par gzengs bstod ngo // yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do// de la bcom ldan 'das kyis gtam ni 'di yin te/ mi 'am ci'i bdag
157a8(mdo sde): po rnam pa gsum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rnam pa
157b1(mdo sde): sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ pi 'am ci'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa byin pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon du 'gro/
157b2(mdo sde): bas/ sbyin pa de byin pa dang / theg pa dman pa spangs pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de byin pa dang / slong ba la zhe sdang med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de
157b3(mdo sde): byin pa dang / len pa rnams la sbyin gnas su 'du shes skyed de/ sbyin pa de byin pa dang / len pa rnams la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes bskyed de/
157b4(mdo sde): sbyin pa byin pa dang / nang gi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dri ma spangs te sbyin pa de byin pa dang / kun nas 'dzin pa med pa'i sems kyis dga' ba dang / dong ba
157b5(mdo sde): dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob nas/ sbyin pa de byin lag brkyang te lhag par gtong ba la dga' bas sbyin pa de byin pa dang / rgya chen po la mo sa ste zham
157b6(mdo sde): ba med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de byin pa dang / skye ba thams cad la mi gnas par sbyin pa de byin pa dang / ldan la re ba med pa'i blos sbyin pa de byin pa dang /
157b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba'i blos sbyin pa de byin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bsngos te/ sbyin pa de byin pa dang / bdud pa med pa'i sems
157b8(mdo sde): kyis sbyin pa de byin pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po shin tu 'gro bas sbyin pa de byin pa dang / bdag sems can yongasu smin par 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de byin
158a1(mdo sde): pa dang / bdag chos 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de byin pa dang / bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'thun par 'gyur ro zhes sbyin
158a2(mdo sde): pa de byin pa dang / bdag bdud kyi tshogs char gcod par 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de byin pa dang / bdag byang chub kyi lam rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de byin pa
158a3(mdo sde): dang / bdag skyes bu dam pa'i las byed par 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de byin pa dang / bdag yi dgas kyi lam rnam par dag par 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de byin pa dang /
158a4(mdo sde): bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i brgyu stsogs par 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de byin pa dang / bdag gis longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba'i bsgrub pa
158a5(mdo sde): yongasu bzung bar 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de byin pa dang / bdag yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i chos rnams la gnas par 'gyur ro zhes byin pa de byin pa dang /
158a6(mdo sde): bdag la dge ba'i bshes gnyen dkon par mi 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de byin pa dang / bdag gi sbyin pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub par/
158a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de byin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa gzhan rnams kyi rjes su brlabs par 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de byin pa dang /
158a8(mdo sde): bdag mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po stsogs pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de byin pa dang / bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / bdag
158b1(mdo sde): la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon gsum du 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de byin pa dang / mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis/ byang chub
158b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
158b3(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin te/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhes na 'di lta ste/ chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / bral bas/
158b4(mdo sde): lus yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang / bdag gi lha sangs rgyas la mi sla ba'i mtshan nyid kyis dag yongs su pa'i tshul khrims dang / brnab sems dang / gnod
158b5(mdo sde): sems dang / log par lta ba med pas sems yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong bas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongasu
158b6(mdo sde): dag pa'i tshul khrims dang / nyi tshe ba'i sa thams cad mi ston pas// byang chub sems dpa'i dang bsam pa mi brjod pa'i tshul khrims dang / shin tu nyams pa med
158b7(mdo sde): cing g.yo dang bral bas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas yongasu dag pa'i tshul khrims dang / skye bo phal po thams cad bdud pas/ 'phags pa'i skye bos bsngags pa'i tshul
158b8(mdo sde): khrims dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pas/ byams pa mngon du 'gro ba'i tshul khrims dang / sems can thams cad yongs su skyobs pas/ snying/
159a1(mdo sde): rje chen po la rab tu sbyor ba'i tshul khrims dang / dam bcas pa'i stobs kyis bslab pa legs par rdzogs pa/ yang dag par 'dzin pa'i
159a2(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang / kha na ma tho ba chung ngu la yang 'jig par lta bas ngo tsha shes shing / khrel yod pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i tshul khrims dang / shin tu mi gtong bas
159a3(mdo sde): skyon med pa'i tshul khrims dang / spyod pa shin tu dag pas thun chags ma yin pa'i tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du 'gro bas rnam pa mang po la dbang
159a4(mdo sde): byed pa'i tshul khrims dang / skye bo mkhas pas rig pa'i phyir bsngags pa'i tshul khrims dang / ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad kyi lam las sgrol ba'i tshul khrims dang /
159a5(mdo sde): bde ba'i dngos po thams cad la rab tu gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims yongasu rdzogs par byas pas sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul
159a6(mdo sde): khrims dang / yi dam la brten pas mi ldod pa'i tshul khrims dang / rang gi sems nges par sems pas bdag la mi stod gzhan la smod pa'i tshul khrims dang /
159a7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa med pas nges par sems pa'i snying rje'i tshul khrims dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad nye bar byed pa'i tshul khrims dang / rab tu dga'
159a8(mdo sde): bar byed pas dga' bar byed pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'dod pa chags pa med pas chog shes par byed pa'i tshul khrims dang / nan tan snying po byed pas bsgrub pa
159b1(mdo sde): rlabs po che'i tshul khrims dang / khyims kyi gnas thams cad la mi lta bas/ rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol ba'i tshul khrims dang / chos kun dga' mos pas
159b2(mdo sde): dgon pa la gnas pa'i dga' ba dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'phags pa'i rigs la ston pas 'dod pa nyung shing chog shes pa la nges pa'i tshul khrims dang /
159b3(mdo sde): sdig pa 'dod pa thams cad bral bas sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byed bsnyungs pa la yang dag par sbyin pa'i tshul khrims dang / sems can med par rnam
159b4(mdo sde): par spyod pas/ dmigs pa med par spong ba'i tshul khrims dang / chad pa dang rtag pa yongasu sbyongs pas/ lta bar song ba thams cad dang gti mug sel ba'i
159b5(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / mi 'gal bas byang chub kyi rjes su mthun pa'i tshul khrims te/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum bcu
159b6(mdo sde): rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa yin no// mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis/
159b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin te/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ lus la mi lta bas bzod par lta ba dang / srog
159b8(mdo sde): la mi lta bas bzod par lta ba dang / zhe 'gras pa'i sems med pas bzod par lta ba dang / nye bar smras pa'i tshig dang du len pas bzod par lta ba dang /
160a1(mdo sde): nyams chung ba'i sems can la snying rje bskyed pas bzod par lta ba dang / ma brlabs pa la mi brnyas pas bzod par lta ba dang //
160a2(mdo sde): gnod par byed pa rnams lan blan pa'i mthu yod pa dang / lan mi ljon bzod par lta ba dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad bcad kyis mi 'khrugs shing
160a3(mdo sde): gnod sems med pas bzod par blta ba dang / brlang ba med pas bzod par lta ba dang / gshe ba la slar mi gshe bas bzod par lta ba dang / bsam pa dag
160a4(mdo sde): pas bzod par lta ba dang / rnyog pa'i sems med pas bzod par lta ba dang / dkrugs pa'i sems med pas zod par lta ba dang / gzhan gyi sems srungs
160a5(mdo sde): bas bzod par lta ba dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa'i dngos pos bzod par lta ba dang / snying rje'i blo dang ldan pas bzod par lta ba dang / nga rgyal
160a6(mdo sde): med par bzod par lta ba dang / sems can thams cad brnyas thabs med cing 'dad pas bzod par lta ba dang / 'bar ba med pas bzod par lta ba dang // nges
160a7(mdo sde): par sems pas bzod par lta ba dang / bdag gi 'khrul pa la so sor rtog pas bzod par lta ba dang / gzhan gyi 'khrul pa'i skyon la mi lta bas bzod par
160a8(mdo sde): lta ba dang / sangs rgyas rje su dran pa bsgom pas bzod par lta ba dang / chos la sems sbyin pas bzod par lta ba dang / dang ba'i dngos pos bzod par lta
160a9(mdo sde): byer bar zhi bas bzod par lta ba dang /
160b1(mdo sde): sems la gdung ba med pas bzod par lta ba dang /
160b2(mdo sde): ba dang / gzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pas bzod par smra ba dang / gsong por smra bas bzod par lta ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la sdang ba med pas
160b3(mdo sde): bzod par lta ba dang / ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba la mos pas bzod par lta ba dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas bzod par lta ba dang / mi 'am ci'i
160b4(mdo sde): bdag po rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// mi 'am ci'i bdag
160b5(mdo sde): po rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin te/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/
160b6(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi chad par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / chos kyi rigs rgyun mi chad
160b7(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs rgyun mi chad par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / sems can tshad med pa yongs su
160b8(mdo sde): smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / 'khor ba tshad med pa yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas tshad med pa la
160b9(mdo sde): mchod pa dang / rim 'gro bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa bstsags pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / sems can
161a1(mdo sde): thams cad la bya ba ci yod ces pa la spro ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir/
161a2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / sems can thams cad tshul khrims kyi bslab pa la bzung ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs thams cad dang
161a3(mdo sde): nges pa mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad
161a4(mdo sde): bskyed pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / chags pa chags med pa'i shes rab mchog yongs su bskang ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / byams
161a5(mdo sde): pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / tshangs pa'i gnas yongasu bskang ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / mngon par shes pa
161a6(mdo sde): thams cad la brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yongs su bsdud pa'i phyir/ brtson
161a7(mdo sde): 'brus brtsom pa dang / bdud thams cad gzhol ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / stobs brtan pa chen pos pha rol gnon pa'i phyir/ brtson
161a8(mdo sde): 'grus brtsom pa dang / pha rol rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar gcod pa'i phyir/ brtson 'gras brtsom pa dang / stobs bcu dang mi 'jig pa dang //
161b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bskang ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rgyun gyi phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / bya ba thams
161b2(mdo sde): cad nyams 'og tu chud par byed cing brtson 'grus mi gtang ba'i phyir// brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / sems zhum pa med pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsom
161b3(mdo sde): pa dang / nyon mongs thams cad kyi mi rtsi bar bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / ba rgal ba bsgral/ ma grol ba bsgrol/ dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs
161b4(mdo sde): 'byung / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las zla ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos yongs
161b5(mdo sde): su bzung ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro zhing sangs rgyas la lta ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus
161b6(mdo sde): brtsom pa dang / sems can dang lus dben pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus de dben pa las nges par 'byung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'jug pa'i
161b7(mdo sde): phyir/ brtson 'grus de blangs pa med cing dor ba med la/ 'deg pa med cing bzhag pa med de/ skye ba med cing 'byung ba med pas/ bsdus pas yin te/
161b8(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa gsum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// /
162a1(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa
162a2(mdo sde): yin te/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa yongs su dag pa dang / blo gros yongs su dag pa/ rtogs pa yongs su dag pa dang / ngo tsha shes
162a3(mdo sde): pa yongs su dag pa dang / khrel yod pa yongs su dag pa dang / mos pa yongs su dag pa dang / bsngo ba yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub kyi sems mi brjed
162a4(mdo sde): ba yongs su dag pa dang / dbang po sbas pa yongs su dag pa dang / mi gnas pa yongs su dag pa dang / de la chags pa yongasasu dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa
162a5(mdo sde): bskyed pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems las su rung ba yongs su dag pa dang / lus dben pa yongs su dag pa dang / brag cha shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /
162a6(mdo sde): nang nye bar zhi ba yongs su dag pa dang / phyi rol du mi rgyu ba yongs su dag pa dang / dmigs pa'i lta ba yongs su dag pa dang / bdag med pa dang / sems can med
162a7(mdo sde): pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med par so sor rtog cing khams gsum pa la mi gnas pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub kyi yan
162a8(mdo sde): lag gi sgo yongs su dag pa dang / sems can la snying rje chen po yongs su dag pa dang / shes rab la 'jug pas rab rib med cing snang ba yongs su dag pa dang /
162b1(mdo sde): rgyu dang 'bras bu dang rnam par smin pa dang / mi 'gal ba yongs su dag pa dang / chos la sems pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems can la snying rje chen
162b2(mdo sde): po yongs su dag pa dang / shes rab la 'jug pas rab rib med cing snang ba yongs su dag pa dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu dang / rnam par smin pa dang / mi 'ga'
162b3(mdo sde): ba yongs su dag pa dang / chos la sems pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / tshul bzhin gyi rnam pa'i chos la so sor rtog pa yongs su dag pa dang / thabs la
162b4(mdo sde): mkhas pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po bsgrub pa yongs su dag pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang mi 'dre ba yongs su dag pa dang /
162b5(mdo sde): mi g.yo ba'i bsam gtan bsgrub pa yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa la mi g.yeng ba yongs su dag pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi/
162b6(mdo sde): sems dang spyod pa la lta ba yongs su dag pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes nas/ so so ci rigs par chos ston pa
162b7(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag
162b8(mdo sde): pa yin no// mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin te/ sum bcu/
163a1(mdo sde): rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms pas mang du thos pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pas chos rnams/
163a2(mdo sde): la spyod pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa dang / byang chub mngon gsum du byed pa'i bdag nyid kyi chos bsgrub par shes pa dang / phung po la mkhas pa la 'jug pas/
163a3(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa'i shes pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa'i shes pa dang / rgyu dang bya ba khong du chud pas/ stong pa'i
163a4(mdo sde): rnam par rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / bden pa la mkhas pa'i shes pa dang / der mi ltung bar skyon med pa la 'jug pa'i shes pa dang /
163a5(mdo sde): bsam gtan du skye bas/ skye ba so sor mi rtog pa'i shes pa dang / bzod ma nas rnam par dga' bas chos thams cad mi skye bar shes pa dang / phyin ci log tu
163a6(mdo sde): gyur pa yongs su smin par byed pas/ sems can thams cad bdag par shes pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha'i/ chos thams cad chos gcig tu
163a7(mdo sde): shes pa dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs zhing thams cad zhing gcig tu shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pas/ sangs rgyas
163a8(mdo sde): thams cad sangs rgyas gcig tu shes pa dang ye shes la mkhas pas/ chos kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa bstan pa dang / legs par bshad pas//
163b1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad tshims par byed pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i spobs pas/ thos pa thams cad 'dzin pas bzungs brjed pa med pa'i shes pa dang /
163b2(mdo sde): bdud de dag byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed pas/ bdud kyi las thams cad khong du chud pa'i shes pa dang / rnam par bsgrubs te so so nye bar gnas par shes
163b3(mdo sde): pas/ chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes pa'i rtog pas shes pa dang / shin tu yongs su bsgrub pa med pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad rmi lam dang / sdig smra ba
163b4(mdo sde): dang / chu zla dang / mig yor dang / drag cha lta bu'i tshul du ston pa dang / shes pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad khong du chud pa'i
163b5(mdo sde): shes pa dang / shin tu brlas pa'i phyir 'khor da mya ngan las 'das/ rtags par shes pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i stong pa nyid dang /
163b6(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos shes pa dang / bzod pa nas 'brel pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang /
163b7(mdo sde): nye bar zhi bar shes pa dang / ma rig pa dang / gti mug gi mun pa yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la rab rib med cing sdang ba thob pa dang / chos
163b8(mdo sde): thams cad gar yang mi 'gro/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong shes pas/ shes rab kyi 'od dang ldan zhing / sems can thams cad la rnam par thar pa'i chos ston pa
164a1(mdo sde): dang / las dang bya ba khong du chud pas/ sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / 'gro bar skye bstan pa dang / don dang chos dang nges pa'i//
164a2(mdo sde): tshig dang spobs pa'i tshul la mkhas te phyed par de kho na lung ston pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang / bdag dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / grol ba/
164a3(mdo sde): dang / spangs pa dang / byang byas yongs su mya ngan las zla ba'i phyir/ don yod pa'i chos ston pa dang / dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pas/ sangs rgyas bcom
164a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyis de shes rab las nges par 'byung bar rig nas/ chos kyi grong khyer thams cad yongs su skyong bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / phyir mi ldeg
164a5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la yang dag par gzhol te/ mtha' la gnas pa'i tshul nges par byas pas lung bstan pa'i sa rab tu thob pa yin te/ mi 'am ci'i
164a6(mdo sde): bdag po rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub
164a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnam pa sum bcu sa gnyis dang ldan na/ thabs la mkhas par bya ste/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
164a8(mdo sde): sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bsod nams chen po la gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad sprin gnas yin pas smin gnas
164a9(mdo sde): / rang pa mthong pa dang / rnams na
164b1(mdo sde): kyis tshol ba dang / sems can dbul po yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ don du mi gnyer ba dang / sems can thams cad ngag sdoms pa la sbyar ba'i phyir//
164b2(mdo sde): skugs pa dang dig pa lta bur ston pa dang / bud med dang gzhon nu ma lta bu yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bud med yongs su 'dzin pa dang / khye'u yongasu smin
164b3(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir/ khye'u gzugasu ston pa dang / bsod nams yongasu smin par bya ba dang / mthun par bya ba'i phyir gzugs thams cad ston pa dang / sems
164b4(mdo sde): can myos pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ myos pa ma yin pa yang mos pa'i lus su ston pa dang / de la mos pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston pa'i phyir//
164b5(mdo sde): skyon pa dang / sems g.yengs pa'i gzugs su ston pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ lo brgyar bsags pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po 'dir
164b6(mdo sde): ba dang / chos 'dzin du bzhag pa'i phyir sems can rnams la dga' ba dang / longs spyod thams cad ston pa dang / de la mos pa'i sems can yongasasu smin bya
164b7(mdo sde): ba'i phyir/ g.yon can mi mthun pas/ 'tsho ba lta bur yang bdag nyid ston pa dang / bud med tshong gang dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal po'i chung mar gyur
164b8(mdo sde): pa/ bud med pa'i bu'i tshe 'dod pa'i mya ngan zug rngu dang ldan zhing / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba la/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rigs de dag dad cing yongs
165a1(mdo sde): smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam bzhin du de'i bur 'gro ba dang / 'grog dgon par song ba'i sems can dbul po la bza' ba dang / btung ba
165a2(mdo sde): dang / nor sbyin zhing bgo bsha' bya ba'i phyir/ 'dron po mang po'i nang du ded dpon chen por 'gyur ba dang / gter chen po mdun du bzhag te/ nor gyi phung po chen po byin
165a3(mdo sde): nas/ chos ston pa dang / mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyis mya ngan gyi zug rngu bsal nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi chos ston pa dang / gter gtor ba'i
165a4(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyis mdun du gter chen po nye bar bstan nas/ 'tsho ba yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ chos ston pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la
165a5(mdo sde): dgag pa'i phyir/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa dang / kun tu rgyu rnams kyi nang du rab tu 'byung ba dang / sems can 'dod chags kyi lcags kyus zin pa rnams yongs
165a6(mdo sde): su smin par bya ba'i phyir smad 'tshong ba'i khyims dang / slas kyi nang du bu gzugs mdzes lta na sdug par ston pa dang / sems can rnams mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du/
165a7(mdo sde): chos kyis yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dus pa chen po dang / tshogs mang po'i nang du rnga bo che dang / rnga rnga dang / gling bu dang / dung gi sgras sa chen po mdzes par
165a8(mdo sde): byas nas/ bdag nye bar ston cing / sems can 'dus pa de dag la rol mo dbyangs sgra de dag las chos ston pa'i sgra 'byin cing / gzo dang las kyi gnas thams
165b1(mdo sde): cad nye bar ston pa dang / mya ngan du song ba'i 'drod pa bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / zad pa la mngon par shes pa chen po rnam par rtse zhing de'i stobs kyis bza' ba/
165b2(mdo sde): dang / btung ba byin nas/ bkres pa dang bral zhing sgom pa dang / bral ba'i sems can rnams las ston pa dang / sems can gang dag dmus long du gyur pa de dag
165b3(mdo sde): gi nang na dmus long lta bur gyur nas/ dbus po mig med pa la rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bza' ba dang / btung ba 'byos par byas nas/ mig byin te rang gi gzug
165b4(mdo sde): bstan nas/ ji ltar de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur pa de lta de ltar chos ston pa dang / rgyal po'i khri mon na bcug pa'i srog
165b5(mdo sde): chags rgya phrag du ma g.yo sna tshogs dang ldan pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bsams bzhin du bdag rkun por ston cing / gzhan g.yon can no zhes shes
165b6(mdo sde): par byas nas/ khri mon du bcug pa dang / de der zhugs nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis/ bcings pa de dag gis lus bkrus shing bskus te/ gos bzang po bgon
165b7(mdo sde): nas bza' ba dang / btung bas lus tshim par byas te/ bcings pa dam po de dag las bkrol nas/ ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
165b8(mdo sde): nges par 'gyur ba de lta bur ches stong pa dang / sems can gang dag rgyal pos bsad par sgrib/ srog 'chad pa'i 'jigs pa thob pa/ sdug bsngal gyis nyam
166a1(mdo sde): thag pa/ de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyis gzhan cig sprul te//
166a2(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyis bshed pa sgri nas/ gsad par 'os pa'i mi de dag bcings pa de las bkrol te/ 'jigs pa dang bral ba srog rnyed pa/ dbug phyin pa de dag la
166a3(mdo sde): ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon nges par gyur pa de de lta bur chos ston pa dang / phyogs gang na don dang nor dang zhing dang / khyim gyi
166a4(mdo sde): dngos po dang / bran po dang bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / dmag gi mi phyir 'thab pa dang / brtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mtshang 'bru bar byed pa der/
166a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs kyis dbus su 'dug na/ rdzu 'phrul gyis don dang nor dang / rin po che yongs su btang ste/ de dag 'dum par
166a6(mdo sde): sbyor ro// de dag 'dum par rig nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thabs la
166a7(mdo sde): mkhas pas yan lag dang nying lag thams cad kyis dbang po nyams pa med/ sems can yongs su smin par bya'i phyir/ dbang po nyams par yang ston pa dang
166a8(mdo sde): spyod lam phun sum tshogs/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ spyod lam thams cad 'khrugs par byed pa yang / byang chub sems dpa' thabs la
166b1(mdo sde): mkhas pas gzhan mu stegs can ston pa dang / thag ring du gnas pa bdud kyi spyod yul la spyod pa'i bdud kyis byin gyis brlab pa'i mu stegs can de dag sangs rgyas
166b2(mdo sde): kyi bstan pa la dgug pa'i phyir/ de dag gi mdun du dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas/ sems
166b3(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las log nas/ bsams
166b4(mdo sde): bzhin du 'dod pa'i khams su skyes te/ mya ngan las 'das pa/ 'dod pa rnams la bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal bstan nas/ dben pa thob pa rnams bla ma'i lam
166b5(mdo sde): bsgom du bzung ba'i phyir/ mya ngan las 'das pa ston pa dang / skyon med pa la zhugs pa/ mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar 'dun pa rnams kyi mdun du/
166b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku ston pa dang / sangs rgyas la dad pa thob cing / sems mnyam par bzhag pa rnams byang chub
166b7(mdo sde): kyi sems len du bzung ba'i phyir/ rkyen 'di shes pa la 'jug pa nye bar ston pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis/ byang chub
166b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o// pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa la 'jug pa yongs su dag pa'i le'u 'di
167a1(mdo sde): bstan pa mi 'ab ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i 'khor dang de ma yin pa gzhan lnga dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i srog chags dgu khri
167a2(mdo sde): brgyad stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyes so// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor byang chub sems dpa' las byang chub sems dpa' khri
167a3(mdo sde): brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa ni shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// de nas mi
167a4(mdo sde): 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar byas/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag
167a5(mdo sde): par tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ rin thang med pa'i ras bcos bu phrag cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku
167a6(mdo sde): la gsol to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la yang rin thang med pa'i gos kyis so sor bkab bo// gnas thams
167a7(mdo sde): cad yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i bu brgyad stong pos/ rin po che'i bkod pa dang / rin po che'i
167a8(mdo sde): gdugs brgyad steng du tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag thams cad 'khor gyi khyams der/ bcom
167b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi dbu'i drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la/ dpag tshad stong tsam na rin po che'i gdugs gcig tu gnas par gyur to// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i bu/
167b2(mdo sde): brgyad stong pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul rgya chen po 'di lta bu mthong nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang / yid bde
167b3(mdo sde): ba skyes nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de dag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bcom ldan
167b4(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang thos pas bdag cag byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur/ byang chub tu yongs
167b5(mdo sde): su smin par 'gyur pa'i chos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan
167b6(mdo sde): 'das kyis mi 'ab ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i bu des bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ ta la bdun srid kyi steng gi bar snang la dkyil mo dkrungs bcas te/
167b7(mdo sde): bzhugs nas/ sku la 'di lta bu'i 'od phyung ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// gang mi 'am ci/
167b8(mdo sde): dang / dri ba dang / lho 'phye chen po dag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gi rol po'i sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs de dag thams cad/ madrangs ma bkrol
168a1(mdo sde): bar mdzes pa dang ldan par 'khrol lo// ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngang ldan ma/ spos kyi shing dang / me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i
168a2(mdo sde): shing ji snyed pa de dag las kyang rol mo'i sil snyan gyi sgra byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyi spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang / 'od zer bye ba phrag khrig brgya stong byung ngo //
168a3(mdo sde): 'od zer thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang pad+ma tshad shing rta'i phang lo can dag byung ngo // pad+ma'i snying po thams cad la yang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyes bu chen po'i
168a4(mdo sde): mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa'i lus dag gnas par kun tu snang ngo // de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus rol mo sil snyan de dag las ni yongasu 'dra
168a5(mdo sde): ba'i tshigs su bcad pa byung byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ni sgra dbyangs dang / skad gcig gis tshigs su bcad nas nges par lan 'debs so// de la sil
168a6(mdo sde): snyan las tshigs su bcad pa/ bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// ji lta bur mi bskyes pa yi// byang chub snying por 'dug par du/ sems ni brjed pa med par
168a7(mdo sde): 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ sems can kun gyi ched kyi phyir// lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs// snying rje che dang ldan pa
168a8(mdo sde): ni/ byang chub sems brjed mi 'gyur ro// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag bsam pa ji lta bu// rab tu sbyor ba ji 'dra zhig/ de dag snying rjes chen po la/
168b1(mdo sde): nges par sems pa ji ltar skye// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// g.yo med lhag pa'i bsam pa ste// de dag sbyor ba bcos pa'i byin// mya ngan/
168b2(mdo sde): 'das sgor 'jog pa ni// de dag snying rje de 'dra'o// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// de dag stong pa ji lta bu// ji ltar byin nas 'gyod med cing // rnam smin don du
168b3(mdo sde): mi gnyer bar// byang chub du ni bsngon par byed// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// dngos po kun la mi lta ba// de ni byin nas 'gyod pa med//
168b4(mdo sde): byang chub lam la 'jog byed pa// de phyir rna ma smin re ba med// sil snyan rnams kyis spras pa// ji ltar tshul khrims ldan gyur kyang / tshul khrims kyis ni rloms
168b5(mdo sde): sems med/ theg chen bla na med pa la// tshul khrims 'chal pa smin par byed// byang chub sems dpa' gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// byang chub sems
168b6(mdo sde): dpa'i tshul khrims ldan/ stong pa nyid kyi rloms sems med// byams pa chen po bskyed pa ni// tshul khrims 'tshal ba yongs smin byed/ sil snyan rnams
168b7(mdo sde): kyis smras pa// ji lta bur na sems can gyis// spyos shing sdig pa dbugs byed cing / sems kyi gnod pa mi byed la/ mchog tu dga' ba bskyed par 'gyur//
168b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi// nyon mongs gso ba'i sman pa snyam/ de dag ngan par smra ba yin/
169a1(mdo sde): tshig thos zhe sdang mi 'gyur ro// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// de dag brtson 'grus ji lta bu// brdul ba yang ni ci 'dra shig/ ji ltar/
169a2(mdo sde): zhum pa med sems kyis// byang chub spyad pa spyod par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// chos dang sems kyis bsrungs pa ni/
169a3(mdo sde): brdul ba dang ni brtson 'grus so// dge ba'i rtsa bas brten pa ni// des ni sems ni zhum mi 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag ji ltar dran dang ldan
169a4(mdo sde): blo gros khong du chud par bya// ji ltar bsam gtan byed// de la chags pa med par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ g.yeng ba med
169a5(mdo sde): dang dran dang ldan// tshul 'chos med pa blo gros ldan// thabs kyis bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// des na de la chags med 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyis smras
169a6(mdo sde): pa/ ji ltar shes rab ldan pa dang // yang dag lta ba drang po dang // chos rnams rnam par byed pa la// mkhas shing 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ byang chub sems
169a7(mdo sde): dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ thos pas shes rab kun tu 'brel// brten pas lta ba drang por 'gyur// chos kyi sbyin pas nges gyur te// tshul khrims
169a8(mdo sde): kyis ni don rtogs 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// ji ltar thos pa brtsal bas na// de dag thos pa mang du 'gyur// gang gis che ba'i bdag gyur par//
169b1(mdo sde): chos kyi chos rnams ston par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnaMs kyis smras pa// gus par byed de thos tshol zhing / sgrub pas thos pa mang du 'gyur/
169b2(mdo sde): zang zing med par chos smin pa// des ni che ba'i bdag nyid 'gyur/ sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// de dag byams pa ji lta bu// de dag snying rje'i ci 'dra zhig/ de dag
169b3(mdo sde): dga' ba ji lta bu// gtang snyoms dang ni ci 'dra zhig/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ sems dang gtang snyoms byams pa ste// sems
169b4(mdo sde): can bsgrol ba snying rje'o// sangs rgyas chos dga' ba ste// gnyis spangs pa ni gtang snyoms so// sil snyan rnams kyis spras pa// ji ltar sangs rgyas mthong bar
169b5(mdo sde): 'gyur// sems kyang ji ltar dad par 'gyur// chos thos nas ni ji lta bur// de dag the tshom skye mi 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/
169b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rjes su dran sgoms la// des ni 'dran pa mthong bar mthong bar 'gyur// the tshom med cing bsam dag pas/ the chos thos nas ni sems kyi med// sil
169b7(mdo sde): snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ bsod nams tshogs ni ji lta bu// ye shes tshogs kyang ci 'dra zhig/ de dag ni gnas lhag mthong la// brtsom pa yang ni ji lta bu// byang
169b8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis spras pa// ngoms mi shes pa bsod nams tshogs// 'dri ba rnams ni ye shes tshogs// zhi ba'i tshogs ni zhi gnas te/
170a1(mdo sde): chos shes pa ni lhag mthong ngo // sil snyan rnams kyis spras pa// de dag gi ni spyod yul gang // de dag gnas kyang ji lta bu// de dag
170a2(mdo sde): gnas pa ci 'dra zhig/ de dag sbyor ba'ang ji lta bu// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// de dag spyod yul stong pa nyid/ gnas ni pha rol phyin
170a3(mdo sde): pa'i lam// sangs rgyas 'phrin las ji lta bu// ci 'dra ba yis las byas ni// byang chub la ni gzhol bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis
170a4(mdo sde): smras pa// theg pa dman pa bdud kyi las// sangs rgyas 'phrin las theg pa che/ sdig pa thams cad spangs pa ni// byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur ba'o// sil snyan
170a5(mdo sde): rnams kyis smras pa// de dag grogs sten ji lta bu// sdig pa'i grogs po ji 'dra zhig/ log par lta la mi gnas shing // ji ltar yang dag gsong bar 'gyur//
170a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// gang zhig byang chub lam ston pa// rtag tu bde byin sbyin pa'o// byang chub sems las gang zlog pa/
170a7(mdo sde): de dag sdig pa'i grogs por shes// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// lam du 'jug par gyur pa yis// lta ba drang po ji lta bu// sbyor ba rnam par shes nas su//
170a8(mdo sde): ji ltar lha de 'jig mi byed// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// las dang bya bar 'jug pa ni// de dag drang por lta ba yin// log par
170b1(mdo sde): sbyor bar rnam shes nas// sa pa de dag 'jig mer byed// sim ldan rnams kyis smras pa// ji ltar pad pa'i chos bsrungs shing // sems can yongs su smin par
170b2(mdo sde): byed// ji lta bu'i thabs kyis ni// de dag byang chub sgrub par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// brtson 'grus kyis ni chos srungs te/
170b3(mdo sde): bsdu bar yongs su smin par byed// mnyam nyid rnam par spangs pa ni// byang chub sgrub par byed pa yin// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// de dag shes pa'i lam
170b4(mdo sde): ci 'dra// nga rgyal lam ni ji lta bu// ji la bka' blo bde ba dang // thams cad dus su 'thun par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa//
170b5(mdo sde): brtsod pa med pa shes pa'i lam// nga rgyal las ni brtsod pa 'byung // des pa bka' blo bde ba ste// gus pa yis ni 'thun par 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa//
170b6(mdo sde): de dag lam ni ji lta bu// log pa'i lam yang ci 'dra zhig/ bla ming byang chub lam du ni// ji ltar sems can rab tu 'god// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams
170b7(mdo sde): kyis spras pa// la pa ni pha rol phyin pa drug/ theg pa dben pa shes pa'i lam// shes rab thabs la skabs pa ni// sems can las la 'dzud pa'o// sil ska
170b8(mdo sde): rnams kyis smras pa// jis bung nanor chen 'gyur// de dag snyed pa'i 'dra shig/ gzungs gter rnams kyang ji lta bur// gang gis de dag 'gro cim byed/
171a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis spras pa// nor bdun dang ni rtag tu ldan// chos rnyed pa ni brnyed pa'o// de dag gter ni gzugs
171a2(mdo sde): yin te// rab tu brnyed nas tshims par byed// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// de dag gi ni pha ma gang // nye du'i tshogs ni ji lta bu// g.yog rnams kyang ni ci 'dra zhig/
171a3(mdo sde): gang gis mkhas pa de dag badzes// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis sbas pa// ma ni shes rab pa ni thabs// nye du byang chub phyogs rnams yin// dge
171a4(mdo sde): ba rnams ni g.yog yin te// des ni mkhas pa de dag mdzes// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// ji ltar bdag med rtogs na ni// byams pas 'gro ba khyab par byed//
171a5(mdo sde): bdag med pa la byams pa dag/ de la ji ltar mtshungs par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// gang dag stong ni rab shes pa// de ni
171a6(mdo sde): bdag med khong du chud// gang gis 'gro ba stong shes pa// de ni de'i byams pa mchog/ sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// 'du byed rnams ni rang bzhin gyis/
171a7(mdo sde): 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med// las dang las kyi rnam par smin// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// dam pa'i don du 'ong med de// gang du
171a8(mdo sde): 'gro ba'ang yod ma yin// kun rdzob du ni lam 'jug cing // rnam par smin pa nye bar ston// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med//
171b1(mdo sde): smon lam rnam par spangs pa na// mtshan nyid gcig tu rab rtogs nas// de kho na ni ji ltar shes// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// stong /
171b2(mdo sde): nyid gang yin de mtshan med// mtshan ma don du gnyer ba med// mtshan nyid gcig cing de mtshan ste// rnam par thar pa'i sgor bstan to// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/
171b3(mdo sde): gang gis mya ngan 'das pa'i 'gro// stong par rtog pa ji lta bur// sems can lta ba ji lta bu// yongs su smin byed ji lta bu// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams
171b4(mdo sde): kyis smras pa// shes rab kyis ni stong par rtogs// thabs kyis sems can rnams kyis blta// snying rje'i yongs su smin par byed// des ni mya ngan 'das par 'gro//
171b5(mdo sde): sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// chos 'di dag ni chos nyid kyis// skye ba med ci'i 'byung med par// tshul mchog 'dri 'dra shes nas ni// gang gis 'khor bar
171b6(mdo sde): 'khor bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// mi skye ba dang mi 'byung ba// de ni shes rab spyod yul lo// bsam bzhin du ni gang skye
171b7(mdo sde): ga pa de ni thabs kyi tshul yin no// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// gtong la dga' ba ji ltar 'gyur// ji lta bur na phyir mi ldog/ ji ltar bzod pa ji ltar rnam
171b8(mdo sde): par nges par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// mnyam par gnas pa stong la dga'// chos kyi dbyings las phyir mi ldog/
172a1(mdo sde): mi skye ba la bzod pa ste// chos shes las ni rnam par nges// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// byang chub snying po snying po gang // rdzogs
172a2(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub mtshan nyid gang / ci phyir rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya// de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar grol// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/
172a3(mdo sde): byang chub snying po na mkha' ste// byang chub na mkha'i mtshan nyid do// gang yang kun nas tig mug med// de bzhin nyid phyir de bzhin gshegs// de nas mi 'ab ci'i rgyal po ldan
172a4(mdo sde): pa'i bu de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas// mi skye ba'i chos lnga bzod pa thob nas/ rang rang gi gos dang brgyan bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol te/
172a5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du// bdag cag gis nyan pa'i rna ba 'di lta bu thos nas// sangs rgyas ni bdag cag gi mched du byung ngo //
172a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs 'di dag las// the tshom 'di 'dra ba'i lta bu byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'di dag gis dris pa/ de dag
172a7(mdo sde): thams cad lan btab pas/ 'khor ba 'di'i dogs pa thams cad spangs pa dang / bdag dang chos kyi snang ba dpag tu ma mchis pa skyes pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das
172a8(mdo sde): sil snyan de dag las// sgra 'di lta bu byung ba'i rgyu ci lags/ su'i byin gyis brlabs kyis na/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'di dag gis 'debs par 'gyur//
172b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzhin bzang dag de dag thams cad ni// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs su blta'o// bzhin bzangs dag de bzhin
172b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis// na mkha'i las kyang chos kyi sgra 'di lta bu byung na/ sil snyan las kyang chos kyi sgra ci'i phyir mi 'byung ste/ bzhin bzangs
172b3(mdo sde): dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab po// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i bu de dag gi gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams
172b4(mdo sde): cad kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi bin gyis brlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par gyur cig/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong / mu tig kha dog
172b5(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyi do shal thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ ji ltar thogs pa'i mu tig gi do shal de dag gis bcom ldan
172b6(mdo sde): 'das la mngon par bkab po// mu tig gi do shal de dag phul ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi bar
172b7(mdo sde): snang la mu tig gi do shal gyi khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri stong du gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyang / 'gru bzhi lham pa/ rga ba bzhi zug
172b8(mdo sde): ba/ cha mnyam pa/ ngos shin tu rnam par bye ba sha stag go// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag na/ rin po chos spras pa'i khri rtsa ba yang rin po che las byas pa/ lha'i ras
173a1(mdo sde): bcos bu zung du ma bkrab pa/ dag par byung bar gyur to// khri de dag thams cad la yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
173a2(mdo sde): sum bcu rtsa gyis legs par brgyad pa dag bzhugs par kun tu snang ngo // de nas mi 'am ci'i bu mo do dag khri stong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong
173a3(mdo sde): nas tshim zhing mgu ste yid rab tu dga' nas// dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
173a4(mdo sde): do// de dag byang chub tu sems bskyed nas// dga' zhing rab tu dga' ste dang ba thob nas/ thams cad kyi sgra skad dbyangs// tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
173a5(mdo sde): gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// bla na med pa'i dag bcom mchog khyod gsungs// don dgongs mtshungs pa ma mchis bsam mi khyab// don dang chos
173a6(mdo sde): dang 'dul bar brlabs pa/ sems can mchog la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug tha ba 'jig/ dgon par bzhugs dges bsnyengs pa mi
173a7(mdo sde): mnga' ba/ rin chen mdzod dang rin chen ston pa'o// bcom ldan rgyal po'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// spyan lnga dri bral nyon mongs mi mnga' ba/ sa'i dbang po pha rol dgra
173a8(mdo sde): bcom pa// pad+ma lta bu srid gsum mi gos pa/ bde gshegs mchog brnyed khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i nang na mi dang 'drar spyod cing / nyi zla 'di'i 'di ni spang
173b1(mdo sde): bkong ba// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs su rgyal por skyes// 'khor lo'i mtshan mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ming dang gzugs la nam yang mi chags shing / mgon
173b2(mdo sde): dang dpung dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen gyur// khyod dang mtshungs med lhag pa ga la zhig/ mtha' yas dbyangs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// brnyes dang ma brnyes nam
173b3(mdo sde): yang chags mi mnga'/ 'jig rten chos rnams zil gyis non te bzhugs// chags sred khri shing dra ba 'grol mdzad pa// bcom ldan 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshalo//
173b4(mdo sde): dul ba'i thugs ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag/ nyon mongs sregs te stobs bcus rab bzhugs shing // 'gro la zang zing mi mnga' sprin brtsal ba// sbyin pa'i gnas
173b5(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// spa mchog dam pa mtshan gyi 'od phro ba// lam log phyin ci log ni rnam par spangs// 'jam zhing snam la snyan pa'i gsung gsung ba// srid
173b6(mdo sde): pa gsum las 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// mi mchog gdung ba bdud pa mi mnga' ba// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni bye ba'i zhing du gshegs/ 'gro ba rab tu bsgral pa'i gru mdzad pa/
173b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan bran 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan brtson 'grus dag pa ston mdzad pa// chag shing zhing pa'i 'gro dang mngon shes drug/ ldan zhing mkhas pa'i nyan
173b8(mdo sde): thos nam grol ba// 'gro drug nye bshes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gser gyi kha dog 'dral phyag 'tshal lo// zhi gnas dbang po dul la phyag 'tshal lo// ston gyi
174a1(mdo sde): zla 'dri'i zhal la phyag 'tshal lo// mi mchog yon tan mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs bsregs shing bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/
174a2(mdo sde): skye dgu 'di dag sbrul dka'i chu bzhin sgrol// bsgoms shing nyon mongs thul ba'i bcom ldan 'das// khyod la skyabs su mchi bar mchid kyis 'tshal// thub pas/
174a3(mdo sde): sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bstsal// blangs na dbang po dges par rab 'gyur ba// pha rol dag la sbyin pa mchog brtsol ba// gtong dpa' bcom ldan khyod la
174a4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo// sems can nga rgyal rgyags khengs gti mug pa// rgyu dang rkyen las bya ba 'gal bgyid pa// 'phags pa bla na med pa'i lam mchog la// rnam par
174a5(mdo sde): 'gren pa chen po khyod kyis bkod/ phung po rang bzhin gyis ni stong mkhyen nas// las dang nyon mongs zil gyis mnan te bzhugs// 'dren pa 'gro ba rnams kyi
174a6(mdo sde): som nyi bcod// bcom ldan dus gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bde ba'i chos la brtson zhing mnyam par bzhag/ chos rnams kun la mnga' dbang pha rol phyin//
174a7(mdo sde): bla na med pa kha lo bsgyur ba mchog/ 'dren pa 'gro ba rnams kyi som nyi gcod// bcom ldan dus gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdud kyi snga rnams 'joms pa'i
174a8(mdo sde): stobs chen po// mi mchog lam dang lam ma lags la mkhas/ rlung dmar lta bur ci la'ang chags mi mnga'/ bzing gyur bsal ba pha rol shin tu gnas/
174b1(mdo sde): thub pa bsam gtan gsal ba'i bang mdzod mnga'// spyad pa spyod pa'i chen gang ga yi// bye ma snyed kyi mchog rnams la ni mchod/ mthu bshes mi g.yo bsam gyis
174b2(mdo sde): mi khyab pa// chags pa'i skyon mi mnga' zhing thang la bzhugs/ gnas na bzhugs shing rgyal ba rnams kyis ston// de slang mi rnams mchog la phyag 'tshal lo//
174b3(mdo sde): skye dang na dang rga shi rnam par spangs/ tshe rabs bye ba bsam mi khyab par dgongs// bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhyen pa gdugs 'od kyis// 'jigs pa chen po'i dra ba rab
174b4(mdo sde): tu 'dral// bden pa mi 'drar chos rnams thugs su chud// phyag dang zhabs la bkra zhing mtshan mnga' zhing // bkra shis pa las 'jams pa'i ran slong ba//
174b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan bkra shis lha la phyag 'tshal lo// gzugs rnams la ni pha rol phyin// zang zing mi mnga' chos kyi sbyin pa stsol// thub pa chos kyi rnga ni rab brdung ba// chos
174b6(mdo sde): rje bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// shAkya'i rigs su rgyal po las 'byung ba// dbang po zhi zhing thugs kyang rab tu zhi// ston pa srid gsum 'jig rten rnams gzigs
174b7(mdo sde): pa// bde gshegs zhi thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdud rnams dpung dang bcas pa rno ba yin/ ral gri thogs nas byang chub drung lpags kyang // khyod kyi ba
174b8(mdo sde): sku tsam yang ma g.yos te// bcom ldan lhun po 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// mi'i dam pa bzod pa'i phyi rol phyin/ sa rnams kun la nongs pa bgyis kyang bzod/
175a1(mdo sde): yang 'byung ba dang skye dang 'chibs pa/ bzod gsungs bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mthu brnyes par ni gshegs pa mi
175a2(mdo sde): g.yo ba// gnas dang gnas ni mkhas pa brnyengs mi mnga'/ khyod kyi sems can mang po byang chub bkod// mchod gnas rgyal ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
175a3(mdo sde): 'dus bgyis nyams chung chung po med par mkhyen// skye bo'i tshogs ni nyung ba ma legs sel// khyed kyi mkhyen pa srid gsum khyad par 'phags// ye shes pha rol
175a4(mdo sde): phyin la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can long ba sdug bsngal mgon med pa// de dag khyod kyi dkon mchog gsum tshim bgyis// khyod ni bdud dpung bcas sgrags
175a5(mdo sde): mdzad pa// bcom ldan mgon gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// stobs dang bsam gtan dang ni dbang po bsgoms// khyod kyi bdud ni dpung dang bcas pa bcom/
175a6(mdo sde): srid pa rnams kyi nang na mchog gyur pa// thub pa dbang po bsgoms la phyag 'tshal lo// bdud pa'i rtsa ba brgya chen chos bsams pa// mtshungs med byang chub la
175a7(mdo sde): ni chags mi mnga'// gribs ma lta bu mkhyen nas bde gsung pa/ bcom ldan gdugs 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dren pa mi 'drar chos rnams thug su chud//
175a8(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i 'khor lo rmi 'dra rab tu bskor// 'dus bgyis yang dag du na rmi lam 'drar// mkhyen nas sems can mang po dran par mdzad// khyed kyi ljags
175b1(mdo sde): mchog dag pa dri mi mngal// ljags kyi rang gi zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khyebs/ ljags ni pad+ma 'dab ma brgyas lta bu/ ljags skyon mi mnga' khyod la phyag
175b2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// srid gsum kun la chags pa mi mnga' ba// 'gro ba rnams la 'dun pa'i skyon mi gsung // 'dun pa'i 'dod chags bral ba ma smad pa// byang chub
175b3(mdo sde): mchog la srog chags 'dun par mdzad// nyon mongs dag dang sdig pa'i dgra spangs pa// sna yi 'dod chags bral zhing chags mi mnga'// mi'i dam pa gser lta
175b4(mdo sde): dpal sdug pa// khyod kyi mtshan dang grags pa chub par grags/ gnas dang dbang po rnam par 'byed la mkhas// 'di na bzhugs shing 'gro ba'i mig tu 'gyur//
175b5(mdo sde): gnas dang yig 'bru tshig gi don brlabs nas// khyod kyi chu bo bzhi la zam pa btags// glang po rin thang ma mchis sbyin pa mdzad// 'dren pa mi dang lha rnams
175b6(mdo sde): sgrol ba'o// khyod kyis yon tan mtha'i mi brnyed do// mgon po khyod la bdag gi thal mo sbyor// mi'i mchog la rdul ni sbyin byin pas// mi 'jed 'dzam bu'i
175b7(mdo sde): rgyal por gyur lags na/ 'dir ni dbang po dad pas thal sbyar nas/ skyabs su nye bar mchi ba spos ci 'tshal// phung po bsog ste snying po med// stong pa smra/
175b8(mdo sde): mchu zla 'dra bar ni// go'u tam khyod kyis de dag yang dag mkhyen// phung po mkhas pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sred pa'i sred bus dam du 'dud bor te// srid
176a1(mdo sde): pa'i 'gro bar dra bar rab grags pa// srid par 'gro ba rnams kyi dra ba de// bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen pa'i 'od kyi dral// tshangs
176a2(mdo sde): pa'i sgra skad lta bu'i gsung brjod pa// sho bi ma lags mi 'gyur dri ma lags// phun gsum tshogs gsung de dag thos nas na// thal mo sbyar te skyabs su nye
176a3(mdo sde): bar mchi// phyag gi 'thil gyis 'dir reg pa na// nags tshal bcas par rnam pa drug g.yos kyang // 'dir ni zhabs la gnod par 'gyur ma mchis// bdud
176a4(mdo sde): phyogs dgra bcom khyod la phyag 'tshalo// lha'i rgyal po che dang mkhas pa gang // khyod kyis chos don gnyer zhing mchis pa rnams// de dag so sor chos bstan
176a5(mdo sde): thos nas su// zhabs gnyis la ni rab tu 'dug par bgyid// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i sras rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad
