176a6(mdo sde): pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
176a7(mdo sde): yang dag par zhugs nas// bud med kyi dngos pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus na/ ji ltar bdag
176a8(mdo sde): cag bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te// skyes pa'i dngos po thob pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par
176b1(mdo sde): gyur pa de lta bu'i chos de// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la legs par bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mi
176b2(mdo sde): 'ab ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i sras de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sring mo dag de'i phyir rab tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ji ltar bud med kyi
176b3(mdo sde): dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par 'gyur ba ngas khyod
176b4(mdo sde): la bshed par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po slas rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang /
176b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sring mo dag chos cig dang ldan na bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing /
176b6(mdo sde): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par 'gyur te/ chos cig po gang zhe ni 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas/
176b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems bskyed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pas sems bskyed pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten gsum las khyad
176b8(mdo sde): bar du 'phags pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brjod pa med pa'i sems bskyed de/ sring po dag chos cig po 'di dang ldan na/
177a1(mdo sde): bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing med/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
177a2(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par gyur to// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos gnyis dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/
177a3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ phra dog med pa de dag ser sna med pa ste/ sring mo chos 'di gnyis dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos
177a4(mdo sde): po thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos
177a5(mdo sde): gsum dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang
177a6(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lus kyi sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa dang / ngag gi sdom pa bzhi
177a7(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa dang / yid kyi sdom pa yongs su dag pa dang / sring po dag chos gsum po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las
177a8(mdo sde): gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par 'gyur ro// sring mo
177b1(mdo sde): dag gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
177b2(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ g.yo ba med par sbyin pa byin pa dang / g.yo ba med pa'i slab par 'dzin pa'i
177b3(mdo sde): gnas yin pa dang / g.yo med pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa dang / g.yo med par chos nyan pa ste/ sring mo dag chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud
177b4(mdo sde): med kyi dngos po las sgyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par
177b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// sring mo dag chos lnga dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
177b6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par 'gyur ro// lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos thos nas tshul bzhin du
177b7(mdo sde): so sor rtog pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas bud med kyi dngos po las smod pa dang / rtag par rgyun tu skyes pa'i lus thob par sems bskyed pa dang / ji skad
177b8(mdo sde): smras pa bzhin du byed pa ste/ sring mo dag chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing / myur du/
178a1(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos
178a2(mdo sde): drug dang ldan da/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
178a3(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par 'gyur ste/ drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ drang ba dang gnyen pa dang / rgyu med pa dang / g.yo med pa dang /
178a4(mdo sde): gsal ba dang / bcos pa med pa ste/ sring mo dang chos drag po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing /
178a5(mdo sde): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par 'gyur te/ sring mo dag chos bdun dang ldan na/ bud med bud med
178a6(mdo sde): kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bdun
178a7(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sku thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thob par bya ba'i phyir// chos rjesu dran pa
178a8(mdo sde): dang / rang gi phyi ma'i dge 'dun bsdu ba'i phyir/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / smon lam yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /
178b1(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir// lha rjes su dran pa dang /
178b2(mdo sde): de dag grol ba'i phyir thams cad la sems dpa' lta ba ste/ sring mo dag chos bdun po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i
178b3(mdo sde): dngos po thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos brgyad dang ldan na/
178b4(mdo sde): bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing / myur da bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
178b5(mdo sde): rgya bar 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ zas la sred pa ma yin pa dang / skems la sred pa ma yin pa dang / me tog dang spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa
178b6(mdo sde): dang / phye ma la sred pa ma yin pa dang / skyed mes tshal du 'gro bar sred pa ma yin pa dang / dgod pa dang 'jo ba las sred pa ma yin pa dang / glu dang gar dang rol
178b7(mdo sde): me'i dbyangs sgral sred pa ma yin pa dang / dga' ba dang rtse ba la sred pa ma yin pa dang / rna ba dang s+tha dang / sna dang dri dang / lce dang ro dang / lus la dga'
178b8(mdo sde): ba la sred pa ma yin pa ste/ sring mo dag ces brgyad po 'di dag ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos pa thob cing / gyur
179a1(mdo sde): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos dgu
179a2(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par
179a3(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ dgu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chad par lta ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par lta ba ma yin pa dang / bdag du smra ba ma yin pa dang /
179a4(mdo sde): sems can du smra ba ma yin pa dang / srog tu smra ba ma yin pa dang / gang zag tu smra ba ma yin pa dang / 'byung bar lta ba ma yin pa dang / 'jig par lta ba ma yin pa dang
179a5(mdo sde): rgyu dang rkyen la 'jug pa la mkhas pa ste/ sring mo dag chos dgu po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing
179a6(mdo sde): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la byam/
179a7(mdo sde): par gnas pa dang / gzhan gyi longs spyod la brnab sems mi bskyed pa dang / skyes pa'i sems su yid la byed pa dang / skyed pa dang srog gi phyir yang rdzun gyi
179a8(mdo sde): tshig mi smra ba dang / phra ma'i tshig mi smra ba dang / zhe gcod pa'i tshig mi smra ba dang / tshig kyal ba mi smra ba dang / pha rol rtse zhing dga' la phra dog med cing // gnod
179b1(mdo sde): sems kyi bag la nyal la mngon par mi bsgrub pa dang / yang dag par lta ba dang / ldan par gyur pa dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa ste/ sring mo dag chos
179b2(mdo sde): bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang
179b3(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo gzhan yang bud med zab mo la mos pa yin/ de gzugs la dbu ba rdos pa lta bu so sor rtogs kyang gzug
179b4(mdo sde): kyis rgyags shing myos par mi 'gyur ba dang / tshor ba la chu'i chu bur so sor rtog kyang / dge ba'i tshor ba la rjes su chags pa med pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi tsher
179b5(mdo sde): ba la khong khro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor bas kun tu gti mug par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'du shes la smig rgyu lta bur
179b6(mdo sde): so sor rtog cing bud med kyi 'du shes mi skyed pa dang / 'du byed rnams la chu shing gi phung po lta bur so sor rtogs te/ 'du byed thams cad la snying po med par
179b7(mdo sde): rtogs nas/ 'du byed thams cad la me gnas shing / de la gnas shes pa la rgyu ma lta bur so sor rtogs te/ sems dang yid dang rnam par rig pa de sgyu ma
179b8(mdo sde): byas bzhin du rtogs nas/ chos thams cad la chags pa med/ zhe sdang med gti mug med pa dang / lus la 'byung chen po bzhi dang ldan par so sor rtogs ste/
179b9(mdo sde): mi bskyed pa dang / rnam pa
180a1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sa'i khams dang ldan pa ste/ chu'i khams dang ldan pa dang / med khams dang ldan pa dang / rlung gi khams dang ldan/
180a2(mdo sde): par lus la so sor rtog go/ lus 'di ni bsdus pa rtsa dang shing dang / bong ba dang / rtsig pa dang / mig yor lta bu ste/ 'di bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin//
180a3(mdo sde): srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin gyi/ phyin ci log sngon du song bas/ rgyu dang bya dang / las kyi byung ba'o// gzhan yang bud med mig la kha
180a4(mdo sde): zas las skyes pa/ sha'i gong bu/ ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa/ rang bzhin dben par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang /
180a5(mdo sde): sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa rang bzhin gyis dben par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang / gzhan yang bud
180a6(mdo sde): med lus la gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jug pa dang / ngag la brag cha lta bur 'jug pa dang / sems la sgyu ma lta bur 'jug pa'o// sring mo dag chos bzhi
180a7(mdo sde): po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
180a8(mdo sde): kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i sras de dag thams cad kyis// bcom ldan 'das las bud med
180b1(mdo sde): kyi dngos po las bsgyur ba'i rnam grangs 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste/ yid rangs shing rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das
180b2(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// med pa dri bral dri ma
180b3(mdo sde): gcod mdzad pa rdul me rdul bral lhag pa'i gzi brjid mnga'// pad ma'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan dang mdzes pa'i thugs// dri med zla zhal khyod la phyag 'tshalo//
180b4(mdo sde): dga' mdzad zhi mdzad nyon mongs gcod mdzad pa/ dga' ba ston pa rtag tu dgon par skyes/ rin chen 'byung gnas rin chen mdzod mnga' ba/ yon tan
180b5(mdo sde): mchog mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// pha rol gshegs pa gzhan gyi tshogs rnams 'joms// pad ma lta bur stong mchog dka' mchid gsungs// lam
180b6(mdo sde): mchog stsal zhing dam pa'i don ston pa// mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chu bo bzhi rgal bden bzhi dga' mchid gsung// sa la rgyu ba 'di
180b7(mdo sde): la mig stsol ba// 'khor lo mchog gi mtshan ni stong mnga' ba// rdul med pan mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs rdul brtsal dam pa mthu bo che//
180b8(mdo sde): mgon po 'gro ba mchog gi don mdzad pa// bdud kyi dpung rnams stobs med 'jig mdzad pa// bcom ldan stobs bcu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// srid pa'i
181a1(mdo sde): khri shing gcod mdzad mnyam pa med/ brnyes pa dag dang ma mnyes mtshungs mnyam thugs// 'jig rten mthar phyin snang ba'i sgron mdzad
181a2(mdo sde): pa/ rgya mtsho lta bu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dul zhing stobs bcu chen po dam pa mnga'// sbyin pa stsol cing rtag tu gtong la dgyes// dul bzhi gnas yon tan pha
181a3(mdo sde): rol phyin// nyon mongs brdul bsal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan mchog dam pa kun la kun la dam pa bstsol// skye bo'i 'dren pa lha'i mchog pas mchog/
181a4(mdo sde): sems dang stobs dang bzod par dgyes// mchos 'os bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mar me lta bu dri med zla ba 'dra/ phyi nang nyon mongs dri ma gcod mdzad
181a5(mdo sde): pa// nyon mongs spangs pa yon tan bsod nams gter// dad pa rtsol ba dge sbyong zhi mdzad pa// ston pa skye mched drug las mthar mdzad pa/ rjes su drug shin
181a6(mdo sde): du yongs dag dran/ rgyal ba dge sbyong rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dom gang 'od ni gser gyi kha dog lta// gsung snyan dam pa rnam par dag pa'i dbyangs/ bcom ldan
181a7(mdo sde): gang zag dam pa skyes bu mchog/ srid gsum zhi mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// shes rab mun pa ma mchis pha rol gshegs// rtag tu dka' thub rtul shugs
181a8(mdo sde): rab tu spyod/ de bzhin kho na gzhan min de bzhin gsungs/ mun pa sgrol ma 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// bde gshegs grags ldan yon tan bsam 'tshal ba/ de bzhin
181b1(mdo sde): nyid kyi chos kyi gnas ston pa// yon tan brjod pa mtho zhing grags bsgrags pa/ mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sngags la gnas zhing brtul shugs
181b2(mdo sde): dka' thub 'phags// khyengs dang nga rgyal rgyags pa gcod mdzad pa// ye shes 'byung gnas rdul bral blo gros mchog/ skye bo mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ka la
181b3(mdo sde): ping ka tshangs dbyangs thugs rje can/ 'dod pa rtsol bgyid dri ma sel mdzad pa/ phung po yongs su mkhyen mkhas pa bde bar gshegs/ yon tan mchog mnga' khyod la
181b4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan ston pa yon tan bstod pas mchod// zab mo lta ba shin tu rtogs pa dka'// 'dzum pa zhal 'dra gsung bar gsung mdzad pa// bdud stobs
181b5(mdo sde): 'joms mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mnyam thugs kha lo bsgyur ba rab du dul thugs// kun gyi mngon gsum bstod pa mnyam pa'i lam la gnas// thub pa
181b6(mdo sde): mchog gsung bden pa'i bka' mchid can/ bde gshegs mnyam thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lam rtsol snyan pa shin tu 'jam pa'i dbyangs// bdud kyi sde mang
181b7(mdo sde): 'joms mdzad nga rgyal ba// gzhan dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal mi 'da' tshul mi chos// thub pa dge sbyong rtsal la phyag 'tshal lo// stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus bsam
181b8(mdo sde): gtan dgyes/ rtag tu 'dod chags skyon bral rab rib bral/ bde bar gshegs pa mi g.yo gnas la bzhugs// stobs bcu mchog mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshalo//
182a1(mdo sde): phyag dang zhabs ni dri med dra bas 'brel// skye dang rga dang mchi ba mi mnga' ba// rgal bar 'os pa 'gro ba kun las brgal/ na mkha' mnyam
182a2(mdo sde): thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i sa/ mi'am ci'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag gis// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btugs
182a3(mdo sde): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
182a4(mdo sde): rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi bsgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma/ kha dog sna tshogs 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang /
182a5(mdo sde): ser po dang / dmar po dang / le ba rgan dang / shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu'o// de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams yas mu med par 'od kyis khyab par byas ste/
182a6(mdo sde): tshangs 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas/ nyi ma dang zla 'od zil gyis brlag par bya ste/ slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas te/
182a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub po// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha
182a8(mdo sde): nga sa la btsugs te/ zhe dang bcas shing gus pa dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ tshigs su bcad par bsgrub pa 'dis/
182b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus pa/ bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa/ zla ba dri ma med zhal khyod la zhu/ dri med
182b2(mdo sde): gzi brjid mnga' ba khyod la zhu/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu khyod la zhu/ bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzub ston pa/ dam pa'i gzugs rnams mang po khyod la zhu/
182b3(mdo sde): 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad khyod la zhu/ lha'i rnams kyi mchod pa khyod la zhu/ bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa/ sbyin dang dul brtson pa khyod la zhu/
182b4(mdo sde): tshul khrims yongs dag gyur pa khyod la zhu// bzod pa'i stobs rtsol khyod la zhwa/ bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa/ brtson 'grus stobs dang mthu
182b5(mdo sde): mnga' khyod la zhu/ bsam gtan mngon shes dgyes pa khyod la zhu// shes rab na mkha' mnyam pa khyed la zhu/ bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa/ rtag
182b6(mdo sde): tu byams pa'i stobs can khyod la zhu/ rtag tu thugs rje ldan pa khyod la zhu/ dga' dang btang snyoms dges pa khyod la zhu/ bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum
182b7(mdo sde): ston pa// srid pa gsum po mthar 'byin khyod la zhu// spyan gsum dri ma mi mnga' khyod la zhu/ bdud rtsi chos rnams gsung ba khyod la zhu bde bar gshegs pa/
182b8(mdo sde): ci srad 'jum ston pa/ bdud rnams tha mar 'byin pa khyod la zhu/ ngan pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms pa khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'jub ston pa/
183a1(mdo sde): stobs can dam pa mnga' ba khyod la zhu/ the tshom dag cing gcod mdzad khyod la zhu/ yon tan stong gi brgyan pa khyod la zhu// de skad ces
183a2(mdo sde): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' bstsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i slas rnams de las dge
183a3(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba skyed de/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bud med kyi dngos po las gyur zhing / skyes pa'i dngos
183a4(mdo sde): po thob par bya ba'i phyir/ nga'i rkang pa gnyis la btugs pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
183a5(mdo sde): kun dga' bo mi 'am ci'i slas brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis lhag pa'i bsam pas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'dris/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ bud med
183a6(mdo sde): kyi dngos po los gyur te/ skyes pa'i lus thob nas/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang bskal pa mnyam par bskye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang byang chub sems
183a7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang lhan cig tu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di kun 'gro bar byed par 'gyur ro// byams pa/
183a8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub thob pa na/ mnyes par byed cing dam pa'i chos kyang kun 'gro bar byed par 'gyur ro// bskal pa bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa
183b1(mdo sde): thams cad la yang rim gyis gnyis par byed par 'gyur/ de dag gi dam pa'i chos kun kyang 'gro bar byed par 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur/ de dag ribs kyis byang /
183b2(mdo sde): chub kyi tshogs kyis yang dag par sgrub par bya/ thams cad kun tu rdzogs par byas nas/ gang gis tshe mi 'am ci'i rgyal po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
183b3(mdo sde): mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur te/ des de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bston par
183b4(mdo sde): yang 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la sangs
183b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad do// ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad kyi sgo bkum mo// bde 'gro thams cad kyi shul rnam par sbyangs so// bdag cag byang chub kyi shul la rab
183b6(mdo sde): tu bkod do// bdag cag la chos kyi gter bstan to// bdag cag ye shes kyi sa la bkod do// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'bar bar mdzad do// pha rol tu phyin
183b7(mdo sde): pa'i phyogs bstan to// thabs la mkhas pa bstan to// bdag cag byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin tu rtsal to// chos bsgrubs pas rab tu dga' bar
183b8(mdo sde): mdzad do// dga' ba dang dang ba mchog tu dka' ba thob pas/ yang dag par gzeng bstod do// chos zab mo'i bzod pa la dga' bar mdzad do// bdag cag phyir
184a1(mdo sde): mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu bkod do// bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la byas pa bzo ba lags kyis/ byas pa li bzo ba ma lags
184a2(mdo sde): kyang / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi sha dang khrag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la lan mi lon na/ gzhan gyis lan lon par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal//
184a3(mdo sde): de nas 'khor de'i nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'di ji srid cig na/ bla na med pa yang dag
184a4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di'i ming ni 'di skad ces bya bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni ji snyed cig tu 'gyur//
184a5(mdo sde): longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur// de'i sems can bkod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ni/ ci 'dra ba bzhin du
184a6(mdo sde): 'gyur snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyis rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang /
184a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer du ma kha dog brgya stong phrag du ma byung ste/ phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi
184a8(mdo sde): bye ma snyed snang bar bya ste/ sems can rnams kyi ngan song gyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byas nas/ lha dang mi dang lha pa yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
184b1(mdo sde): 'dun par byas te/ slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i btsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang cha dang /
184b2(mdo sde): ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon chad/ mdzad pa'i 'dzum pa mthong nas/ stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
184b3(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'jug ste/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan
184b4(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i 'dzum pa ci 'dra bar/
184b5(mdo sde): de ring phyung ste thugs med bye ba'i zhing / rgyan chen phyogs bcu'i gang ga'i rdul mtha' yas/ khyab pa 'di 'dra sngon mchad yongs ma mthong / tshangs pa de bzhin
184b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba dang / nor bu med na nyi ma zla ba'i 'od/ mi dbang gzi brjid kyi ni zil du brlag/ 'dzum mdzad 'di'i rgyu ni lung bstan gsol// su'i ched
184b7(mdo sde): du dpa' bo khyod kyis 'od phyung bas// 'dir ni ngan song gsum zhi byang chub yan lag rdzogs/ chos kyi rjes bdag cag rnams kyis dogs pa sol/ mi rnams
184b8(mdo sde): kyis ni yid gnyis ma lus legs par khum/ 'khor kun dga' bas rtog bgyid na/ su slad di ring 'dzum pa bstan/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
185a1(mdo sde): bos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bskor ba byas nas rang gi bstan la 'dug ste/ de nas/
185a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi de'i tshe glang po che'i lta stangs kyis bcur gzigs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis mi 'am/
185a3(mdo sde): ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'dis tshul 'di lta bu dang / rgya che ba 'di lta bu dang / rnam pa 'di lta bu 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas pa mthong ngam/ gsol ba bcom
185a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'di bskal
185a5(mdo sde): pa bye ba phrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par 'gyur te/ dkon mchog
185a6(mdo sde): 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon
185a7(mdo sde): tan rgyal po sdang ba zhes bya ba/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dal ba/ kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/
185a8(mdo sde): lha dang mi rnams kyis ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dri ma med pa de ni lag 'thil ltar
185b1(mdo sde): mnyam par gyur te/ bai dUr+ya dkar po las grub pa/ zla ba lta bur snang ba/ shin dri dri ba med pa/ shin tu rnam par dag pa/ 'ching bu med pa'o// de bzhin gshegs
185b2(mdo sde): pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang tshad med par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa/ rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob
185b3(mdo sde): pa sha stag go/ byang chub sems dpa'i de dag thams cad ni na mkha' la khang partsegs pa// bai dUr+ya sngon po las grub pa'i sa chen po der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
185b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba der gzugs brnyan sdang bar 'gyur ro// de dag gi mthong ma thag tu chos 'di dag thams cad ni gzugs brnyan lta bu'o zhes
185b5(mdo sde): dran pa skye bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' gang the tshom za ba na/ de de bzhin gshegs pas de la snang bar 'gyur de la gzugs brnyan/ de bzhin gshegs pa des
185b6(mdo sde): kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag la zhus pa'i lung bstan pas/ sems rangs par mdzad par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi chos de thos nas mi
185b7(mdo sde): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i
185b8(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor yod par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams cad kyang na mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa na 'khod par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bud med du
186a1(mdo sde): gdags pa'ang med par 'gyur ro// sems cad de dag thams cad kyang bde ba'i snying po las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi
186a2(mdo sde): khams kha zas su gdags pa med do// sems can de dag thams cad ni bsam gtan la dga' ba dang / chos la dga' ba'i zas su gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams
186a3(mdo sde): de ni theg pa gzhan rnam bzhag pa med de/ sems can de dag thams cad ni/ theg pa chen po la nges par gyur pa dag go/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na tshul khrims log
186a4(mdo sde): par zhugs pa 'am/ lta ba log par zhugs pa'am/ 'tshe ba log par zhugs pa'am/ chos log par zhugs pa 'am/ 'tsho ba log par zhugs pa'i sems can
186a5(mdo sde): 'ga' yang med par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams cad ni nan tan ldan pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la brtson 'grus bsnams par 'gyur ba sha stag go//
186a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bdud dam/ bdud kyi rigs kyi lha 'am/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa na/ kun tu rgyu dang / dmigs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhugs pa dang
186a7(mdo sde): phas kyi rgol ba med par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams cad ni zab me'i spyod yul can stong pa nyid kyis btab par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de na ming
186a8(mdo sde): du btags pa tsam dang / 'du shes tsam ma gtogs par lha dang mi zhes bya ba tha dad du bya ba 'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams cad ni yongs su smod pa mtshungs
186b1(mdo sde): chom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
186b2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan kyi rgyal por snang ba de yang lha dang / mi rnams kyi skye bo mang po la phan pa dang //
186b3(mdo sde): skye bo mang po la po la bde ba'i phyir/ bar gyi bskal pa bcu thams par zhugs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan kyi rgyal por sdang
186b4(mdo sde): ba gang gyi tshe/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gzhed pa de'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar ba 'di nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang
186b5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa chen
186b6(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya bar lung bstan na/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// kun dga'
186b7(mdo sde): bo bar gyi bskal pa de yang / sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur to// bar gyi bskal pa de
186b8(mdo sde): ni dkon mchog 'byung ba zhes brjod do// de nas mi 'ab ci'i rgyal po ljon pas bcom ldan 'das lung bstan pa thob nas/ dga' zhing mgu ste/ yid rangs shing
186b9(mdo sde): dga' nas/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i shugs kyis sa las steng gi bar snang la shing rta
187a1(mdo sde): la bdun tsam du 'phags te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang ba rgya cher spel ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/
187a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang rang gi shes rab kyi spobs pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// chos 'di dag thams cad rab tu dben pa dang / dri ma med
187a3(mdo sde): ba na mkha'i ngo bo nyid/ rgyud kun gyi dam pa 'di ni rnams shes na/ de phyir de dag thub pras mthu bor 'gyur/ de phyir rmi lam bzhin du mthong ba chung bzad med//
187a4(mdo sde): thams cad med de gzugs med gsog dang gsob// chos rnams thams cad rmi lam 'drar shes nas 'dus byas dag la nam yang skyo ba med/ la las rgyu ba'i
187a5(mdo sde): glang chen dang / shing rta dpung bu chung dang gzhon mthong ba// dam pa'i don du snying po med pa ltar/ phung po 'di dag sgyu 'dra snying po med// gzugs rnams kyi
187a6(mdo sde): rang bzhin dru ba rdos pa bzhin/ tshor ba 'di ni chu'i chu bur 'dra/ 'du shes dag ni mig sgra 'dra bar gsungs/ 'dus byas thams cad chu shing snying po med// srid gsum
187a7(mdo sde): 'di na sems yid rnam par shes// rgyal bas de bzhin sgra 'dra gsog du gsungs// gzugs kyi rang bzhin stong par shes nas ni/ 'dus byas dag yang skyo ba
187a8(mdo sde): med// khams bzhi po ni chos kyi dbyings 'dra zhing // skye mched rnams ni grong stong lta bu dang / chos 'di gsog gsong lta bur rnam shes pa/ de dag rgyal po'i
187b1(mdo sde): chos mdzod 'dzin pa yin/ rab tu dul phyir sbyin dang dul ba dang // de bzhin tshul khrims rnam dag tshul khrims dang / rtag tu 'phags pa'i tshul gyis bzod mi zad
187b2(mdo sde): stong pa nyid phyir brtson 'grus rnam par dang / bsam gtan rang bzhin 'gyur ba med pa dang / de ltar shes rab chags med ma shes par// gang gi gzugs
187b3(mdo sde): pa de 'drar 'gyur de// pha rol phyin pa'i pha rol rab tu phyin// bdag med kho na nyid phyir byams pa mnyam// nam mkha' lta bur gong du snying rje dag/ zhi phyir dga' dang
187b4(mdo sde): ba dang bskos bcas pa yi// lam 'di chags pa'i lam de rab tu zhi// bsdus pa bzhi po khyad par 'phags pa 'di// rnam par 'dren pas rjes su gzung phyir
187b5(mdo sde): gzungs// 'dzin pa med cing rnam rtog gang med pa// de ni bsdu ba'i dngos po pha rol phyin// sems can 'di dag sems can med/ srog dang gso ba gang
187b6(mdo sde): zag mi snyed do// dbang po drug 'di stong ste rab zhi bar/ gang shes de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin/ sems can med cing byang chub sems dpa' med// de na
187b7(mdo sde): gang du'ang bdag med rloms sems med// gnyis dang bral zhing ma chags spos med pa/ sems can byang chub sems dpa' dang dpal dang ldan// chos
187b8(mdo sde): 'di snying po med de sgyu ma 'dra// gang du'ang mi 'ong nam du 'gro mi 'gyur// chos dbyings 'di'i gnas pa rig nas ni// rgyal bas de bzhin nyid ni mnyam sangs
188a1(mdo sde): rgyas/ gang na'ang yod pa 'am med mod kyi// rgyu la rten nas chos rnams 'byung bas na// mkha' la klog mthong 'jigs pa lta bur ni//
188a2(mdo sde): sems kyi khri shing de ltar shes par bya// rlung ni na mkha' mi chags rgyu ba yin// gzugs med sems ni 'dus byas dag la rgyu// sems kyi rang bzhin rnam dag
188a3(mdo sde): de shes nas/ nyon mongs gzugs med brtsol bar mi 'gyur ro// lus ni tshig pa rtsa dang lo ma 'dra// bems pa rje med rdo shing ngan pa ltar// des ni snga ma'i rang
188a4(mdo sde): bzhin 'drar shes nas/ lus kyi chos la gnas par mi byed do// tshig ni rtag tu bzung med rlung dang 'dra// ri dang phug gi brag cha lta bu ste// de 'drar sgra ni rab tu
188a5(mdo sde): dben shes pa// sgra rnams kun la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags la/ bdag ni na mkha'i ngos nas mi lhung ste/ na mkha' las ni ltung ba'i gnas kyang yod ma yin// /
188a6(mdo sde): chos 'di na mkha' 'dra bar bsgoms nas ni// de ni sems can sems can med mtshungs gnas/ bskal pa brgya phrag mang por bsregs kyang ni// ji ltar nam
188a7(mdo sde): mkha' nam yang sdo mi tshig/ chos rnams thams cad na mkha' 'drar shes pa// de bsregs bskal tshe zhing rnam brgyar yang 'gro/ ri dang ri rab 'khor ra 'khor/
188a8(mdo sde): yug ri// de bzhin ci dang bcas pa'i sa rnams kun// na mkha'i ngos kyis phye bar rig nas de// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis bye ba zhing du 'gro// sa dang chu dang rla dag dang /
188b1(mdo sde): khams bzhi dag ni na mkha' ngas mnyam par// dpa' ba tshul 'di khong du chud pa dag/ mkha' las bye ba mtha' yas zhing du 'gro// srid pa gsum na sgra dang skad
188b2(mdo sde): kya bag bzang ngan de bzhin 'bring po ji yod pa/ de'i tha ma bskal pa brgyad brjod pa// rang gi rang bzhin mi snang rgyu ba med// rang 'byung ba ni mtshan ma ma yin yang /
188b3(mdo sde): sems kyi chos kyi gzugs kyis rab tu phye// sems dang yid ni bden par mtshungs par 'gyur// rgyal ba thams cad tshungs nyid phyir mnyam// sngon gyi srid par
188b4(mdo sde): byang chub spyad spyod cing // dge ba brgyad stong rab tu brtsams nas ni// byang chub mnyam zhing mnyam par rab shes pa/ grags pa chen po rnams ni lung bstan 'gyur//
188b5(mdo sde): chos rnams kun ni rang yul yongs dag ste/ mtha' yas phyir ni rgyal ba'i yul du mnyam// mnyam nyid 'di dag gang ging rab shes pa/ yon tan ldan pa de dag lung
188b6(mdo sde): bstan 'gyur// bdag ni gzugs min tsher min 'du shes min// sems pa ma yin rnam par shes min kyang // byang chub khong du chud pas lung bstan gsol/
188b7(mdo sde): phung po khams kyis bdag ni lung ba bstan// bzod pa gang gis bzod nas mazhi'o// skad cig ni zang dang 'dra min la// / mtshungs med mi skye ba la bzod
188b8(mdo sde): pa ni// mi dbang sgyur zhes rgyal bas lung bstan to// chos rnams kun dang bdag tu rang bzhin mnyam// bdag ni bdag med ston pa'i rang bzhin te// stong
189a1(mdo sde): pa na mkha' 'dra ba'i ngo bo nyid// byang chub na mkha' mnyam pa'i rang bzhin no// zad par bya phyir zad pa shes mi nus// mi zad pa ni
189a2(mdo sde): zad pas zad mi 'gyur// zad pa'i sgos chos rnams kun ma skyes te// bzod dang ldan na sangs rgyas lung bstan to// mtshan ma med gnas 'jug pa'i gnas mede/
189a3(mdo sde): yang dag 'dus ma byas pa dus las grol// ma byas byed du ma bcug byung ba min// de bzhin nyid 'drar rgyal bas bdag lung bstan// gal te bdag ni lung bstan
189a4(mdo sde): 'gyur snyam na// chos lam tshul la mi mnyam sbyor ba yin// sems dang yid kyi sbyor ba sbyor ma yin/ chos sbyor khyad par 'phags 'di mtshungs shing mnyam/
189a5(mdo sde): khyed cag sa'i steng na rnam par 'khod// bdag ni na mkha'i dkyil na rnam par gnas// sa dang na mkha'i mnyam par shes nas ni// srid pa gsum na tshags med ye//
189a6(mdo sde): shes 'jug/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas// steng gi bar snang la babs te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag
189a7(mdo sde): 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas ni bdag ched du byung ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
189a8(mdo sde): 'das bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa don pa mchis par ma bgyis te/ sngon gyi dge ba rnams kyis bdag ma bslus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis
189b1(mdo sde): bsam pa thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems/
189b2(mdo sde): dpa' kha gcig 'di lta bu'i sems bskyes te/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang las
189b3(mdo sde): dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gcod pan gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de
189b4(mdo sde): dag gis// sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon
189b5(mdo sde): pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang las byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
189b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i dus// bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa rgyas pa// bsam gyis mi khyabs par 'gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus
189b7(mdo sde): na// rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la// 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /
189b8(mdo sde): zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
190a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das rin chen phung po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
190a2(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen phung po de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni/ bye ba phrag drug bcur gyur te/ thams cad kyang brtson
190a3(mdo sde): 'grus brtsams pa/ bzod pa thob pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go/ de'i tshe tshad ni lo bye ba phrag drag bcu
190a4(mdo sde): thub par gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba zhes bya ba de yang bai dUr+ya las grub pa/ brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa//
190a5(mdo sde): dga' ldan gyi lha'i rigs lta bur khang khyim dang / longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba bsams pa ba tsam gyis 'byor pa'o//
190a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na theg pa chen po ma gtog par/ theg pa gzhan rnam par bzhag pa med par gyur to// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gling bzhi pa'i
190a7(mdo sde): dbang ba'i 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po sa 'dzin ces bya ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ de'i slas stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de// de'i bu ni steng tham pa
190a8(mdo sde): yod do// dpa' brdal phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa sha stag go// rigs kyi rgyal po sa 'dzin des/
190b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i phung po de dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu la/ lo bye ba thams par yid du 'ong ba dang / chos gos
190b2(mdo sde): dang / zhal zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams dang / bde bar sbyor ba dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba thams
190b3(mdo sde): cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas/ des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de la mchod pa dpag tu med med pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba nye
190b4(mdo sde): bar bstan nas/ bud med bzhi stong po de dag dang / stong po de dag dang / srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
190b5(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas kyang lo bye bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de la bsnyen bkur byas
190b6(mdo sde): so// dus gzhan zhig na/ bu mthu bo rdul shugs yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba/ rgyal por bcug nas/ rgyal srid thams cad bor te/ skra dang kha pu breg nas
190b7(mdo sde): gos dur smrig/ bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // de nas rgyal po'i bu de dag gis kyang rim gyis bu mthu
190b8(mdo sde): bai re re rgyal por bcug nas/ pha'i rjes su rab tu byung bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ rnam grangs 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe tshad ring bar gyur to//
191a1(mdo sde): rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa de las rab tu byung na/ rgyal po gzhon nu tha chung snying rje'i blo zhes bya ba gcig pu/
191a2(mdo sde): ma rtogs pa te/ de ni chos kyi rgyal srid byed pa tshad med pa dang / mtshon cha med par chos dang 'thun par dbang byed du bcug go/ rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyal po
191a3(mdo sde): sa 'dzin de bu dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ thog ma dang bar ma dang tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de dam pa'i
191a4(mdo sde): chos rab tu bzung ngo // rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po sa 'dzin ces bya bar gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig
191a5(mdo sde): yin snyam du khyod dogs shing the tshom za ba 'am/ yid gnyis su gyur par lta na/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ba/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal
191a6(mdo sde): po ljon pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po sa 'dzin ces bya bar gyur to// rgyal po de'i bur gyur pa de dag thams cad ni de ltar phyogs bcu na byang chub sems dpa'
191a7(mdo sde): spyad pa spyod do// rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de la/ bla na med pa yang
191a8(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed tshun chad de'i bar thams cad du
191b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang // dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang ma bral bar gyur to// 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyang
191b2(mdo sde): myur du yang dag par bsgrub pas/ 'di la ngas 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
191b3(mdo sde): yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan/
191b4(mdo sde): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa mi mnga'
191b5(mdo sde): ba'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pas 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'das bgyis pa'i rgyas pas na/ yun ring du legs par yang bcom ldan 'das gyis sgribs
191b6(mdo sde): pa mi mnga' ba'i mkhyen pas gzigs pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// /
191b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang ldan no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/
191b8(mdo sde): gang sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa'i sems kyi rgyud zad pa 'gags pa bral ba rnam par gyur pa/ rgyud gang dag las sems kyi rgyud de dag byung ba dang /
192a1(mdo sde): rgyu gang dag med pas zad pa/ dge ba 'am/ lung du bstan pa 'am/ lung du ma bstan pa de dag thams cad rnam pa dang bcas/
192a2(mdo sde): bzhi dang bcas/ gtan tshig dang bcad par de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so// da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi sems can thams cad kyi rgyud 'byung ba/ dge ba 'am/
192a3(mdo sde): mi dge ba 'am/ lung du bstan pa 'am/ lung du ma bstan pa yang rung ste/ sems gang gi 'og tu sems gang 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa dang bcas/
192a4(mdo sde): yul dang bcas/ gzhi ci las gyur pa dang bcas par/ de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so// gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rgyud dang
192a5(mdo sde): sems las byung ba'i chos dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ lung bstan pa 'am/ lung du ma bstan pa yang rung ste/ sems gang gi 'og tu sems gang 'byung bar
192a6(mdo sde): 'gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang bcas/ gzhi ci las gyur pa dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so// /
192a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas bcom ldan
192a8(mdo sde): 'das/ sangs rgyas ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan no/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa thogs pa me mnga' ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ bsrog chags
192b1(mdo sde): sum 'bum gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas bcom ldan byang chub sems dpa' dang /
192b2(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang 'khor dang 'khor bcas pa la zhag bdun bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyi bsnyen bkur byas nas/ yongs su longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir/ rang
192b3(mdo sde): gi khang khyim dang / 'khor gyi khyams de yang bcom ldan 'das la phul te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la bdag thugs rtse ba'i slad du rtag tu 'dir
192b4(mdo sde): gshegs shing bzhags su gsol/ de nas skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang/
192b5(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po la phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i bu dri ma med ces bya bas/ bcom ldan 'das
192b6(mdo sde): la nor bu rin po che'i dra ba phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyal po bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
192b7(mdo sde): byang chub la yang dag par zhugs lags kyang / bdag cag ni sil dbyangs sgra dang / glu dang gar la rab tu rab tu chags/ me tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang //
192b8(mdo sde): byug pa dang / phye ma las bag ma mchis par dga' zhing rtse ba lags na/ ji ltar bdag cag bag ma mchis par mi 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang
192b9(mdo sde): snyan dang / rol mo
193a1(mdo sde): dag par 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i chos rin po che'i phyag brgya'i sgo'i gdams ngag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag cag la stsal du gsol/ de skad
193a2(mdo sde): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i bu dri ma med pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhin bzang de'i phyir deng phyin chad sil snyan dang /
193a3(mdo sde): glu dbyangs de dag las byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos drug bcu rtsa bzhi 'byung bar khyed la byin gyis brlabs par bya'o// drug bcu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta/
193a4(mdo sde): ste/ mi rtag pa'i sgra 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi sgra dang / bdag med pa'i sgra dang / zhi ba'i sgra dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i sgra dang / bden pa'i sgra dang /
193a5(mdo sde): mi skye ba'i sgra dang / dngos po med pa'i sgra dang / 'byung ba med pa'i sgra dang / gnas pa'i sgra dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgra dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i sgra dang / chos
193a6(mdo sde): kyi dbyings kyi sgra dang / sems can med pa'i sgra dang / srog med pa'i sgra dang / gang zag med pa'i sgra dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi sgra dang / gzod pa'i
193a7(mdo sde): sgra dang / brtson 'grus kyi sgra dang / bsam gtan gyi sgra dang / shes rab kyi sgra dang / byams pa'i sgra dang / snying rje'i sgra dang / dga' ba'i sgra dang / btang snyoms
193a8(mdo sde): kyi sgra dang / 'ong ba med pa'i sgra dang / 'gro ba med pa'i sgra dang / rgyu ba med pa'i sgra dang / gnas pa med pa'i sgra dang / brtan pa med pa'i sgra dang / stong pa nyid
193b1(mdo sde): kyi sgra dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang / 'byung ba med pa'i sgra dang / rten pa'i sgra dang / rten med pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos/
193b2(mdo sde): kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub tshad med pa'i sgra dang / nye bar bzhag pa'i sgra dang / yang dag spong ba'i sgra dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i sgra dang / dbang
193b3(mdo sde): po'i sgra dang / stobs kyi sgra dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgra dang / lam gyi sgra dang / lhag mthong gi sgra dang / thabs kyi sgra dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po'i sgra dang /
193b4(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgra dang / bdud tshar bcad pa'i sgra dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i sgra dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang /
193b5(mdo sde): gzugs brnyan dang / chu zla dang / brag cha lta bu'i sgra dang / chos kyi dbyings 'dren pa med pa'i sgra dang / 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i sgra dang / 'byung ba'i sgra dang /
193b6(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba tshogs thams cad kyi sgra dang / rngu ba dang / chu'i chu bur dang / smig rgyu dang / chu shing gi phung po dang / sgyu ma dang / snying po med pa'i sgra dang / ji skad
193b7(mdo sde): du smras pa'i de de bzhin du bya zhing / chos sgrub pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzhin bzang dag de ltar na/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs de
193b8(mdo sde): dag las gang gis khyed bag yod par byang chub kyi chos rnams bsgrub par 'gyur ro// de lta bu'i sgra 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas thams cad dang ldan
194a1(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor ngo tshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom
194a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub 'di byin gyis brlabs kyis/ shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa dang / chos bstan pa dang / ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub
194a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams shin tu yongs su bzung ba ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshe
194a4(mdo sde): pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' yongasu bzung bas/ sems can thams cad yongasu
194a5(mdo sde): bzung bar 'gyur ro// grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' yongasu bzung ba gang yin pa de ni/ sems can thams cad kyi don nyid do// /
194a6(mdo sde): de ltar na sems can gyi ched du/ de dag go cha gang gis sems can tshad med pa/ 'khor ba las mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du gzud par 'gyur ba'i go cha chen po
194a7(mdo sde): gyon no// grogs po dag rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar bzhugs kyang rung / yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongasu bzung ba
194a8(mdo sde): mdzad pa gang yin pa des sems can thams cad yongs su bzung ba yin par rig par bya'o// grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' la gos dang / bsod snyoms dang /
194b1(mdo sde): mal cha dang / na ba'i bsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyi rim 'gror byas nas ni/ sems can thams cad la rim gror byas par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag byang chub
194b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' la/ bde bar sbyar ba nye bar sgrubs pa ni sems can thams cad la bde bar sbyar ba nye bar sgrubs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ grogs po dag
194b3(mdo sde): tha na sems can dpa'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang / sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang ldan
194b4(mdo sde): ba dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir yongs su 'dzin to// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas tsang ma'i
194b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi lha'i bu de dag dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bcom ldan 'das
194b6(mdo sde): kyis legs par gsungs pa la rjes su yid rangs nas/ lha'i me tog rnam pa mang po kha dog sna tshogs pas/ bcom ldan la mngon par gtor to// de nas
194b7(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis sam/ gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi gnas nas/
194b8(mdo sde): bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri gshegs pa ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa las kyi phyir shing rtag gang la/ bcom ldan 'das
195a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / tshangs pa dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs pa de lta bu'i shing rta bkod
195a2(mdo sde): pa bsgrubs te/ shing rta de yang bdag 'khor dang bcas pas grangs na/ de ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas/
195a3(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ yid las byung ba'i lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta dpag tshad lnga/ khyon du dpag tshad lnga pa kha khyer rin po che sna tshogs kyis
195a4(mdo sde): bskor ba/ shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa/ steng du ring po che'i skud pas mig mangs ris su bres pa mngon par sprul nas/ shing rta de la
195a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan sing ge'i khri bkram pa lta na sdug pa/ 'phang du mi bdun yod pa/ ras bcos bu zung brgyad stong mang po mngon par sprul/ byang chub
195a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad kyi stan yang so sor mngon par sprul/ gang dag bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan cing zham
195a7(mdo sde): ring du 'brang bar brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma ris kyi lha'i
195a8(mdo sde): bu de dag gi stan yang shing rta de'i steng du ci rigs par sprul te/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ de lta bu'i shing rta bkod pa de sprul nas thal mo sbyar te/
195b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs rtse ba'i slad du/ shing rta 'di la ji ltar gdan bshams/
195b2(mdo sde): pa rnams la 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs su gsol/ de nas seng ge'i khri de la bcom ldan 'das kyang bzhugs/ byang chub sems dpa'
195b3(mdo sde): dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang 'khor thams cad kyang ci rigs par 'khod do// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis shing rta de
195b4(mdo sde): lags pa g.yas par blangs te/ shing rta la bdun srid kyi steng gi bar snang la 'phags nas/ de nas mi 'am ci'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag thams cad dang /
195b5(mdo sde): bu brgyad stong po de dag dang / gzhan yang mi 'am ci dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po brgyad stong phrag du ma dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa nyid kyang rin po'i tshe'i
195b6(mdo sde): thag pa thogs nas/ shing rta la btags te/ na mkha' las drangs so// bcom ldan 'das steng gi shing rta la bzhugs shing / na mkha'i dkyil nas gshegs pa
195b7(mdo sde): la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis sil bstan dang / glu dbyangs blangs nas mchod pa byed do// mdun du 'ong zhing bcom ldan 'das la tshig su/
195b8(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po// gzugs kyi dam pa dang ni ldan pa dag/ sil snyan dang ni rtag tu bkrol bgyid cing //
196a1(mdo sde): yang dag bsngags pas 'dren la bstod pa bgyid// mtshan mchog bsod nams kyis ni gzi brjid 'gyur// gzugs mchog mthong
196a2(mdo sde): na dga' bar bgyid pa'i gzugs// bden pa'i yon tan la ni tag gnas pa// yon tan mtsho chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams dang khyod
196a3(mdo sde): ma 'dre// g.yas g.yon na yang rnam par mthong ma myong // ji ltar ri rab brtan zhing mi g.yo ba// de ltar khyod kyi sku ni dpal gyis mdzes/ 'dren pa khyod
196a4(mdo sde): kyis rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// chags pa ma mchis par yang mkha' las mchi// na mkha' lta bur dag cing dri mi mnga'// bcom ldan nyon mongs bsal
196a5(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo// lha dbang lha min dbang dang srin po dang / brgya byin tshangs pa dang ni dga' ba'i lha// khyod kyi mdzod spus 'od ni ma mchis gyur/ shes rab
196a6(mdo sde): 'byung gnas shes rab rgya mtsho ldan// sems can gyi sems kyi spyod la mkhas// 'jig rten gsum na 'jig rten gsum na mchod// 'jig rten grags pa'i
196a7(mdo sde): zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// bdud bzhi po yis skyon rnams bsal ba'o// bden pa bzhi la sgom zhing spyod mdzad pa/ rdzu 'phrul bzhi'i stobs kyis snyems mi
196a8(mdo sde): mnga'// sangs rgyas gshegs pas gshegs pa mdzes/ bskal pa brgyar yang skye ba mi mnga' zhing / rtag tu dul la thugs ni mnyam par bzhag/ legs
196b1(mdo sde): par gsungs pas 'gro ba tshim mdzad kyang / khyod ni tshig dang gnas la skad ma lags// khyod kyi gsungs ni yid 'ong rab tu snyan// zhing brgya dag tu thogs
196b2(mdo sde): ba med par mchi// sgra de sems can cig gis thos gyur pa// de dag thams cad bde bas mchim par gyur/ sems can kha lo gyur pa spu cig tu// stong
196b3(mdo sde): gsum rgya mtsho chab rnams zhugs gyur kyang / sems can rig pa rnams la mi gnod la// rdzu 'phrul la yang sngon ni yongs ma gda'// stong gsum gyi ni ri
196b4(mdo sde): bo ri rab dag/ phyag gcig gi ni 'thil du bzhag nas su/ zhing mang bye ba dag tu gshegs mdzad kyang // khyod kyi skra'i stobs ni zhum ma mchis// khyod ni skal
196b5(mdo sde): brgya phrag du ma nas// brtul shugs bka' thub tshul khrims yon tan dang // sbyin dang dul dang sdom dang bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes
196b6(mdo sde): rab shin tu brlabs// sangs rgyas bye ba mang la bsnyen bkur mdzad// de dag rnams kyis bshad pa'i chos kyang bzung // thugs rje ldan zhing 'gro ba'i don
196b7(mdo sde): gyi phyir// khyod la yongs su skyo ba'i thugs mi mnga'// rim 'gror ma bgyis zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / rim 'gror bgyis pas mthong bar 'gyur ma lags/
196b8(mdo sde): dog sa lta bu snyoms shing mi g.yo ste// 'jig rten mchod gnas mi gos pad ma bzhin// chos rnams stong pa mtshan ma ma mchis kyang / chu zla 'dra zhing sgyu ma
197a1(mdo sde): lta bu dang // dbul 'ardos 'di rmi lam klog 'dra dang // smig rgyu'i mtshan nyid lta bur rab tu mkhyen/ ngo bo nyid kyi gang zag bdag ma
197a2(mdo sde): mchis// gdod nas stong zhing mi g.yo rje ma mchis// na mkha' lta bur dag cing dri ma mchis// dngos po bas pa dngos po ma mchis 'dra// las dang bya ba rgyu
197a3(mdo sde): dang rkyen rnams las// byung ba lags kyi rje ni ma mchis par// tshul 'di rnam par sbyang ba mdzad pas na// de phyir khyed ni rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bgyis//
197a4(mdo sde): gang dag 'dren pa mthong zhing thos gyur pa// de dag la ni ngan song 'jigs ma mchis// de dag bde 'gro dag tu mchog gzhol te// srog chags de rnams kyis ni
197a5(mdo sde): legs par brnyed// bdag cag rnams kyis gang dag dam pa khyod// kun tu mchod pas mchod pa bgyis nas su// byang chub tu ni sems kyang bskyed pa bgyis//
197a6(mdo sde): gang zag mchog 'drar thams cad 'gyur bar shog/ nam mkha' la ni dpag tu nus kyi gda'// rgya mtsho chab ni bsam bgyir nus kyang bda'// nyi zla mkha' las sar
197a7(mdo sde): ni lhung gda'i// sangs rgyas yon tan bas par 'gyur mi gda'// de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta la bzhugs te// na mkha'i dkyil gi lam nas gshegs
197a8(mdo sde): par gshegs shing / gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sku las 'od gang gis stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od phyung ba dang /
197b1(mdo sde): 'od de las rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po dang / bya rgod phung po'i ri la yang rab tu khyab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta des rgyal po'i khab
197b2(mdo sde): gyi grong khyer dang // bya rgod phung po'i rig la ba der gshegs so// de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi rgyal po ma skyes sgra blon po dang / rgyal bu dang / tshong dpon
197b3(mdo sde): dang / grong brdal dang / khyim bdag du bcas pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'od des bskul nas/
197b4(mdo sde): phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe me tog dang / gdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thogs te/ bcom ldan
197b5(mdo sde): 'das rtsub pa'i phyir// rings pa rings par rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas/
197b6(mdo sde): ljon pa'i sras rnams shing rta 'dren bzhin du sil snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong byed do// mi 'am ci'i rol mo'i sil snyan gyi sgra des/ bya rgod phung po'i ri thams cad
197b7(mdo sde): du grags par 'gyur ro// de ltar mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa dpung dang bcas// 'khor dang bcas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi/ bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i
197b8(mdo sde): dkyil nas khyer te/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la bzhag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta de las babs nas/ rang gi gnas su gdan gshams pa la
198a1(mdo sde): bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor shing rta de las//
198a2(mdo sde): babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas/ bcom ldan 'das la kun nas bskor te/ rang rang gi
198a3(mdo sde): stan la 'khod do// 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu de dag kyang shing rta de las babs te/ bcom ldan
198a4(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs cig tu 'khod do// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra blon po dang / rgyal bu dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag
198a5(mdo sde): dang / grong brdal dang bcas pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis me tog dang / gdug pa dang / spos dang /
198a6(mdo sde): phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ji ltar thogs pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod
198a7(mdo sde): pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la sku ma bskal tam/ bde
198a8(mdo sde): ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol nas// phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gtsid pan gyis 'di skad
198b1(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das pi ma ci'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa ci zhig thob par/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang te shing rta la zhugs pa/ na mkha'i
198b2(mdo sde): dkyil nas drangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'khor dang bcas pas ci zhig thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
198b3(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba des mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa sras dang bcas/ bu dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas/ 'dir byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de dag
198b4(mdo sde): thams cad nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dag gi bar du mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
198b5(mdo sde): du phan tshun 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs thams cad
198b6(mdo sde): du skye ba dran par 'gyur/ lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba la brtson par 'gyur// sems can thams cad yongs su smin par
198b7(mdo sde): byed pa la spro bar 'gyur/ de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la 'di skad ces smras so// mi 'am ci'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das kyis
198b8(mdo sde): khyod kyis yon tan yongs su brjod pa mdzad pas/ khyod kyi brnyed pa legs pa rnyed kyis/ khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de las shas shig kho bos kyang thob par 'dod
199a1(mdo sde): do/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di thams cad bdag gis khyod dang sems can thams
199a2(mdo sde): cad la dbul lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni gang sems can thams cad dang thun mongs ma yin pa gang yang med do// /
199a3(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' de thams cad ni ser sna can ma yin te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la ser sna mi bskyed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
199a4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la gtong yang yid bde bar mi 'gyur// 'gyod par mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang thams
199a5(mdo sde): cad mkhyen par yongasasu bsngos pa de dang sems can thams cad kyi 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa
199a6(mdo sde): ba gang thams cad mkhyen par yongs su bsngos pa de sems can la sbyor ba dang / sems can gyi phyir 'brang bas 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis gang gis
199a7(mdo sde): phyir// dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa brnyed de// de gnyis las kyi dam pa'i chos thos nas/ de mi shes
199a8(mdo sde): pa'i mun pa dang / gti mug gi ling dog chen pos 'tshams med pa'i 'gyod pa byung ba'i sems bsal nas/ khyod kyi chos la chos kyi snang ba des/ khyod da ltar
199b1(mdo sde): bsgrib pa med pa med pa thob cing gnas pas/ khyod kyis kyang rnyed pa legs par brnyed do// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
199b2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po des gus par bya ste/ ci nas kyang chos kyi tshig dang / yig 'bru cig thos pa yang brjed par mi 'gyur ba dang / chud za bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
199b3(mdo sde): kun tu bzung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / yongs bsrung ba'i phyir bdag chos kyi snod du 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gcod pan
199b4(mdo sde): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi snod du gyur pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
199b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gcod pan la 'di skad ces bka' to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sum bcu
199b6(mdo sde): rtsa gnyis dang ldan na chos kyi snod du 'gyur ro// sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' snod sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis
199b7(mdo sde): brlabs dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i snod bsam pa dang / byang chub kyi lam nye bar ston pa'i snod sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba khyed par 'gro ba'i snod lhag
199b8(mdo sde): ba'i bsam pa dang / mang du bos pa'i snod dran pa dang / lam la 'jug pa'i sdod blo gros dang / don rtogs pa rjes su rtogs pa'i snod rtogs pa dang / longs/
200a1(mdo sde): spyod chen po'i snod sbyin pa dang / bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i snod tshul khrims dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis
200a2(mdo sde): thob pa'i snod bzod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrub pa'i snod brtson 'grus dang / sems las su rung ba'i snod bsam gtan dang / dogs pa tham
200a3(mdo sde): cad las rab tu 'das pa'i snod shes rab dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa'i snod byams pa dang / dbul zhing nyams thag pa thams cad
200a4(mdo sde): skyabs pa'i snod snying rje dang / chos la dga' ba'i snod dga' ba'i rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spangs pa'i snod btang snyoms dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dzin
200a5(mdo sde): du 'jug pa'i snod dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod thos pa'i tshol bas ngoms mi myongs pa dang / mi ltos pa'i snod rab tu 'byung
200a6(mdo sde): ba dang / don nyung zhing bya ba nyung ba'i snod dgon pa la gnas pa dang / bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa'i snod dben pa la dga' ba dang / sems can yongs
200a7(mdo sde): su smin par bya ba'i snod snga ba'i dngos po dang / chos snang ba'i snod dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa'i snod gzungs dang /
200a8(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi the tshom bcad pa'i snod spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba'i snod sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
200b1(mdo sde): snod chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba srung ba'i snod zhes 'dras pa med pa'i sems dang / lta bar gyur pa spong ba'i snod stong nyid la mos pa dang / mthar
200b2(mdo sde): 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su spongs pa'i snod rten cing 'brel par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'khrugs shing khyad par lung ston pa'i snod mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang /
200b3(mdo sde): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis snod phyir mi ldog pa'i sa te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
200b4(mdo sde): chen po sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag dang ldan na/ chos kyi snod du rig par bya'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
200b5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyang 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi snod du gyur cig/ bdag cag kyang bcom
200b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis ji skad du bstan pa'i chos de lta bu'i snod du gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la 'di
200b7(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po khyod 'khor 'dir skyo bar 'gyur gyi 'od gyis khyod rang gyi gnas su song shig/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas gsol
200b8(mdo sde): pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang yongs su skyo ba de byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni skyo ba bzod par bgyi'o//
201a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su skyo ba lags// ji ltar na yongs su mi skyo ba lags// bcom//
201a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
201a3(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams tshad med pa thos na skrag pa dang / 'khor tshad med pa thos na skrag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshad med pa thos nas skrag pa dang /
201a4(mdo sde): bsod nams tshad med pas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'grub pa thos nas skrag pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs
201a5(mdo sde): su skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yong su mi skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di
201a6(mdo sde): lte ste/ sems can gyi khams tshad med pa de yang bdag gis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba sgrub pa'i phyir 'khor
201a7(mdo sde): ba tshad med pa yongs su bzung bar bya'o zhes thos nas mi skrag pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshad med pa de bdag gis yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// zhes
201a8(mdo sde): thos na mi skrag pa dang / bsod nams tshad med pa bsags pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po sgrubs ste/ bdag kyang sgrub par bya'o zhes thos nas mi
201b1(mdo sde): skrag pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos byang chub bzhi po dag dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan
201b2(mdo sde): yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste// skabs skabs su nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dod pa dang /
201b3(mdo sde): skabs skabs su rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa ni yal bar 'dor zhing yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / gzhan yang dag
201b4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su
201b5(mdo sde): skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// bzhi gang
201b6(mdo sde): zhe na 'di lta ste/ rab tu nyan yang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi mi 'dod pa dang / lus dang srog kyang 'dor zhing dam pa'i
201b7(mdo sde): chos bsrungs pa dang / dpag tshad stong du 'gro zhing gzhan yang byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos
201b8(mdo sde): bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/
202a1(mdo sde): yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ slob pa mthong na yongs su skyo ba dang / bsod snyoms byed
202a2(mdo sde): par sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa dang / mang du thos pa tshol ba la mi brtson pa dang / ji ltar thos pa dang chos rnams gzhan la mi ston pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag
202a3(mdo sde): po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ slong ba la dge ba'i bshes
202a4(mdo sde): gnyen du 'du shes bskyed cing / zhes 'gras pa'i sems med la bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med de/ tshur shog legs par 'ongs so zhes bya ba'i tshig smras pa
202a5(mdo sde): dang / bdag bde ba la mi chags shing / sems can thams cad la bde ba rab tu sbyin pa dang / mang du thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms shing / ji ltar thos pa'i
202a6(mdo sde): chos rnams kyang gzhan dag la rgya cher rab tu ston cing / zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos de gzhan la rab tu ston par byed pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang
202a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi/
202a8(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongs su mi 'tshal ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos
202b1(mdo sde): po la mi sbyor ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed par brtson 'grus mi brtsom pa dang / yon tan chu du tsam gis chog par 'dzin cing gong du mi 'tshal
202b2(mdo sde): ba ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo 'ang rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang chos blo 'di dag
202b3(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongasasu 'tshol ba
202b4(mdo sde): dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po la rtag tu btson pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed par brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / dge ba thams cad yongasu bskang
202b5(mdo sde): ba'i phyir de la chags pa yin te/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// bcom
202b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis chos bzhi sgrubs pa 'das/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la lan btab pa nas/ rgyal po ma skyes sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po
202b7(mdo sde): chen po khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su skyo ba dang / yongs su mi skyo ba bzhi po sgrubs pa la 'jug pa 'di thos sam/ rgyal pos gsol pa//
202b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das thos lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la/ yongs su mi
203a1(mdo sde): skyo bar sbyad par bya'o// rgyal po ma skyes dgras gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa gang lags//
203a2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyal po ma smras/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bskang ba'i phyir// mi 'am ci'i bdag po khyod ji ltar sems su smin
203a3(mdo sde): bar byed pa'i rang gi thabs mkhas pa'i khyad par/ rgyal po pa skyes sgra 'di'i spyod pa yongs su bskang ba'i phyir khyod kyis ston cig/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal
203a4(mdo sde): po ljon pas rang gi pi wang de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar blangs so// pi wang de blangs ma thag tu/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po
203a5(mdo sde): ljon pa'i dge ba'i gzi brjid kyi pi wang gi sgra de las/ seng ge bsgyings pa ltar shing sa la cha ma g.yo ba'i sgrar/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshigs
203a6(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // phan pa yod pa dag dang don spyod dang / chos thos nan tan byed pa spyod dang / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ de dag
203a7(mdo sde): yongs su skyo ba med par spyod// bde ba spyod dang sgyid dang spyod pa dang / sems can kun la sems snyoms spyod pa dang / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/
203a8(mdo sde): de dag rgya chen ma yin spyod med la/ brten pa spyod dang bde ba spyod pa dang // bsam pa yongs su dag pa spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang
203b1(mdo sde): spyod pa// de dag gud du yang rgyu med spyod pa yin// dul ba spyod dang sbyin pa spyod pa dang // dngos po yongs su gtong ba spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog/
203b2(mdo sde): gi spyod pa spyod pa ni/ de dag ser sna med par spyod pa yin/ tshul khrims spyod pa nyan thos spyod pa dang / lus dang ngag yid yongs dag spyod pa dang // byang chub
203b3(mdo sde): mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag tshul khrims 'tshal pa spyod pa mod// brtul shugs spyod dang bzod pa spyod pa dang // khro skyon yongs su gcod pa'i spyod pa/
203b4(mdo sde): dang // chu byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gnod sems med par spyod pa yin// brtson 'grus spyod dang 'thun pa rnam spyod dang / 'khor ba mi skye
203b5(mdo sde): yongs su spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag le lo med par spyod pa yin// bsam gtan spyod dang ting nge 'dzin spyod pa dang / lus/
203b6(mdo sde): dang sems ni rab tu dben spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa yin// de dag g.yeng ba med par spyod pa yin// shes rab spyod dang blo mchog spyod
203b7(mdo sde): pa dang / chos rnams thams cad ji bzhin spyod pa dang / de dag shes rab spyod pa spyod pa med// byams pa spyod dang phan 'dod spyod pa dang // sems can kun la snying/
203b8(mdo sde): rje spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag khro ba'i tha ba med par spyod// stong pa spyod dang rab tu dben spyod dang // mtshan ma med pa/
204a1(mdo sde): shes ba thams can yongs su dag spyod dang /
204a2(mdo sde): yongs su dag spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ de dag smon pa med par spyod pa yin// gang dag spyod dang de bzhin nyid
204a3(mdo sde): spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du chags pa med par spyod// dad pa spyod dang dang ba spyod pa dang // dran dang g.yeng ba med par spyod
204a4(mdo sde): pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag yongs su spyod pa med par spyod// bsam gtan spyod dang rnam thar spyod pa dang // mngon shes lnga rnams
204a5(mdo sde): yongs su dag spyod pa// de dag chags pa med par spyod pa yin// sangs rgyas spyod dang dam chos spyod pa dang // dge 'dun dkon mchog nye bar brten spyod dang /
204a6(mdo sde): byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag dkon mchog gsum gyi spyod pa yin/ chos spyod pa dang shin tu rigs spyod dang // sems can thams cad yongasu
204a7(mdo sde): smin spyod pa// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag rgyun mi chad par spyod pa yin// bya ba spyod dang chos rnams spyod pa dang // mtha' kun yongasu spyod pa'i
204a8(mdo sde): spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du'ang lta bar spyod pa med// dag pa spyod dang rnam par dag spyod pa// nyon mongs thams cad
204a9(mdo sde): yongs su spyod spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag yongs su gdung bar spyod pa med// bde bar spyod dang shin tu rnam par spyod// sems
204b1(mdo sde): can kun la 'jigs mchog spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag smon lam spyod pa med pa yin// nyi ma spyod dang zla ba spyod pa dang / pad ma lta
204b2(mdo sde): bur gos pa med spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag lhar bcas 'jig rten phyag bya ba// brgya byin spyod dang tshangs par spyod pa dang // dkar
204b3(mdo sde): be'i tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ de dag bdud rnams sder bcas skrag par byed// mchog spyod pa dang khyad par
204b4(mdo sde): 'phags spyod pa// 'dod chags tha ba gcod spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa// de dag gang du'ang gti mug spyod pa med/ lam spyod pa dang mu stegs spyod
204b5(mdo sde): ba dang // shes rab mig ni yongs su dag spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ de dag kun gyi rtog par spyod pa med// dul ba spyod dang rab tu zhi
204b6(mdo sde): spyod dang // ming dang gzugs la mi chags spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod dang // de dag lha dang mi ni mang pos bstod/ 'phags pa spyod
204b7(mdo sde): dang shin tu mnyam spyod dang // g.yon phyogs lam ni yongs su gcod spyod dang / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag rtag tu don la 'bab pa yin//
204b8(mdo sde): dpa' bo spyod dang shin tu gtan spyod dang / bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu 'jig spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag byang chub snying por
205a1(mdo sde): de dag ma rig pa la skyed pa med//
205a2(mdo sde): gzhol ba yin// gzung ba dang ni don yod spyod pa dang // gzungs la g.yel ba med par spyod pa dang / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang
205a3(mdo sde): spyod pa// de dag gang du'ang ma rig spyod pa med// dgon pa spyod dang rab tu dben spyod dang // rtag tu rab tu 'byung bar spyod pa dang / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa
205a4(mdo sde): gang spyod pa mad/ gtso bo'i spyod dang khyad par khyed pang 'phags spyod dang // 'jig rten thams cad zil gyis gnod spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang
205a5(mdo sde): spyod pa// de dag dman pa lnga ni spyod pa yin// rig pa spyod dang thabs la spyod pa dang // bsam gtan bde las log par spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod
