205a6(mdo sde): pa gang spyod pa// de dag mi shis spyod pa med pa yin// lta ba spyod dang rnam par lta spyod dang // ming dang gzugs la mi chags spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog
205a7(mdo sde): gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ de dag 'jigs pa med par spyod pa yin// thams cad spyod dang kun tu spyod pa dang / dbang po yongs su spyod par byed pa dang / byang
205a8(mdo sde): chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ de dag ye shes na mkha'i mtha' dang 'dra// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa brtan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di
205a9(mdo sde): pi wang gi sgra de las 'byung ba na// byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i 'khor dang // rgyal po'i
205b1(mdo sde): khab kyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / mi 'am ci dang / dri za dang / lto 'byed chen po dag gi 'khor gyi srog chags brgyad stong / bla na med pa yang dag par
205b2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas// tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la bslab par bgyi'o//
205b3(mdo sde): sems can tshad ma mchis pa dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di nyid yang dag par 'dzin du bstsal bar bgyi'o zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
205b4(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la 'gror gnang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas pas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po bu dang bcas// dpung dang bcas/ bslas dang bcas/
205b5(mdo sde): gnyen 'das dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed de/
205b6(mdo sde): gzod par gsol nas/ sil snyan dkrol/ me tog gi char phab/ 'od zer gyi dra ba phyung ste/ sa chen po rnam pa drug du g.yos par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
205b7(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang du rang gi khyin du phyin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams
205b8(mdo sde): kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / chos mchod pas
206a1(mdo sde): bdag zil gyis non to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ khyod 'ba' zhig zil gyis
206a2(mdo sde): mnan pa ma yin te/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma rtogs par/ gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi brgya byin
206a3(mdo sde): dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zil gyis non to// de ci'i
206a4(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams
206a5(mdo sde): cad zil gyis mnon to// ke'u shi ka de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi mnon to// gang byang chub sems dpa' la zil gyis
206a6(mdo sde): gnon par sems pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ngo // /
206a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa las ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa las ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'byung ngo ngo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang
206a8(mdo sde): po brgya byin gyis bstan pa thos nas/ thal mo sbyar te mchi ma blangs nas/ 'di skad ces kye ma 'o bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing // sgrib
206b1(mdo sde): ba mi mnga' ba 'di lta bu las nyams so zhes smras so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi bu dang / lha'i bu 'od zer srung zhes bya ba/ 'khor de nyid du 'dus par
206b2(mdo sde): gyur te 'dug pa des/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// yang 'di ltar gang 'di ltar gang rab tu dben pa rnam par bsgrub par nye bar gnas
206b3(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan nyid ma lags pa'i chos rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i de ni sems can thams cad la snying rje snyed pa la lags/
206b4(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po la mos pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de la bstan lags te/ phyis 'gyod par 'gyur ba ste/ yab skyon med pa la zhugs te/ rgyud tshig cing sa bon
206b5(mdo sde): tshig ste/ theg pa chen po'i snod du ma gyur pa la da bgir ci ma mchis/ bstan par bshad pa na/ sum cu rtsa gsum rigs kyi lha'i bu las/ bla na med pa yang dag par
206b6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu 'od zer srungs gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das
206b7(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bka' ba spyod pa brgya stong phrag ji snyed pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ gtar ba ni bdag la
206b8(mdo sde): mngon gsum du gyur to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
207a1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas mar po mdzad las mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa de la 'jug pa'i rnam par dbye ba bstan pa cung zad cig bcom ldan
207a2(mdo sde): 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa gang dag gis nas/ de bzhin du bsgrubs nas
207a3(mdo sde): chos de thob par gyur to// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu 'od zer srungs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od zer srung byang chub
207a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyis ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par mi 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa bas bstan pa
207a5(mdo sde): rnams kyis chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/
207a6(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid dang / chos mnyam pa nyid dang / dge 'dun mnyam pa nyid dang / zhing mnyam pa nyid de/ lha'i bu byang chub
207a7(mdo sde): sems pa chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/
207a8(mdo sde): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhis stong pa nyid la rnam par brtse ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug
207b1(mdo sde): gi thabs mkhas pa la rnam par brtse ba dang / mngon par shes lngas ye shes pasu rnam par brtse ba dang / thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis rdzu 'phrul la rnam par brtse/
207b2(mdo sde): ba ste/ 'od zer bsrung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'od zer bsrung gzhan yang byang
207b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ phung po rnams la byang chub tshol yang / phung po
207b4(mdo sde): rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa dang / khams rnams la byang chub mtshol yang khams rnams byang chub kyi yan lag gyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin
207b5(mdo sde): pa dang / skye mched rnams la byang chub tshol yang // skye mched rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog pa dang / chos thams cad byang chub tshol yang / chos thams
207b6(mdo sde): cad la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du sres pa yin te/ 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dang ldan na/ 'od zer srung gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos
207b7(mdo sde): bzhi dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ mi g.yo ba'i tshul gyis chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas par shes
207b8(mdo sde): pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams cad de bzhin nyid la mnyam par 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid 'dres pa med pas// chos kyi dbyings
208a1(mdo sde): su 'du bar shes pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song bas na/ na mkha'i rang bzhin du so sor bstog pas te/ 'od zer
208a2(mdo sde): srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa na/ bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/
208a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu 'od zer srung ni rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur to// chos
208a4(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di'i tha mar bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa/
208a5(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pas 'dul bar bstan pa'i sgo'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung dam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi
208a6(mdo sde): mthu nyid kyis/ bdag gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags so// bcom ldan 'das a la la/ ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zab mo rnam par nges pa dang /
208a7(mdo sde): don bzang po dang / tshig 'bru bzang pos brgyan ni mdzes te ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi sgo ma bsdus
208a8(mdo sde): pa de gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das sngon bdag la chos snang bar gyur pa gang lags pa de yang / nga chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rten nas/ 'bum 'gyur
208b1(mdo sde): du skyes so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snyam du/ bdag lta bu nyi tshe ba'i 'tshal ba dang ldan pa dang / blo chung ngu nyan thos kyi theg pa'i skyon ma mchis pa thams
208b2(mdo sde): cad la zhugs par gnas pas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas kyang / 'di lta bu'i chos kyi snang ba 'di skyes par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
208b3(mdo sde): chen po// ye shes mtshad ma mchis pa'i snod du gyur pa/ blo rgya che zhi rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan pa/ chos rin po che dang thams cad yongasu 'dzin gsol pa ma btab
208b4(mdo sde): par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyi ba/ gang lags pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di snyed cig thob par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang
208b5(mdo sde): ci 'tshal/ snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi nyi mA dang / zla ba'i 'od snang
208b6(mdo sde): ba ji snyed pa thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku cig gi 'od kyis mag mog por 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu thams
208b7(mdo sde): cad nas/ 'od zer ji snyed cig byung ba de dag ni/ shes rab kyi 'od brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ stong gi tshe dang / stong phrag brgya'i cha dang / bye ba'i cha/
208b8(mdo sde): dang / bye ba phrag khrig brgya phrag stong kyicha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
209a1(mdo sde): snang ba thams cad ni/ shes rab kyi snang ba las byung ba'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba/
209a2(mdo sde): de dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems
209a3(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi snyems kyi spyod pa dang / g.yo ba rnams mkhyen pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba de lta bu dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag dang ldan par
209a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyen pa dang / thos nas kyang mos pa dang / mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa kun
209a5(mdo sde): chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang / de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa de dag ni/ byang chub kyi
209a6(mdo sde): sems mi brjed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba don du gnyer ba dang / snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos pa dang / byams pa chen po'i go cha bgos
209a7(mdo sde): pa dang / bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por bzhol ba'i skyes bu dam par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
209a8(mdo sde): dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang //
209b1(mdo sde): kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag rab tu ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ji snyed cig bskyed par/
209b2(mdo sde): 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gi sde dro'i dus kyi tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
209b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna 'dun gyis rab tu bkang ste/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang /
209b4(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ sbyin pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du nyi ma'i gang dang /
209b5(mdo sde): phyi ma 'phred kyi dus dang / nam gyi cha stong dang / nam gyi gung 'thun dang / tho rang dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad/ rin po sna
209b6(mdo sde): bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar la sbyin pa dang / rnam grangs 'di lta bus la
209b7(mdo sde): cig gam/ lo brgya 'am/ lo stong ngam/ lo brgya phrag stong du sbyin pa byin na/ kun dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las//
209b8(mdo sde): bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ste/ tshad ma mchis so// bde bar gshegs pa dpag tu ma mchis so//
210a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gdugs cig bstsal pa'i/ bsod nams kyi phung po de yang tshad ma mchis na/ dgung lo brgya phrag stong du gsags pa/
210a2(mdo sde): lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod mos par bya'o/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o// byang chub don du gnyer ba dang /
210a3(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba don du gnyer ba dang / sems can rab tu thar par bya ba don du gnyer bar bya ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ mos sam/
210a4(mdo sde): 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de/ de las bsod nams
210a5(mdo sde): kyi phung po mang du bskyed na// gang de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/ byang chub
210a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' lha'i gcod pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di
210a7(mdo sde): ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag/ de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/
210a8(mdo sde): zhus pa/ pha rol tu phyin pas/ rnam par nges pa bstan pa dang / dam pa'i chos rin po che'i/ le'u zhes bya bar zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de skad ces
210b1(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gcod pan dang / tshe dang ldan pa/ kun dga' bo dang / lha dang //
210b2(mdo sde): pi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la/ mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal
210b3(mdo sde): po ljon pas/ zhus pa/ zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shri len tra bo d+he dang // ye shes kyis/ sdes sgyur cing / zhus te/
210b4(mdo sde): skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas/ gtan la phab pa'o// bkra shis/ zhu chen gyi lonas zin
210b5(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ pra se na dza di ga thA/ bod skad du/ gsal rgyal tshigs su gcad pa// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal
210b6(mdo sde): lo// rgyal po gsal rgyal gdugs dang gcod pan dang // rnga yab ral gri nor bu lham bzhag ste// thal mo sbyar cing legs par phyag 'tshal nas// 'jig rten
210b7(mdo sde): mgon po la ni zhu ba zhus/ phan par dgongs pa thugs rje'i bdag nyid can// de bzhin gshegs rnams mya ngan 'das pa na// mchod pa bgyid blo mchog ji
210b8(mdo sde): 'khur// srid pa gzhan du mi rnams bde bathob// bcom ldan pa'i seng ge sa phyi 'ba'// chos rnams kun la mngon gsum spyan gyur bas// kun dga'
211a1(mdo sde): @bzang po rgyal las mngon sum du// gsal rgyal zhus lam 'di dag bka' stsal// ji ltar rgyal ba rnams la mi rnams kyis// mchod/
211a2(mdo sde): pa byas pas srid pa gzhan dag tu// rnam smin 'dod pa rgya chen sna tshogs thob// gsol pa'i don de rgyal pos mnyam par gyis// bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod rten
211a3(mdo sde): rnams dang ni// sku gzugs rnams rdul phran ji song ba// de'i grangs sbed de byed mi rnams kyis// lha yul sa stengs nges par rgyal srid 'thob gzugs dang // gzugs
211a4(mdo sde): med khams kyi ting nge 'dzin// phun sum tshogs pa'i sa mchog kun myong nas// tha mar skye dang rgyal sogs pa yi// sdug bsngal med pa'i sangs rgyas gom 'phang thob/
211a5(mdo sde): su dag 'dir ni rgyal ba'i gzugs byed pa/ de dag gzugs bzang yid 'ong yon tan ldan// dbang po bsdams zhing 'ong 'bar nyi ma bzhin// 'jig rten dag ni mig
211a6(mdo sde): du sdug par 'gyur// su dag bde bar gshegs pa'i gzugs byed pa/ de'i lus de dri ma med pa dang // pad ma'i snying po lta bur 'jam zhing yangs// nad dang
211a7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal 'jigs las thar// su dag 'jig rten mgon po'i gzugs byed pa// bran du mi skye mdag bzhug skye mi 'gyur// dbul por mi 'gyur rigs dam
211a8(mdo sde): mi skye zhing // dbang po rnams kyang nyams pa yong mi 'gyur// thub dbang mchod rten byed pa'i mi rnams ni// mya ngan yong med lus kun brtan pa dang // longs spyod
211b1(mdo sde): mchog ldan rin chen mdzod mang ldan// 'gro'i tshogs rnams kyang ni thub par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i mchod rten srog shing phul ba yis// chos kyi rjes 'thun chos la
211b2(mdo sde): sgrub pa dang // tshul khrims thos dang bzod pa'i mchog dang ldan// 'jig rten dag na don kun grub par 'gyur// mchod rten la gdugs brtsegs phul ba yis//
211b3(mdo sde): lha dang mi'i nang du skye ba dang // srid med bu'i lus 'dul lus kun brtan// bkur sti byas pa'i yon tan ldan par 'gyur// thub dbang mchod rten rdo thal byugs pa
211b4(mdo sde): yis// lha mi 'jig rten dag na tshe ring zhing // lus sems nad dang mya ngan rab spangs te// rtag tu skyid cing nor gyis phyug par 'gyur// gser dngul sba ba'i
211b5(mdo sde): glegs bam g.yogs pa'i// thub pa'i dbang po'i mchod rten bya ba yis// mi rnams srid pa'i khyad par gzhan dag tu// lus mkhregs 'od kyang 'bar zhing
211b6(mdo sde): mdzes par 'gyur// su dag la la mchod rten sku gzugs la// dang ba'i sems kyis bla re 'bul byed pa// de dag sa steng rgya mtsho'i mtha' klas pa// ma lus/
211b7(mdo sde): gnod med rgyal gcig dbang byed 'gyur// mchod rten sku gzugs dag la dga' bzhin du// rnam mang rgya chen gdugs ni brtags pa yis// lha mi'i 'jig rten
211b8(mdo sde): dag na gdugs 'dra bar// lha dang mi yi dbang po lta bur 'gyur// mi rnams su dag sku gdung snying po can// dri med bsod nams 'byung gnas gyur pa la/
212a1(mdo sde): ba dan mdzes pa sna tshogs 'dogs pa dag/ mthu dang ldan zhing srid gsum mchod gnas 'gyur// bde gshegs mchod rten cod pan
212a2(mdo sde): btags pa yis// mi dbang dpal dang ldan pa'i dbang thob pa'i// bde ba'i mchog kyang nyams su myong gyur nas// rnam par grol ba'i cod pan khyad par thob// rgyal
212a3(mdo sde): ba'i mchod rten dag la dril phul bas// phyag btsun grags pa chen po dag dang ldan/ tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'ong skye ba dran// de dag gis na rgyan rnams sna tshogs
212a4(mdo sde): 'thob// mkhas pa su dag bde gshegs mchod rten la// dad pa'i sems kyis 'phreng ba 'dog byed pa/ gser 'phreng rin chen mang pos legs sbas pa//
212a5(mdo sde): bsod nams ldan pa de'i 'og la thogs// ston pa'i mchod rten dag la rgyan 'chang 'dogs// de dag do shal rgyan phreng nor bu dang // gdab bu dag dang dpung rgyan
212a6(mdo sde): mchog rnams kyis// lus rgyan 'jig rten dag tu rgyu bar 'gyur// su dag bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la// sa dang lci bas nyug pa de dag ni// lha dang mir
212a7(mdo sde): skye lus mdog sdug pa dang / rnam dag rma med bde dang ldan par 'gyur// thub dbang mchod rten byi dor byas pa yis// shin tu lta na sdug cing mig tu mdzes// byang
212a8(mdo sde): bzhin bzang zhing pad me'i mdog dang ldan// sred pa'i skyon rnams dang ni bral bar 'gyur// su dag spos mchog sbar ba'i 'bru mar gyis// bde bar gshegs
212b1(mdo sde): sna tshogs ldan pa kun gyis brtsegs par 'gyur/
212b2(mdo sde): pa'i mchod rten byug byed pa// de dag spos kyis mchog cing tsan dan gyis// lus byugs nyi ma'i 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag thub dbang bachod rten la/
212b3(mdo sde): spos chu gtsang zhing dang bas khrus gsol pa// de dag lus la dri ma med pa dang // gdung ba med cing mdog 'jam mya ngan me// su zhig sangs rgyas mchod rten sku gzugs
212b4(mdo sde): khang // tshon rtsi sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzes byed pa// de ni bde gshegs mnga' ba'i yon tan rnams// su dag dpyid ka'i du su gtsang ma'i chus// mchod rten nye
212b5(mdo sde): 'khor rdul rnams zhi byed pa// de la bud med rnams ni dga' bzhin du// rdul yab gser gyi yo ba// dkon mchog gsum phyir mi rnams gang dag gis// 'phags pa
212b6(mdo sde): dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor byas pas ni// rkang lag dra bar sor mo 'brel ba dang // yan lag thams cad kyang ni skyon med 'gyur// su dag dkon mchog gsum la me
212b7(mdo sde): tog dang // 'bras bu gsar thog 'byung ba 'bul byed pa// de dag 'gro ba rnams su 'khor ba na// ro mchog kun thob mi rdzi stobs dang ldan// me tog 'phreng chen
212b8(mdo sde): me tog 'tshar rnams kyis// su dag 'dir ni rgyal ba'i gzugs la mchod// de dag lha dang mi yi 'jig rten du// cha byad yid 'ong sna tshogs legs par brgyan/
212b9(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mchod dag la dri zhim 'bul// gdugs spos rgya chen mang po ldan sbyor dang // a ka ru'i gdugs spos phul ba yis// de'i lus kun stobs dang ldan
213a1(mdo sde): par gyur// su dag bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la// rga bzhin rnga yang rnams ni 'bul byed pa// thug rga 'khor rnams
213a2(mdo sde): snying nye rnga yab thogs// che ba de la tsher yang g.yob par byed// shin tu dri med zla ba nya 'dra ba'i// me long sdug gu thams cad mkhyen la 'bul// de dag tshe rabs
213a3(mdo sde): rgyud pa rnams su yang // lha mi rnams kyis blta bar 'os su 'gyur// su dag bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la// mchod pa'i khyad par ci 'dod 'byor pa yis//
213a4(mdo sde): mtshams par 'bul byed de dag dri med cing // mya ngan med pa'i bla med byang chub 'thob// mi rnams gang dag sangs rgyas mchod rten nam// sku gzugs dag
213a5(mdo sde): la mgos gtugs gus phyag 'tshal// de dag lha rnams dang ni mi rnams kyis// cher yang che bar bkur ba'i na gnas su 'gyur// su zhig dang bas thub
213a6(mdo sde): ba'i mchod rten 'am// sku gzugs dag la bskor ba byed pa de// phyi ma'i tshe la dga' chen rnams kyis btung // bzang po'i gnod 'gyur yon tan rnams
213a7(mdo sde): dang ldan// mi rnams su dag dga' bzhin gus pa yin// bla med mchod rten rnams dang sku gzugs la// lus kyi las rnams byed pa de dag ni// srid
213a8(mdo sde): pa kun tu mdzod 'dzin sangs rgyas 'gyur// rgyal ba'i mchod rten rol mo sgra phul bas// zab cing rigs pa'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs// yan lag lnga
213b1(mdo sde): rdzogs yid 'ong tshig dang ldan// sgra skad dag gis 'jig rten 'gengs par byed// su dag rgyal ba'i gdung ldan stong byed pa// de dag gling bu'i sgra dang
213b2(mdo sde): glu snyan dang // sgra snyan yid 'ong ba thos pa dang // so so yang dag rig pa'ang thob par 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag rtsa zhing so bag gis// 'jig rten bla ma'i
213b3(mdo sde): spyi ga ba rigs pas byed// yang na gzhin dag byed du bcug kyang rung // de dag 'gro ba rnams kyi skyabs 'drar 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag rgyal ba'i gtsang
213b4(mdo sde): khang byed// de dag 'gro ba rnams su 'khor ba na// lha dbang gnas 'dra'i khang khyim 'od 'bar ba// dus tshigs kun tu bde dang ldan par 'gyur//
213b5(mdo sde): mtho ris las bzang 'bras bu'i gnas rnams su// bskal par rga med rtag tu dga' bzhin du// brtson par byed cing mya ngan med pa dang // mtha'
213b6(mdo sde): mar zhi ba'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur// gang dag 'ja' khyags 'dra ba'i rta babs mdzes// thub pa'i chab sgo sgong byed de dag ni// srid pa gzhan du khang khyim
213b7(mdo sde): sgo dang bcas// rnam par brgyan pa rnams ni thob par 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag ston pa'i sku gdung khang // bsrung phyin dang pa'i 'obs dang sgo 'jugs
213b8(mdo sde): ba// de dag tshe rabs gzhan du dgra rnams kyis// dpal yon rnams dang bral bar yong mi nus// mi rnams su dag mchod rten rnying pa rnams// gzhan gyi
214a1(mdo sde): dor byed pa yin rang gi blos// ral tshems byed pa'i skye bo de dag ni// lus bzang yon tan dam pas brgyan par 'gyur//
214a2(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i mchod rten me tog bsal bas// 'dod chags chags med zhe sdang skye mi 'gyur// gti mug rmongs pa med lta chags mi 'gyur// mi rnams rab/
214a3(mdo sde): tu dga' zhing skyid par 'gyur// su dag glang chen dril sbyangs sba bar brgyan// dul ba'i rta dang sbyar ba'i shing rta dag/ ston pa dang ni 'phags pa'i
214a4(mdo sde): tshogs la 'bul// de dag bla med theg chen thob par 'gyur// skye bos su dag 'jig rten mgon po la// rin chen 'bar ba yid dang 'thad pa rnams//
214a5(mdo sde): 'bul ba de ni rin chen bdun po dang // byang chub dri ma med pa'i rin chen thob// rgyal ba'i mchod rten la ni gos phul bas// bsod nams byas pa ngo tsha'i
214a6(mdo sde): gos gyon te// dga' zhing yon tan kun ldan ser sna med// mdog kyang 'jam zhing kha dog gser 'dra 'gyur// dpe med mchod rten mar me phul ba yis//
214a7(mdo sde): ud dpal sngon po kha bye 'dab 'dra'i mig/ gsal zhing sdug la mig gi dkyus ring 'dzes// dri ma med pa'i lha'i mig dang ldan// su dag mchod rten par me
214a8(mdo sde): mnga' ba 'bul// de dag mig tu sdug cing mdzes par rgyas// mig ni dkyus ring mthon ka'i mdog dang ldan// skyes bud med dag gis blta bar 'os//
214b1(mdo sde): mtshan mo thub chen spyan sngar thal sbyor 'khod// 'byor dang 'tsham bar mar me sdong po 'bul// de dag srid pa gzhan du 'bras bur ldan// rin chen gsal
214b2(mdo sde): ba'i 'od ldan lus kyang 'thob// rgyal la phul ba'i mar me 'chi ba na// dag pa'i sems kyis 'dir ni dga' zhin du// snying po skul bar byed
214b3(mdo sde): pa de dag ni// spyan lnga dag kyang nges thob par 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag dge ba'i sems ldan pas// rgyal ba'i mchod pa gzhan gyis byas
214b4(mdo sde): pa la// rjes su yid rang don de ma byas kyang // mdor na de dag gis kyang byas par 'gyur// tshul khrims ldan pa'i phyogs nas lhags pa la//
214b5(mdo sde): su dag dga' zhing mal stan sbyin byed pa// mi rnams 'gro ba dag du 'khor ba na// seng ge'i khri dang lta na rnams 'thob par 'gyur// su dag rab tu
214b6(mdo sde): byang dang 'tsham pa yi// kha zas bzang po dge 'dun sbyin byed pa// de dag 'khor ba'i dgon par gnas pa na// kha zas kha dog ro la sogs ldan
214b7(mdo sde): thob/ su dag rab tu byung bar 'tshab pa yi// btung ba rgya chen dge 'dun sbyin byed pa// de dag 'khor ba'i dag par gnas pa na// btung ba
214b8(mdo sde): kha dog ro la sogs ldan 'thob// su dag 'jig rten bla mas gsungs pa yi// dam chos tshul bzang thos nas nyabs su len// de dag nyen mongs
215a1(mdo sde): chu rlabs rab 'jig pa'i// sred pa'i rgya mtsho myur du rgal bar 'gyur// rgyal po dge ba'i las 'di thams cad kyis//
215a2(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i bde ba sna tshogs sbyin gyur nas// sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub dam pa yi// 'bras bu bde blag kho na 'grub par 'gyur// de nas rab dga'
215a3(mdo sde): mdangs dang ldan pa yis// drang song dge 'dun bskor bar byas nas su// thub dbang zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// rgyal po rgyal byed tshal
215a4(mdo sde): nas 'byung bar 'gyur// gsal rgyal tshigs su bcad pa// rdzogs s+ho// sarba mang+ga laM/ dag go// dge'o//
216a1(mdo sde): po zung 'khor skyong zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo bzhugs so// gags
216b1(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ ra sta pa la ma hA ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ pho brang 'khor skyong zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//
216b2(mdo sde): bam po dang po'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig gi tshe na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod 'phungs pa'i ri la dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu
216b3(mdo sde): gsum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong dang bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang spobs pa thogs pa med pa sha stag go// bzod pa
216b4(mdo sde): so sor rnyed pa sha stag go// phyir rgol ba'i chos bdud rnams bcom pa sha stag go// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nye bar gyur pa sha stag go/ tshe gcig gi thogs
216b5(mdo sde): pa sha stag go// gzungs so sor rnyed pa sha stag go// ting nge 'dzin so sor rnyed pa sha stag go// spobs pa mtha' yas so sor rnyed pa sha stag go
216b6(mdo sde): thogs pa med pa'i mi 'jig pa so sor rnyed pa sha stag go// rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang mchog gi pha rol tu phyin te rnyed pa sha stag pa nas/ yon tan thams cad gshin
216b7(mdo sde): par kun tu bzung ba'i bar du la 'di lta ste/ kun tu bzang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / kun tu bzang po'i mig byang chub sems dpa' dang //
217a1(mdo sde): kun tu mig byang chub sems dpa' dang / kun tu rnam par ltas pa dang / kun tu 'od zer dang / kun tu 'od dang / bla na med pa
217a2(mdo sde): 'phel ba'i blo gros dang /
217a3(mdo sde): blo gros dang / mtha' yas pa'i blo gros dang / yangs pa'i blo gros dang / mi zad pa'i blo gros dang / gzungs 'dzin pa dang / 'gro ba 'dzin pa dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros dang /
217a4(mdo sde): khyad par gyi blo gros dang / gzungs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nu la sogs pa drug bcu la sems dpa'
217a5(mdo sde): sha stag go// bzang skyod thog mar 'gro ba byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug dang / tshangs pa mi mjed kyi dbang po brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang / 'jig rten mgon po dang /
217a6(mdo sde): mtshams po che'i lha'i sras po dang / blo gros shin tu gnas pa'i lha'i sras po dang / lha'i dbang po rnams dang / klu'i dbang po rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po rnam dang /
217a7(mdo sde): dri za'i dbang po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / na mkha' lding gi dbang po rnams dang / thams cad kyang g.yog du ma brgya
217a8(mdo sde): skang de dag thams cad 'khor der 'dres te 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal sring po des seng ge'i khril bzhugs te/ 'khor thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor las ri rab
217a9(mdo sde): bzhin du 'phags pa nyi ma ltar mdzad pa/ zla ba bzhin du 'gro ba thams cad la snang mdzad pa/ tshangs pa bzhin du rab tu zhi bar zhugs pa/ ba byin bzhi du sku sgrub par dka' ba/
217b1(mdo sde): 'khor lo ba bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag dkon mchog bdun ldan pa/ seng ge bzhin du ches/ me'i phung po bzhin du skus 'gro ba thams cad la snang bar mdzad pa lha thams cad
217b2(mdo sde): la snang ba'i bu rin po che 'dus pa bzhin du 'bad par mdzad pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ thams cad 'od kyis khyab par tshangs pa'i dbyangs sgra sgrog
217b3(mdo sde): pa/ sems can thams cad zhi bar mdzad cing / rjes su chud pa'i dbyangs shin tu gdon mi za ba'i don chos thams cad mchog gi pha rol tu phyin pa 'khor na bzhugs te/ chos bshad
217b4(mdo sde): pa na thogs mar yang dge/ bar du yang dge/ tha mar yang dge ba don dang yi ge'i mchog tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa/ gtsang ba 'ba' shig yongasu gtang ba ston par mdzad/
217b5(mdo sde): de nas rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor de nyid du 'das par gyur te 'dug pa/ bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri la bzhug te/
217b6(mdo sde): nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od kyis 'khor thams cad la bzhil bar mdzad do// 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad des mthong nas dga' 'gur rangs te/ sems bsdus nas
217b7(mdo sde): bstan las langs te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis stod do// rgyal bas 'gro ba 'di dag zil mnan pa/ lha dang lha min mi 'am ci dang klu
217b8(mdo sde): lan thos sangs rgyas sras la gzigs che bas/ gsung gi ri bo de bzhin snang bar mdzad/ ri rab lha'i dge 'dun gnas pa bzhin// rgya mtsho 'ching rnams dbus 'dug rnam pa mdzes/
218a1(mdo sde): brtse ba'i rgya mtsho 'ching rnams dbus bzhugs nas// de yis 'od zer brgya stong gang rig tor// tshangs pa'i gnas der tshangs pa song nas su//
218a2(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i khyim na gnas nas rab snang ltar bsam gtan rnam grol ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs/ sems can mchog gis 'gro kun snang bar mdzad/ brgya byin sum bcu rtsa
218a3(mdo sde): gsum snang byed ltar/ lta bus song nas rgya che thub pa'i rgyal pos 'gro ba kun la snang bar mdzad/ mtshan gyis sbas shing ye shes yon tan phyug/ gling bzhir mi'i
218a4(mdo sde): dbang po snang mdzad// 'jig rten 'di la ston pa mdzad pa ste/ 'phags pa'i lam la gzung bar mdzad pa ni/ thugs rje dgongs pa dag pa 'di mdzes so//
218a5(mdo sde): me dang nor bu 'di ni med mdzad pa// nam mkhar nyi shar bzhin du snang mdzad pa// nyi ma stong pas kyang ni mchog gi 'ong // sangs rgyas nyi mas 'gro 'di snang mdzad pa'o//
218a6(mdo sde): dri med zla ba nam phyed snang ba bzhin// 'gro kun la ni rnam dag snang bar byed// rgyal ba'i zhal ni zla ba rgyas pa bzhin// thams cad 'od ni zil mnan snang mdzad pa'o//
218a7(mdo sde): ri rtse la ni me ni ji bzhon pas// nub mo'i zhi ba thams cad snang bar byed// gti bug mun pa ma lus bcom nas su// drang srong chen po'i ye shes snang mdzad pa// ri khrod
218a8(mdo sde): na ni bstan pa'i sgra sgrogs pa// seng ges shod kyi ri dgas skrag byed bzhin// mi yi dbang pos stong pa bdag med sgra sgrogs pas// de bzhin mer 'dug gzhan rnams
218b1(mdo sde): skrag mdzad pa'o// nor bu bzang po'i gzi brjid rab tu gsal// nor bu thams cad zil mnan snang bar byed// rgyal ba'i sku ni gser gyi kha dog bzhin 'gro kun zil gyis/
218b2(mdo sde): mnan te sdang mdzad pa'o// 'jig rten na ni mnyam gang yang med// de las slar byung sems can gang yang med// bsod nams ye shes brtson 'grus dang ni thabs thams/
218b3(mdo sde): cad kyi ni yon tan khyod mtshungs med/ mi'i dbang pos 'gro 'di snang bar mdzad// yon tan rgya mtsho 'ching rnams bdag nyid gis mthong // sti stang bskyed pas rga ba rnams
218b4(mdo sde): 'phel nas// rgyal ba'i zhabs drung du ni bdag phyag 'tshal// bdag gis bstod nas sdom pa rgya chen blog// yon tan thams cad 'byung gnas 'jig rten sgron// de ru bdag
218b5(mdo sde): gis bsod nams ci bsags pa// de yis 'gro kun byang chub mchog reg go// de nas rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan
218b6(mdo sde): 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bston nas thal mo sbyar te mig gis ka mi 'dzums par gnyis kas yang dag par gshegs pa'i sku la rnam par bltas te/ chos
218b7(mdo sde): kyi dbyings la 'di ltar rnam par spyod do// zab mo shin tu ting zab pa/ mthong bar dga' ba/ chud par dka' ba/ rtag tu dka' ba/ rtag tu dpag tu med pa'i spyod pa
218b8(mdo sde): yul zhi bar phra ba 'jug par dka' ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas spyod yul rnam par spyod pa cing / chos thams cad kyi dbyings la rab tu zhugs pa/ yang dag
219a1(mdo sde): par gshegs pa'i ye shes la rjes su bsam te/ ma mtshungs pa dang / mtshungs pa sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul mthong ste/ bsam
219a2(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa'i yang dag par gshegs pa'i thabs kyi yul dang / spyod yul la 'ba' pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la 'bab pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
219a3(mdo sde): la kun tu btags na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma gnas pa na mkha'i spyod yul bar mthong nas/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid du 'jug par chos thams cad la mos
219a4(mdo sde): shing sangs rgyas kyis rnam par thar pa ma sgrib pa la mngon par 'dod de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ku zer zug pa dang / zhi ba rtag pa zhes 'dab cing /
219a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing rgya che ba la rjes su 'jug sems can thams cad la mngon par yang dag par shes pa'i sku 'jug cing phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa dang / sangs rgyas
219a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan gyis mtha' med do// zhes rjes su dran te/ rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings nyid la
219a7(mdo sde): dpyod de kha dog rog par 'jug go// de nas yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa po brang 'khor skyong zla ba gsum gnyen du yod par tshul du bzhugs pas zla ba gsum lon te/ tshul nas
219a8(mdo sde): byung nas chos gos bting ba'i chos phrugs te/ des lhung bzed dang / chos gos blangs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun dang gser bu rnams dang / thog ma las byed pa rnams dang //
219b1(mdo sde): rab tu byung nas yun mi ring ba rnams dang / lhan gcig tu sems can gyi 'byung gnas su rim gyi spyad pa spyod cing / rgyal po'i grong khyer chen po bya rgod phung po'i ri'i
219b2(mdo sde): rgyal po ga la ba der dong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa pho brang 'khor skyong / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der nye bar song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
219b3(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor nas phyogs cig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa
219b4(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor skyong thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod do// 'od byed me'i mchog ni bdag phyag 'tshal//
219b5(mdo sde): nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i yid la bdag phyag 'tshal/ log pa'i blo mchog rgyal lnga phyag 'tshal/ bsags gsum pha rol phyin thub bdag phyag 'tshal/ 'dren pa khyod
219b6(mdo sde): kyis spyod pa spyad par bgyid/ zhing ni bye ba 'gengs pa thams cad du/ thos nas sangs rgyas sras ni mgu nas mchi/ yon tan rgya mtsho thug la mchod phyir ro// bde
219b7(mdo sde): gshegs dang ni 'thun par mchod bgyid de/ thabs chen la ni rdul med chos thos nas/ yid dga' nas ni bdag tu 'gro bar bgyi/ khyod kyi yon tan 'phreng ba rab
219b8(mdo sde): bsgrag go// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam mi khyad/ sems can don du spyod pa kun spyad mdzad// khyod kyi thugs ni skyo bar ma gyur te/ byang chub dam pa'i mchog
220a1(mdo sde): rab tshol ba'o// 'dren pa'i sbyin pa tshul khrims spyad pa te// bzod pa brtson 'grus bsam gtan bslab nas su// shes rab thabs kyis rtag/
220a2(mdo sde): par pha rol son// de bas rnam par 'dren ces bdag phyag 'tshal// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa mngon shes rab tu med// dbang po dang ni stobs dang rnam thar bslabs/
220a3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug/ mtshungs med ye shes rgya mtsho bdag phyag 'tshal// 'gro ba rnams kyi sems can rgyud rab tu mkhyen// ji ltar spyod ji
220a4(mdo sde): ltar las byung ba// gang gi tshul gyi sgo mo su ni thar// mi mthog bcom ldan 'das kyis de yang mkhyen// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug 'byung spangs pa// gang gis sems
220a5(mdo sde): can ngan song gsum grol ba// gang gis las kyi bde ba'i rgyud du 'gro// de bas bzang po dang ni ngan byas mkhyen// 'das pa gang gis 'gro la phan mdzad pa// ji lta lha
220a6(mdo sde): dang mi yis mchod pa dang // gang ma byon pa yon tan mchog ni pha rol byin// bde gshegs de dag thams cad khyed kyis mkhyen// dag pa'i zhing ni kun tu 'byung ba
220a7(mdo sde): dang // byang chub sems mang nyan thos de bzhin du// ji snyed drang srong chen po'i tshe de bzhin du// de ltar thams cad ma lus du ma mkhyen// mya ngan 'das nas chos gnas/
220a8(mdo sde): ci 'dra ba/ rgyal ba'i sku gdung ci 'dra ba la mchod/ de ru chos mchod 'chang ba ci 'dra ba/ mi mchog gis ni de ni ma lus mkhyen/ stobs bcu yi ni ye shes bsgrib
220b1(mdo sde): med mkhyen/ dus gsum du ni rtag par de 'jug ste// chos tshul thams cad la ni ma chags mkhyen// ye shes rgya mtsho rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod dang mtshung
220b2(mdo sde): med mnyam med bla ma las/ mtshan rnams kyis ni rab tu brgyan pa la// namakha' skar ma rnams kyi spras pa bzhin// thub pa'i mi mchog rab la bdag phyag
220b3(mdo sde): 'tshal// mtshungs med sku gzugs yid dga' mdzad pa ste// 'gro dang lha rung bcas la gzhol ba mdzad// tshangs pa brgya byin 'og min gnas kyi lha// de dag
220b4(mdo sde): khyod spyan sngar mi mdzes so// gser ni g.yor dri ma med pa khyod// dbu ni gnyen 'jam g.yas su 'khyil ba ste// gtsug gtor ri rab rgyal po bzhin du 'phag
220b5(mdo sde): yangs pa'i bsod nams byung ba snang mdzad pa'o// bye ba khrag khrig 'od zer rnam par gtod// khyod kyi sprin 'tshams spu dkar rab tu mdzes// yid
220b6(mdo sde): dga' spyan ni me tog ud pa la bzhin// thugs rjes dgongs nas 'gro ba la ni gzigs/ na mkha' dri med zla ba nya ba ltar rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi
220b7(mdo sde): zhal snang mdzad// sems can rnams kyi de mthong mchog mi shes// zhal bzang mi mchog pa ni bdag phyag 'tshal// dang po rma bya ri dgas rgyal po'i 'gros/
220b8(mdo sde): ba glang bskon par 'gyur zhing 'gro ba bzhin// gshegs pa na ni sa ni steng yang g.yo// stobs bcu brtul shugs stan la phyag 'tshal// phyag gis sor mo zlum/
221a1(mdo sde): zhing ril la mdzes// sen mo dmar po dag pa'i zangs 'dras spras// bzhed pa na ni pus mo'i lha ngar slebs// gser gyi kha dog 'dra
221a2(mdo sde): la bdag phyag 'tshal// bzhud pa na ni sa steng ri mo bris// 'khor lo'i dra bas spras pa'i zhabs kyi bzhud// zhabs kyi 'od kyis smin mdzad de zhi nas// lha yi 'jig
221a3(mdo sde): rten sems can de dag 'gro/ chos kyi rgyal pos dbyig bdun byin par ste// chos sbyin pa'i dbang po thugs dul ba// chos spyod par ni 'gro ba ston par mdzad/
221a4(mdo sde): chos rjes 'dren pa la bdag phyag 'tshal// byams pa'i go cha dran pa'i ral gri mchog/ tshul khrims gzhu dang shes rab thabs kyi mda'// de'i nyon mongs pa'i
221a5(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa ni// skye ba 'chi ba sogs srog pa rnam par 'brel// rgal nas khyod kyis sems can bye ba grol thar nas// 'gro rnams bcings nas 'gro ba grol bar mdzad//
221a6(mdo sde): bde zhing gnod par med pa'i lam bstan mdzad// gang gis bde bar gshegs pa'i zhing gnas 'gro// gang na skye zhing 'chi pho med pa ru// bral zhing sdug bsngal ba ni
221a7(mdo sde): ma 'byung zhing // zhi ba'i gnas su de ni 'dus ma byas// thugs rjes yis ni ched du bshad par mdzad// 'jig rten mchog rab kyis ni bstod pas su// rgyal
221a8(mdo sde): po chos kun dbang mdzad pha rol phyin// bdag gi bsod nams de ru cigs pa// de yis 'gro rnam byang chub mngon rgyas shing // de nas tshe dang ldan pa pho brang 'khor skyong gis/
221b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bstod nas/ stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsug te/
221b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te/ yang thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das yang dag
221b3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ bdag phyogs bcur zad cig 'dri bar gsol//
221b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis dris pa las/ slar lung bstan par mdzad du gsol zhes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa pho brang 'khor skyong la 'di skad
221b5(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to// pho brang 'khor skyong khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas khyod la de dang de'i dris pa la dri ba 'di lung bstan pas/ sems nangs par
221b6(mdo sde): bya'o zhes de skad du bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa pho brang 'khor skyong gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
221b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dang ldan na/ chos thams cad kyi yon tan khyad par snyed/ gzhan gyi rag ma las par shes pa rab tu rnyed/ myur ba'i shes rab rjesu
221b8(mdo sde): rnyed/ rnam par gdon mi za ba'i spong pa rab tu rnyed/ snang ba rab rnyed/ thams cad mkhyen pa la rab tu 'jug/ sems can yongasu smin par bgyod/ yid gnyis spong/
222a1(mdo sde): zhing the tshom spong / thams cad mkhyen par gdon mi za bar rab tu rnyed/ sems can bzung bar mkhas/ ji ltar bur smras pa de bzhin du bgyid/ sems
222a2(mdo sde): can la ldem por dag tu smra bar yang dag par mkhas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rab tu rnyed/ 'dri ba thams cad yongasu slar 'dri/ chos thams cad 'dzin pa myur du thad
222a3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa rjes su rnyed/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa po brang 'khor skyong gis/ de'i dus nas tshogasu bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gnon
222a4(mdo sde): mi za ba yang dag par 'di las 'byung ba 'gyur ba// ye shes rgya mtsho gtan gdon mi za ba// rgyal ba mchog gis ni bdag la gsungs/ gser bzhin du ni 'chol
222a5(mdo sde): ba'i sku lus la/ sems can mchog gis bsod nams rab bsags te/ khyod ni skyabs dang mgon dang 'ong ba rten/ spyod mchog dri med bdag la di ring gsung /
222a6(mdo sde): ji ltar ye shes ma zad rnyed pa las// gzungs dang bdud rtsi byang chub la ni 'phags// ye shes rgya mtsho ji ltar rnam par dag/ gang gi sems can gyi ni dogs
222a7(mdo sde): pa gcod// skal pa bye ba mang po ru rgyur yang // nams kyang skyo ba'i blo ni mi skye ste// 'jig rten 'di dag sdug bsngal gsungs 'di mthong // de dag gi ni
222a8(mdo sde): don du dge ba bgyid// zhing gtsang ba dang g.yog dang ldan pa ru// de'i tshogs dang zhing dang ldan pa ste// sems can don du bla na med gsungs pa// byang chub spyod/
222b1(mdo sde): pa dri med rab tu ston// bdud bcom log par lta ba sel mdzad pa// sred par skyems shing rnam par re mdzad pa// chos kyi spyad yang rab tu mi brnyil pa/ sem can
222b2(mdo sde): mgon mchog spyod pa'i don ces gsungs// gzungs dang longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs te// gnyen po'i gsung gis 'khor la gus mdzad pa// bde gshegs
222b3(mdo sde): gyi ni sprin bzhin 'gro tshig mdzad// sangs rgyas kyis ni spyod yul rnam kyang gsungs// dbyangs rnyan ka la bying ka'i nga ro te// tshad pa'i dbyangs kyi lo 'gro med
222b4(mdo sde): mdzad pa// chos 'tshal phyi ru 'khor 'dir lhag pa la// gtso bo de dag bdud rtsi blo tshim mdzad// byang chub mchog rab tu ni dad pa mchog/ chos la dad pa ru ni mdzad pa'i
222b5(mdo sde): rigs// 'dren pa bshad pa'i dus ni 'di lags te// 'di'i dus ni dkon mchog rab nyams pa'i// thub pa dag ni byang chub bya lags// rgyal po khyod kyis bdag
222b6(mdo sde): gi bsam pa khyen// rgyal khyod 'tshe ba'i slad du ma gsol te// dge ba mchog sdud pa ni rab tu gsungs/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis po
222b7(mdo sde): brang 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ pho brang 'khor skyong dge'o dge'o// lang pho brang 'khor skyong yang dag par gshegs pa la sems can mang po la bde/
222b8(mdo sde): ba'i phyir lnga mi rnams la phan pa'i don dang / de ltar ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi don du zhugs te/ 'di lta bu'i 'dri bar
223a1(mdo sde): 'dod pa khyod dga'o pho brang 'khor skyong de bas khyod dge bar nyon la/ shin tu yid la byos shig dang bshad do// bcom ldan 'das dge'o zhes te/
223a2(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa pho brang 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du bka' stsal to// pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub
223a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'di dag bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su dag pa 'di dag rab tu rnyen do// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bsam pa dang bsam
223a4(mdo sde): pa chen po nan tan du byed pa'i phyir// sems can thams cad la sems mtshungs pa'i phyir stong pa nyid sgom par byed pa'i phyir// ji lta bur smras pa/ de bzhin
223a5(mdo sde): du ba'i phyir te/ pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'di dag bzhi dang ldan na yongs su dag par rab tu rnyed do// 'di 'am chos nyid
223a6(mdo sde): de la zhes smra'o// bsam pa la ni rtag tu brtson pa ni/ byang chub lam las yid mi ldog par 'gyur// g.yo dang sgyu dang nges pa med pa ste/ de dag la ni mtha'
223a7(mdo sde): med pa ye shes yod/ sems can 'dren pa med sdug bsngal mthong // skye dang 'chi dang dga' ba nyon mongs pa// bsogs pa rgya mtsho las ni 'gro sgral phyir// chos/
223a8(mdo sde): kyi gru ni sgrub pa rung 'ang byed// sems can thams cad la ni sems mtshungs pa// 'gro ba la ni bu gcig bzhin du lta// 'di dag thams cad bdag gis dgrol//
223b1(mdo sde): bar bya// gang zag mchog gi bsam pa de 'dra'o// stong pa nyid du rgyun tu rtag song ba// bdag dang sems can yang ni med pa ste// 'dus byas rmi lam sgyu ma dang ni/ dra/
223b2(mdo sde): de la byis pa mi shes pa ni rmongs// mkhas pa de dag cig gis ji bzhin smra// de bzhin nan tan la ni shin tu gnas// dul zhing zhi ba rtag tu nye spang te// rgyal sras
223b3(mdo sde): byang chub lam la rtag tu brtson// pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' dbugs rab tu rnyed pa 'di dag bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzungs rnams rab tu rnyed pa
223b4(mdo sde): dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rab tu rnyed pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa rab tu rnyed pa dang / tshul khrims yongasu dag pa tshangs par spyod pa spyad ste/
223b5(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbugs rab tu rnyed pa 'di dag ste/ 'di yang chos nyid de de la 'di zhes smra'o// grags chen de dag rtag gzung
223b6(mdo sde): rnyed pa yin/ de yis sangs rgyas thams cad chos mchog gsung 'chang ba/ nam du ma rung mi phyi phyir blo 'phel/ 'di'i ye shes thogs med chos kun pha rol son/
223b7(mdo sde): byang chub yang dag 'phel ba'i dge bshes rnyed// gang gis 'dren pa 'gro la lam mchog bshad// de dag gar yang sdig pa'i grogs mi sten// de ni me bzhin tshig/
223b8(mdo sde): bdag ring spong ngo // brtan pas zab mo'i chos thos stong bar ldan// de dag sems can srog lta yongs mi 'gyur// de khrims bgod dul zhing yid ni 'gyur//
224a1(mdo sde): bla med sangs rgyas khrims la sems can 'god// pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' rnams// 'khor la gnas pa na/ dga' bar byed
224a2(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'di dag bzhi bzhi ste// gzhi gang zhe na/ pho brang 'khor skyong sangs rgyas mthong bas dga' ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' bar byed pa
224a3(mdo sde): chos so// pho brang 'khor skyong 'thun pa'i chos nyan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos so// bdag gis thams cad yongasu gtong ba
224a4(mdo sde): ba dang / chos la mi dmigs par bzod pa'o// pho brang 'khor skyongs byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor ba na gnas pa na/ dga' bar byed pa'i chos 'di dag
224a5(mdo sde): go/ 'di yang chos nyid de/ 'di la 'di zhes smra'o// skye ba kun na mi mchog sangs rgyas mthong / 'jig rten kun tu gzi brjid kun snang byed// mi dbang rgyal
224a6(mdo sde): la dga' gnas sti sta mchog/ byang chub mchog rab tshol ba sems cad do// 'dren pa la ni zhi ba'i chos 'thus nyan// bsam pa brtan pas thos pa yang
224a7(mdo sde): dag sbyor// dmigs med chos la theg chom mi bskyed de/ sems can med cing chos kun bdag med do// bdag gi thams cad rtag gtong chags pa med/
224a8(mdo sde): stong pa nye 'ong mthong na sems kyang dga'// grong dang rgyal 'khor sa dang bu brang srog/ thams cad stong yang 'od kyang sems mi g.yo// bo brang 'khor skyong byang
224b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos 'di dag bzhi la chags par 'gyur bar mi bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' khyim la
224b2(mdo sde): chags par 'gyur bar mi bya'o// pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu byung nas/ khe dang sti stang la yang chags par 'gyur bar mi bya'o//
224b3(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs dang / 'du shing 'dre ba la chags par 'gyur bar mi bya'o// pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' rnam
224b4(mdo sde): lus dang / srog la chags par 'gyur bar mi bya'o// pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos 'di dag bzhi la mi chags par 'gyur bar mi bya'o//
224b5(mdo sde): 'di yang chos nyid de de la 'di zhes smra'o// khyim gyi nyes pa cong rong mtha' med spangs// de'i sems ni rtag tu mi chags te/ de dag pas ni dgon pa la dga' rnyed// /
224b6(mdo sde): yon tan zhi bzhi dbang la shin tu dga'/ bud med dang ni skyes pa rnams dang ni// gang dang yang ni du zhi 'dre ba med// cig tu gnas zhing gse ru dri ma med pa'o//
224b7(mdo sde): de dag snyed pa la yang yid dga' med/ ma rnyed pa la'ang ma dga' med/ 'dod pa chung zhing rang gis chog shes pas// g.yo rnams kyi ni spangs pa'o// sems
224b8(mdo sde): can gyi ni don du brtson 'grus ldan// yid ni sbyor ba dang ni dul ba gnas// bsam gtan brtson 'grus yon tan pha rol son// sangs rgyas kyi ni ye shes 'dod phyir ro//
225a1(mdo sde): lus dang srog la yang ni chags med de// de bzhin gshegs pa sdug snga ba 'ang ni gtang // rtag tu byang chub lam brtan la ni sbyar/
225a2(mdo sde): bsam pa rdo rje 'dra ba su lag gcod// dum bur byas kyang de dag rnams sems su// nI g.yo zhing ni 'gyur ba med pa ste// phyi phyi ru ni brtson 'grus brtson
225a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur// shin tu dang bas thams cad mkhyen par 'dod// pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams phyis khyad par mi
225a4(mdo sde): byed pa'i chos 'di dag bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ pho brang 'khor skyong tshul khrims ma god pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'gyod par mi byed pa'i choso//
225a5(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor skyong bas mtha' dgon par gnas pa rjes su mi gtong ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyis 'gyod par mi byed pa'i chos so// 'phags pa'i
225a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang / pho brang 'khor skyong mang du thos pa rab tu rnyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byis pa 'gyod pa mi byed pa'i chos so// /
225a7(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i rigs kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang / pho brang 'khor skyong mang du thos pa rab tu rnyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyis 'gyod pa mi byed pa'i chos so//
225a8(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' rnams byis 'gyod par mi byed pa'i chos 'di dag bzhi'o// 'di'ang chos nyid de de la 'di zhes smras so// dri medad khyim
225b1(mdo sde): srung nor bu rin po che 'dra// 'on kyang bdag ni khrims thub de mi sems// tshul khrims de la sems can rtag 'dzum byed// sangs rgyas 'di ni tshul khrims 'di 'dod do//
225b2(mdo sde): de dag pas mtha' dgon pa stong par gnas// bdag du mi shes srog du 'du shes med// brtsa shing rtsig par gzugs kun rab tu mthong // / 'di ru bud med/
225b3(mdo sde): skyes pa bdag kyang med// 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi chags shing g.yo sgyu med// bsam pa chen pos de ru bag yod sbyor// thos nas yon tan brtan tu brtsom
225b4(mdo sde): par byed// bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes mthu chen thob// bsogs pa'i brtson ra mgon med 'gro la lta// skye rga na 'chi nyon mongs nyon mongs pa ka zhi ba chos
225b5(mdo sde): grub mchog rab bsgrubs nas su// sems can bsogs pa'i rgya mtsho 'od pa sgrol// mgon dang skyabs dang 'ong pa rten pa ni// su yang med pa'i 'jig rten
225b6(mdo sde): 'dus byas bzhugs gyur pa// sems can 'di dag thams cad bdag gis dgrol// 'di don bdag ni byang chub mchog tu tshol// pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub
225b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams// cang shes su 'gyur ba 'di dag bzhi rjes su chud par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ rgyud bzang po rab tu rnyed pa de// sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang /
225b8(mdo sde): 'thun pa'i phyir ro// bla ma la sti stang byed pa ni/ de zang zing med par sten pa'i phyir ro// gnod pa la gnas par dga' ba ni khye dang sti btang la ma chags pa'i phyir ro//
226a1(mdo sde): spobs pa rnyed pa ni de bzod pa rab mo dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// pho brang 'khor stong byang chub sems dpa' rnams cad shes su 'gyur ba rjes
226a2(mdo sde): su chud par byas pa 'di dag bzhi'o// 'di'ang chos nyid de/ de la 'di zhes smra'o// brtan pa nags tshal phrag tu gnas nas// de dag khe dang rtag 'dod rtag mi
226a3(mdo sde): 'gyur// thogs med blo yis rtag tu spobs ldan yin// go bdun med pa'i zab mo chos mkhas// rtag tu bla ma la nyan rtag yin// de ji bzhin du spras de bzhin
226a4(mdo sde): brtson// bde bar gshegs pa mang po mnyes par byed// rgyal ba'i ye shes phyir ni rgya cher mchod par byed// grags pa chen po de ni rgyun mchog 'od//
226a5(mdo sde): lha dang shes mkhyen gyi ni gtsor phyir te// byang chub rdzogs lam sems can byed du 'jug/ dge ba bcu'i pa de bzhin gzud par byed// sangs rgyas nyan
226a6(mdo sde): thos de dag dga' bar 'gyur// de dag nga 'thad yun du mi ring nye bar 'ong // de brdul med zhi byang chub mchog 'tshang rgya// sems can khrag khrig mtha' med
226a7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal 'grol// pho brang 'khor sbyong byang chub sems dpa' rnams// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyor bar byed pa'i chos 'di dag
226a8(mdo sde): bzhi ste// gzhi gang zhe na/ chags pa med pa'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i phyir ro// rgyu dang g.yo dang brdzun yongasu spang ba ni// bas
226b1(mdo sde): mtha' dgon pa la gnas pa'i phyir// bdag gis thams cad yongs su gtang yang sbyin pa sngar mi re ba dang / nyin mtshan du chos 'dod cing /
226b2(mdo sde): chos smra ba rnams ni nyes pa mi tshol ba'o// pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa yongasu sbyor bar byed pa/
226b3(mdo sde): chos 'di dag bzhi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// nyes pa du ma kho bo'i sems kyang med// su yi nyes
226b4(mdo sde): pa 'ang ni mi rtog tshal// g.yo dang rgyu dang slu ba med pa'i sems// byang chub sems dpa' sems ni 'dod pa 'ang 'gyur// khyim ni ma rung slu ba'i
226b5(mdo sde): mya ngan can// sems can dang 'grogs yang dag ring du 'gyur// btang nas de las mi chags rab tu 'byung // ri dang tsocong rong gnas te thar 'dod phyir/
226b6(mdo sde): bas dgon du ma dgon pa ru'ang gnas// gnyen gshegs las ni rnyed par gnas ma yin// lus dang srog la'ang ni mi 'phangs par/ seng ge bzhin gnas
226b7(mdo sde): ma skrag dgra yang bcom// rang rang gis ni chos par 'gyur ba de// bya ba bzhin du rtag tu bsogs pa yin// 'jig rten kun tu gnas pa ma yin te/ rtag tu
226b8(mdo sde): byang chub kyi ni lam shes tshol// bse ru bzhin du gcig pur gnas pa la// seng ge bzhin du skrag pa med pa ste// sa yid mi ches ri dgas bzhin du sreg/ mchod
227a1(mdo sde): par byas pa las ni mthong ma 'gyur// 'gro rnams yangs sar ltung ba mthong nas su// so sor thar pa'i phyir ru nan tan byed// bdag dang 'gro ba rnam
227a2(mdo sde): kyi skyabasu 'gyur// ji ste bag yod pa ru dge sbyod pa'o// gnyen po'i tshig ni dgon cing smra ba ste// sdug dang mi sdug rtag tu mi 'khrul sems// de ru mis kyang mi
227a3(mdo sde): chags rlung bzhin te// mi yi spyod pa mchog ni 'dod pa'o// stong pa nyid mtshan med la shin tu mos// 'dus byas thams cad sgyu mar gyur pa shes// zhi ba'i tshig
227a4(mdo sde): la dag rgya mtsho'i blo// bdud rtsi'i blo yis rtag tu mgu pa'o// byang chub lam du ji bzhin nan tan byed// der bsam pa ji lta bzhin du sbyong // gzugs rnams dang ni
227a5(mdo sde): spobs pa 'di ni chol// yon tan 'don phyir sdug bsngal brgya 'ang bzod// spyod 'di byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas su// de 'dod 'gyur de ni mgu ba yin// /
227a6(mdo sde): gang yang byang chub 'di la chags ma 'gyur// de ni rlung blos nyes pa brgya'ang rnyed// pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis g.yangs 'di dag bzhi ste/
227a7(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ pho brang 'khor skyong sti btang mi byed pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa'o// pho brang 'khor skyong byas pa shes shing g.yos bsten pa mi byed//
227a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa'o// pho brang 'khor skyong khe dang sti bstan la shin tu chags par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa'o//
227b1(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor skyong khe dang sti stang 'dod pa'i phyir g.yo dang bcas byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang sa'o// pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa rnams
227b2(mdo sde): kyi g.yang sa yang 'di dag bzhi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dus na/ tshig su bcad pa 'di gsungaso// de la rtag tu sti stang byed par mi 'gyur ba// 'phags
227b3(mdo sde): dang bla ma pa dang ma la sten// byas pa mi shes g.yo dang ldan pa yin// rtag tu 'dus par mi spyod mi smin pa'o// pha rol po'i rten la rtags par chags// g.yo dang sgyu
227b4(mdo sde): la sbyor zhing chags pa med// de ru bdag dang mtshungs pa su 'ang med// tshul khrims rtul bzhugs na zhes gtan yang spras// de dag cig la gcig ni zhe 'ang sdang //
227b5(mdo sde): rtag glan ka chol la brtson pa ste// zhing gi las dang tshor byed la ni chags// de dag dge slong yon tan ring du 'phangs// 'di lta bur ni phyin dus srung ma yin// dge slong
227b6(mdo sde): phyi dus tshul khrims yon tan ring du 'gyur// de dag gis ni chos 'di ma rungs byed// phra dog dbang gis thab cing brtson par byed// de dag byang chub laM las rtag ring 'phags//
227b7(mdo sde): de dag 'phags pa'i nor la shin tu 'phang // thar pa'i lam bstan pa ni spang nas su// de dag rgyud lnga ru ni rgyu bar 'gyur/ pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa rnams
227b8(mdo sde): byang chub lam bgegs byed pa'i chos de dag bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' rnam byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos so// pho brang
228a1(mdo sde): 'khor skyong dang bar mi byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos so// pho brang 'khor spyong rang byed pa ni byang chub sems
228a2(mdo sde): dpa' rnams byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos so// pho brang 'khor skyong gzhan la mchod pa la phrag dog byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub la bgeg
228a3(mdo sde): byed pa'i chos so// pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos 'di dag bzhi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i
228a4(mdo sde): dus de dag gsungs so// mi lce lo rtag tu rmongs pa'i sems// de dag rtag tu nga che khro ba ste// rtag tu brtson 'grus bzod pa'i dge slong mthong nas su//
228a5(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang du de song chad pas gcod// pha rol gcod pa'i don la phra dog skyes// de dag sems ni gnas pa med pa ste/ glags lta zhing ni nyes pa tshol byed cing
228a6(mdo sde): su la nyes pa yod na rgol byed do// de dag 'di la bstan pa 'di la rings// de dag yon tan zhe sdang song gzhol// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan pa btang nas su//
228a7(mdo sde): ngan song 'bar ba mi zad pa ru 'gro// de dag gis ni sdig spyod 'di thos nas// chos kyi mi ldan pa ngan song mi zod 'gro// khyer rtag byang chub lam las rtag brtson gyi
228a8(mdo sde): ngan song sar skyes gnas phyi ma 'gyid// bskal pa bye ba mang por gal te sangs rgyas pa// 'jig rten phan phyir drang srong chen po 'byung // de ltar mchog rab kyi ni
228b1(mdo sde): gom pa snyed// ji snyed thar pa 'dod na ngag med spyod// pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' gang zag 'di dag bzhi dang sten par mi bya// bzhi gang zhe na/
228b2(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor sbyor byang sdig sto can gyi grogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bsten par mi bya'o// pho brang 'khor skyong dmigs pa'i blta ba'i gang zag byang chub
228b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' ma rnyed par bya'o// pho brang 'khor skyong dam pa'i chos la gcod par byed pa'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa' bsten par mi bya'o// pho brang la
228b4(mdo sde): skyong zang zing la bskal pa'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa' sten par mi bya'o// pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' gang zag 'di dag bzhi sten pa mi bya'o//
228b5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dus su tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// gang gis sdig pa'i grogs po rnams spangs nas// bde gshegs gnyen pa
228b6(mdo sde): la ni rtag rten byed// byang chub lam du rtag par 'phel ba ste// na mkhar zla ba yar gyi dkyil 'khor bzhin// dmigs par lta ba rtag tu chags pa ste// bdag
228b7(mdo sde): la chags shing de bzhin bsrog la'ang chags// de yis dug du ba bzhin du spang bar gyis// gang du sangs rgyas ye shes 'dod gyur pa'o// gang gis mi mchog
228b8(mdo sde): gis ni chos spong ba// zhi ba 'dod tshogs med pa bdud rtsi 'thung // de la yang ni rkyang kun shin tu spangs// gang zhig byang chub mchog 'di chud 'dod pa'o//
229a1(mdo sde): @zang zing lhung zad chos gos chags pa dang // rigs dang 'dre zhing 'dul ba la rtag tu brtson// de dag dang ni rtag tu lhan cig 'du/
229a2(mdo sde): de ni me'i khu bzhin du ni spangs// su bzhig bdud ni 'joms par 'dod pa ni// 'khor lo rab ni bla na med pa bskor// sems can gyi ni don ni rgya cher bya//
229a3(mdo sde): des kyang sdig pa'i grogs po spangs// sdug dang mi sdug gnyis su spangs pa ni// khyod grags nga dang thabs ma phra dog rnams// rtag tu 'khor sdug sangs
229a4(mdo sde): rgyas ye shes tshol// gang gis byang chub mchog 'di 'dod pas so// pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' rnam par smin pa'i chos 'di dag bzhi ste/
229a5(mdo sde): gzhi gang zhe na/ pho brang 'khor skyong shes par byed pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams sdug bsngal bar smin pa'i chos so// pho brang 'khor skyong phrag dog
229a6(mdo sde): dang 'jugs sems ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos so// pho brang 'khor skyong mos pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
229a7(mdo sde): rnams sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos so// pho brang 'khor skyong shes pa yongasu ma dag pa la bzod cing longs spyod yong su rtsol ba ni byang chub sems dpa rnams
229a8(mdo sde): sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos so// pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos 'di dag bzhi'o//
229b1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dus na tshogasu bcad pa 'di dag gsungaso// de dag sa la chos 'dzin 'gyur ba ni// 'gro ba rnam pa zhig kyang ni mchog par 'gyur//
229b2(mdo sde): de dag dka' ni banas par byed pa ste// de phyir sdug bsngal mtha' med par yang myong // de ni longs spyad ma rung ba yongs tshol// zhes pa ma dag rtag tu 'dod
229b3(mdo sde): sred// rtag tu su zhig de'i bgyi ba ste// 'phags pa'i sems can bla ma wa mi 'dud// de ni sangs rgyas la ni mos pa med// de ni chos la'ang de bzhin mos pa me/
229b4(mdo sde): de ni tshul khribs la ni mos pa med// sdig pa'i blo gros ngan song gsum de phyogs// de de nas shi 'phos nas shes mkhan du// las kyi dbang gis mi shes chug
229b5(mdo sde): pa ru// sems can dmyal lam 'on te byol song rgyud// byol song rgyud du de yang sdug bsngal myong // su zhig 'jig rten sgron zhes yid 'gyur ba/ mi yi
229b6(mdo sde): dbang pos sdug bsngal mthar zad byed// de'i ngan song lam ni rab spangs nas// byang chub las la rtag tu rten par bya// pho brang 'khor skyong theg pa chen
229b7(mdo sde): po'i mdo// / bam po gnyis pa// pho brang 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' rnam bcing ba 'di dag bzhi ste/
229b8(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol la da cher byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bcing ba'o// 'jig rten gyi mtha' sgom pa'o// sbyor te mtshan mas rab tu
230a1(mdo sde): shes pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bcing ba'o// sems can ma gcad par shes pa dang // gal te bag med par snyan par byed pa ni
230a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bcing bya'o// rigs kyis 'dre zhing dul ba la rag las pa'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bcing ba'o// pho brang 'khor/
230a3(mdo sde): skyong byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bcing ba 'di dag bzhi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// rtag tu gzhan la da cher byed
230a4(mdo sde): ba ste// 'di ni rtag tu 'jig rten gyi ni bsam gtan sgom// de ni lta bar yin pa yi// bal glang nyam chung 'dam chu 'dab rdzab bying bzhin no// rigs la 'dre 'dal
230a5(mdo sde): brtson pa bcings pa ste// ngag med rtag tu 'dzin par sems pa ni// rmongs pa blo gros shes pa yis ni spangs// ma rigs pa'i spyod 'dis de bcing so//
230a6(mdo sde): gang sdug bsngal rnams las 'jigs par 'dod cing / skye dang rga dang 'chi las thar pa dang // bskas pa dang ni de rnams spangs su// rtag par byang chub la yang sbyor
230a7(mdo sde): bar byed// mtha' med sdug bsngal ma lus pa yang bzod// bde ba thams cad la ni ma chags 'gyur// sdug dang mi sdug gnyen bshes ma lus btang // rnyog pa med pa/
230a8(mdo sde): brtan pa sangs rgyas 'gyur// pha rol phyin pa drug la sbyor ba ste// sa'i yon tan skyon dbang ye shes la// yon tan thams cad dang ni rtag tu ldan// dga' ba'i sras du de
230b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'gyur// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab sngon spyad pas// sems can phan phyir byang chub mchog kyang spyad// sbyin dang dul ba la ni rtag tu nges// gnyen bshes
230b2(mdo sde): bral nas bde bar gnas pa yin// dgon pa'i gnas 'khor 'brug bdag dga' nas// byang chub byi ru lus kyang bskams pa ste// nams kyang brtson 'grus lhod par ma
230b3(mdo sde): byas kyang // skyes bu chen po'i ye shes tshol na'o// bsogs par 'gyur ba'i 'gro ba mthong nas su// rgyun sngar rgyu zhing 'khor ba'i sems can la/ sngon ni 'di ru
230b4(mdo sde): snying rje chen po byas// 'gro ba'i don byang chub rab kyang bsags// bdag gi bu mo chung ma sdug/ sngon ni nor bu mang po gtang ba na// phangs pa srog dang yul rnam kyang
230b5(mdo sde): ni btang // byang chub rab ni bskal mang tshol ba na// chu med me tog 'bras bu mang dga' ba// bdag ni thub bzod la ni dga' 'gyur te// sdig pa'i rgyal pos rkang lag
230b6(mdo sde): gcad pas na// de tshe dag gi yid ni ma 'khrugs so// mi ni zhi ba nags ri'i khrod na ste// thub pas bla ma la ni bskyangs pa yi// rgyal po tshabs chen mnga' yi bsnun pa na//
230b7(mdo sde): de tshe yid ni khro bar ma gyur to// lus la ma chags pa'i steng nas su// bor bar byas te dge ba bshad pa'i phyir// bdag gi lus dang srog la ma yin par/
230b8(mdo sde): byang chub mtshan gyis phyir ni mi phangs yin// stag gi bu srog gi phyi ru yang // lus bor nas ni stag mo 'drangs par byed/ namakha' las lha mang dge zhes zer ba//
231a1(mdo sde): skyes su chen pos brtson 'grus brtan pa dge/ shin tu spyod pa la ni dga' yin pa/ sngon gyi bso sbyong bram ze'i phru gu ste/ rin chen phyir/
231a2(mdo sde): rgya che skabs nas su/ nor bu snyed nas sems can rab tu byas/ sa dbang lta bu zhes bur gyur pas na/ de tshe bdag ni rab chog spyod kun grags/ gsang khrid la ni de'i
231a3(mdo sde): bde tshig gis/ rgyal po rgya ni yongs su thar par byas/ dbul zhing sdug bsngal ba'i mi mthong nas/ nga yis sdug pa'i las ni btang nas su/ nor snyed pas ni nga'i phyug
231a4(mdo sde): byas pa/ bdag ni kun sprin ma'i gtsor gyur na'o// skyabs su 'ongs pa'i phug ron 'ongs nas su/ bdag gi sha ni so sor btubs pa ste/ bdag gi lus sbyin 'jigs
231a5(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ma yin/ de ru mi gtso byed pa na ngas btang / sman pa mchog gis kun ni sbyar ba na/ gzhan dang mi mtshungs pa ni sman sngon ngas/ srog chags gtang nas
231a6(mdo sde): gzhan la sbyin na ni/ bdag gi rgyal po ge sar gyur tshe na'o// sngon ni 'gro ba'i don du spyod pa na/ brtul zhags chung ma ma sring bcas pa btang / bu mo mi chags mi phangs
231a7(mdo sde): btang ba ni/ de tshe rgyal bu chos bzang gyur pa'o// bdag ni lo stong yang ni rdzogs gyur na/ dkar spyod cu rtsa bzhi bzod pa ste/ de tshe brtson 'grus la ni rab brtson yin/
231a8(mdo sde): sngon bdag du nor dpal ldan na'o// rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gyi ni bdun/ bdag ni rtag tu dad pas lus bsregs nas/ stobs bcu rnams la mchod pa byas pa
231b1(mdo sde): ni/ mi gtso'i bu ni dri med gyur pa na'o// ma rungs mig gis khros nas de bzhin du/ de yis bdag gi mgo yang bsdus pa ni/ nga yis su bcad de byin pa ste/ de tshe rgyal
231b2(mdo sde): bo zla 'od gyur pa na/ grong dang grong khyer rnams ni thams cad kyang / sgo dang srad rnams sman gyis rgyas ba ru/ sems can don du bdag gis bzhag pa ste/ de tshe bdag
231b3(mdo sde): ni bsod nams mtshungs gyur pa/ bud med stong ni gzugs kyang bzang mo rnams/ gser dang mu tig gis ni lus brgyan pa/ 'khor ba'i mtshon bdag gis btang
231b4(mdo sde): ba ni/ nam sngon mi'i gtso bor gyur pa na/ me tog mchog rnams dang / gser dang mu ti mchog dbang dpal ldan rgyan/ cod pan dang ni bdag gis sngon btang steng /
231b5(mdo sde): de tshe mi gtso rin chen gtsug gyur pa'o// shing bal mang po 'drang ba dang / dri med pad mo lo rab bzhon pa'i/ bdag gi rkang pa dang ni la btang ba/ bdag sngon mi'i
231b6(mdo sde): gtso bor gyur dga' ldan na/ 'bar ba mo brgya chas gcod pa ni/ ma rungs rab ni bzang ba'i snying rje med pa ni/ 'ba' 'da'i ri'i gling du mi bkod pa/
231b7(mdo sde): de'i tshe sing ga la'i ded dpon gyur/ bdag gi yid ni 'dod pas myos pa na/ 'ba' mo bu mo sdug gur 'du shes nas/ tshong pa lnga rgya po rnams la ni/
231b8(mdo sde): de ltar byas te tshe mi zad gyur pa/ bud med bye ba khrag bzhi yi ni rnams/ lha mo 'dra ba'i gzug byed btang nas su/ rgyal bas bstan la rab tu 'byung
232a1(mdo sde): gyur pa/ 'od zer rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe na'o// bdag gi sor mo mang po btang ba ni/ bdag ni sems can phan phyir spyod pa na/ 'bar
232a2(mdo sde): bas sbas pa'i dri med lags pa ste/ gtso bo gser gyi kha dog gyur tshe na'o// bzang song pad mo 'dra ba'i kha dog gis mig ni yid 'ong snying gar byed pa ni/ bdag gis
232a3(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i don du btang ba ste/ ud dpal mig gi gtso bor gyur tshe na'o// sdug pa dang ni bral zhing gnod mthong nas/ bud med gzugs mchog gzugs ni ma rung
232a4(mdo sde): ba/ bdag gi snying rjes kun thar byas ste/ sman rgyal kya sha bar ni gyur tshe na'o// nad kyis na ba'i mi rnams mthong nas su/ bdag gis rang gi khrag kyang sbyin gyur pas//
232a5(mdo sde): de ni bdag gis med par byas te/ sngon gyi bsogs pa kun ston gyur na'o// bdag gis lus kyi rus pa bcom nas su/ nad dang nyon mongs rnams la rkang byin nas/
232a6(mdo sde): nams kyang bdag gis sems can ma btang ste/ mi'i gtso u su ma ru gyur tshe na'o// bdag gi mdzod ni thams cad btang ba ste/ bdag gis sdug cing yang yang yid
232a7(mdo sde): srog btang nas/ chags la 'khod pa'i mi rnams dgrol byas te/ mi'i gtso bo sngon che dngos grub gyur pa na/ 'khor lo bris pa me tog ka ma la bzhin te/ lag pa
232a8(mdo sde): gnyis kyang mi phan byin pa ni/ bsam pa dpal gyi gtso bor gyur pa'i tshe na ste/ byang chub 'dod pa 'gro ba'i don tu'o// thams cad ston pa'i gtso bor gyur pa'i tshe/
232b1(mdo sde): snying rjes ldan pas sems can don 'phan 'dod/ bdag gi gling bzhi rnams kyang btang ba ni/ rdzu 'phrul mi dang bud med brgya yis gang ba'o// 'jam zhing gnyen pa
232b2(mdo sde): dri med dkar po yis/ dga' zhing mthun nas brlab yang bcad nas su/ rang gi sha khrag bdag gis byin pa ste/ rgyal po'i bu mo shes ldan gyur pa'i tshe/ gser dang
232b3(mdo sde): mtshungs pa gzhon nur gyur pa na/ snying dkar byed pa'i nu ma gnyis btang ba/ bdag gis bud med skyes skom nyon mongs mthong / gzugs dang ldan pa'i bud med gyur
232b4(mdo sde): tshe na'o// rgyan rab shin tu dga' bar byed rnams dang / rin chen du ma'i gos dang shing rta theg/ btang bar bka' ba du ma btang ba dang / bdag ni grags pa ri'i
232b5(mdo sde): rgyal por gyur tshe na'o// rgyal po'i bu sa'i bya ba shes pa na/ byas pa shes pas rgya mtsho las ni bsgral/ degra rin chen byi ru du ba'i bya'i mig/ phyung yang de la nga ni
232b6(mdo sde): ma khros so// grogs rnams gnod mi 'gyur ba'i phyir/ spyod tshe bdag gis lus mchog btang yang ni/ de tshe bdag gi sems kyis mi g.yos te/ sngon pa sogs srog chags
232b7(mdo sde): 'go dar gyur tshe na'o// bdag gis g.yog dang sti stang byed dga' nas/ rgan po dang ni rtag spyod dga' gyur te/ bdag lang dang 'gying ba yang med de/ god mor gyur cing /
232b8(mdo sde): rgyu ba'i tshe na'o// skabs su 'ongs pa'i don du bdag gis so// snying rje bskyed nas lus kyi btang ba ste/ de la spu rung gyur kyang ma btang nas/ rngon pa mi yis mangs
233a1(mdo sde): phog nyon mongs na'o// rgyal po dbang byed pa na lus skams/ rgan po bla ma bal klang dran pa na/ shin tu bzang ba'i kha zas ma zas na/ che
233a2(mdo sde): bdag pa glang las ni thar byas so// dog ri la ni don dbang gyur pa na/ mkhas pas nyon mongs bdag gis nyin bdun srungs/ skyes pa de'i bdag la bsod gtang ba/ de che
233a3(mdo sde): bdag gis khong khro ma byas so// ba glang me tog khab 'drar gyur na/ byang chub rab gnas sangs rgyas yon tan phyir/ bdud dang bcas pa'i mda' yis phog kyang ni/
233a4(mdo sde): mchi ba mchog kyang btang nas ma khros so// nags kyi spyod yul ka la da ka'i gling / sreg pa'i phrug gu byams par gnas pa na/ me rnams mthong ma thag tu zhi gnas su/
233a5(mdo sde): lha mang gis ni me tog kyang ni gtor/ chu bo gang ga'i rlab kyis khyer ba na/ bdag gi rigs gyur che de bsgral na ni/ de yis bdag la gsod pa btang yang ni/ de tshe bdag
233a6(mdo sde): gi yid kyang ma khros so// tshong pa lnga brgya rnams kyang bsgral byas te/ rgya mtsho'i dbus song mgon ni med pa la/ de'i bdag ni de dag bsgos pas bsad/ rus sbal gyi/
233a7(mdo sde): ni mngal zhugs byams pa na'o// 'dun bdag byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na/ nya ru gyur te chu na spyod pa nas/ bdag gis sems can phan phyir lus kyang btang / srog chag
233a8(mdo sde): brgya stong rnams kyi sha ni zos/ 'gro ba nad rgyas nyon mongs mthong nas ni/ lus ni sman du gyur par byas nas su/ sems can nad med pa ru yang byas/ de tshe zhi bzhi pa'i srog
233b1(mdo sde): chags gyur pa na'o// ri dgas rgyal po seng ger gyur pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus stobs dang snying rjes ldan pa ste/ mda' yis thal phyung phyung yang sems ma khros/ de'i tshe
233b2(mdo sde): gcod pa de la'ang byams byas pa/ ba mo dung 'dra'i rgyal po na/ bdag sngon rgya mtsho mching rnams kyi 'gram na/ 'bar ba'i dbus su song ba'i tshong ba rnams/ bdag gis
233b3(mdo sde): snying brtse snying rjes de dag sbrul/ 'gro don byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdag ni bya ni kun gyur pa'i tshe/ 'dod pa'i yon tan nges pa ma spangs te/ bdag ni bud med
233b4(mdo sde): dbang du ma srong ngo // nags khrod gnas pa'i ri bong gyur tshe na/ ri bong mang la dge ba byed bsten te/ thub pa gnas pa bkres pas nyon mongs la/ de'i phyir du nga'i lus
233b5(mdo sde): btang ngo // shing gis me tog 'bru mang gtso gyur na/ shing de skams kyang bdag gis ma btang ste/ bdag gis byas pa brgya byin shes nas su/ de yis shing ni lo ma 'bru mar
233b6(mdo sde): byas/ spra mang po yang 'tsho ba mthong ba na/ klu'i rgyal pos yul dang bral byas pa'o// rgyal pos 'jigs pa bdag gis thar byas pa'o// bdag gi spre'u rgyal pos gyur
233b7(mdo sde): chenalo// sngon ni ne gtsor gyur te bla ma'i phyir/ 'brus 'bras pan ni mi yis gzung nas su/ ci byir ne tse khyod kyis nga 'bras rku/ sman pa'i 'bru yang khyed kyis ma rung
233b8(mdo sde): byas/ ne ces sbas pa bzang ba khyod kyang can/ bdag gis 'bras ni kun phyir ma thos/ thas rgan pa gnyis ni zhes pa'i byed/ de dang snying ce phyi ru bdag 'bras bu/ rdzun
234a1(mdo sde): kyi nam sngon sa bon 'debs pa na/ 'gro ba kun la khyod kyis skal pa byin/ de skad sla ni khyod 'byin ngas zos nas/ de bas kun po ru ni yongs ma 'gyur/
234a2(mdo sde): ne tse khyod dge 'bras ci 'dod pa khyer/ 'di lta bu'i byams pa mi la dkon/ mi las ga la byos song de bzhin pa/ khyod ni zhi zhing dul khugs dge ba'o// 'di la sogs
234a3(mdo sde): pa thogs ma nas ni/ rga ba byas pa rnams ni sngon spyod kyang / bdag gi yid la sbyor ma gyur te/ byang chub rdul med mchog ni tshol ba'o// nang rnams kyang ni phyi rol rnams
234a4(mdo sde): kyang ni/ bdag gi dngos po ma byin gang yang med/ tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus de bzhin te/ bdag gi bsam gtan thabs dang shes rab spyad/ sha rnams
234a5(mdo sde): dang ni lpags pa de bzhin rkang / bdag gi lus las de bzhin du ni khrag/ mya ngan dgon la bdag gis rtag pa ru/ rgyu ba na ni lus kyang skams par byas/ rgyal bas byas
234a6(mdo sde): ba'i theg pa bshad pa na/ gang la rgyal ba rnams kyis sbyor 'gyur ba/ sbyangs pa de la bdag ni rtag brtson te/ sngon ni bdag gis rtag tu sbyangs pa yin/ 'di 'dra
234a7(mdo sde): ba yi brtul shugs rgya che ba/ rgyu ba na ni de 'drar bdag gis spyad/ de dag gis ni spyod pa 'di thos nas/ tshe gcig la yang dad par mi 'gyuraro// 'di thos nas ni gang/
234a8(mdo sde): mo bgad 'gyur ba/ de tshe de las bstan pa 'di lta ste/ khang bzang dang ni nyan po mchog tu byed/ gnyis rtag zil non g.yo ma rung ldan/ rtag tu zhe sdang chos la
234b1(mdo sde): 'phags ma yin/ bstan pa la ni smon cing yon tan med/ zhi ba'i chos rnams 'di dag thos nas su/ 'di ni rgyal bas gsungs pa ma yin zhes/ bdag gi slob dpon thos/
234b2(mdo sde): pa rgya mtsho bzhin/ mang pos thos pa gtam mchog zer gyur te/ de yis 'di yang rab tu sman yin te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bka' ni ma yin zhes/ de las gzhan par
234b3(mdo sde): rgad par 'gyur ba yis/ bla ma de'i yon tan tshad kyang med/ des kyang 'di dag ma bzung ste/ log pa 'di la brtson par ma byed cig/ de la bdag med mtsho ba yang ni
234b4(mdo sde): med/ nams kyang gang zag pa ru ma bshad pa/ de la 'bad cing rtsol ba 'dod med cing / tshul khrims sdom pa byed la'o// ji ste theg pa chen po yong na ni/ de na bdag
234b5(mdo sde): dang sems can shed bdag med/ de la bdag gis rtsol byas don kyang med/ gang na bdag dang sems can dmigs med na'o// bdag gis bla yis 'di ni ring bzod
234b6(mdo sde): byas/ sdig blo ldog pa'i ma 'dug mtshungs pa ni/ rgyal bas 'di ni yong mi mtshungs pa ste/ tshig 'di dge slong rnams kyis gsungs pa'i/ ngo tsha khrel dang tshul khrim
234b7(mdo sde): med pa ste/ tsa ya gtsam dang 'phyar ba ma rungs par/ nga'i bstan las dge slong gyur par 'ong / phrag dog nga rgyal dregs pa yis/ lag rgod cing rkang de bzhin
234b8(mdo sde): du chos kyis phyir ni mtha' ma 'byar ba ste/ dur mig phrag ba ru ni byas pa 'khyam/ grong dang khyim gyi nga dang btung bas myes/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi ni rgyal mtsha
235a1(mdo sde): 'tshang / rgyal po dang ni khyim pa'i sems can te na/ de dag rtag par ye shes skyel ba ste/ bstan pa'i 'di yi yon tan phung po spongs/ ba glab
235a2(mdo sde): rta dang bong bu lug dran dang / de dag la ni bran mo rnams kyang 'ong // rmo ba dang ni las dang sbyor ba ste/ de la rtag tu yin brtson 'phags ma yin/ de dag 'phags pa'i
235a3(mdo sde): yin zhes smra ba med/ ci yang ma bres pa yang cung zad med/ mchod rten gyi dang dge 'dun gyi nor la 'ang / de dag gang zag cig gi dang mtshangs pa'o dge slong yon
235a4(mdo sde): tan mang bas mthong nas su/ de dag la ni gshin pa med ces smra/ log pa'i tshul khrims bslus pa zhugs nas ni/ mi zad pas ni bud med ma rungs pas/ 'dod la
235a5(mdo sde): chags te de bzhin khyim pa min/ rab tu 'byung nas che ba chags pa 'dra/ chung ma dang ni bu pheM bu mo dang / de dag khyim pa dang / ni mtshungs par 'ong / de dag gang
235a6(mdo sde): gis khyim du sti stang byas/ chos gos bsod snyoms yongs su spyod byed pa/ de'i bud med kun kyang len pa ste/ 'phags min nyon mongs dbang du rtag par 'grong/
235a7(mdo sde): 'dod pa 'di la bsten mi bya zhes par/ byol song yi dgas sems can dmyal ltung ngo // de dag nag gi ni khyim pa la rtag tu smra 'ang / de dag rang ni mdul ma zhi'o//
